segment.target: O sintetizador de voz SAPI4 agora soporta correctamente os cambios de volume, velocidade e ton integrados na voz. (#15271, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Multi line state is now correctly reported in applications using Java Access Bridge. (#14609)
segment.target: Agora anúnciase correctamente o estado multiliña en aplicacións que utilizan Access Bridge. (#14609)

segment.source: NVDA will announce dialog content for more Windows 10 and 11 dialogs. (#15729, @josephsl)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciará contido de diálogo para máis diálogos en Windows 10 y 11. (#15729, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to read a newly loaded page in Microsoft Edge when using UI Automation. (#15736)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non fallará ao ler unha páxina recén cargada en Microsoft Edge ao usar UI Automation. (#15736)

segment.source: When using say all or commands which spell text, pauses between sentences or characters no longer gradually decrease over time. (#15739, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Cando se usa ler utodo ou ordes que deletreen testo, as pausas entre frases ou caracteres xa non disminúen gradualmente co tempo. (#15739, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes when speaking a large amount of text. (#15752, @jcsteh)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non se conxela ás veces cando se fala unha grande cantidade de texto. (#15752, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Edge using UI Automation, NVDA is able to activate more controls in browse mode. (#14612)
segment.target: Ao acesar a Microsoft Edge utilizando UI Automation, o NVDA pode activar máis controis en modo exploración. (#14612)

segment.source: NVDA will not fail to start anymore when the configuration file is corrupted, but it will restore the configuration to default as it did in the past. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non fallará ao arrancar cando o ficheiro de configuración estea corrompido, senon que restaurará a configuración á predeterminada coma o facía no pasado. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Fixed support for System List view (`SysListView32`) controls in Windows Forms applications. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Arranxado o soporte para os controis System List view (`SysListView32`) en aplicacións Windows Forms. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: It is not possible anymore to overwrite NVDA's Python console history. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Xa non é posible sobrescribir o historial da consola Python do NVDA. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: NVDA should remain responsive when being flooded with many UI Automation events, e.g. when large chunks of text are printed to a terminal or when listening to voice messages in WhatsApp messenger. (#14888, #15169)
segment.target: O NVDA debería continuar respondendo cando se inunda con moitos eventos UI Automation, ex. cando se imprimen grandes anacos de texto nunha terminal ou cando se escoitan mensaxes de voz en WhatsApp messenger. (#14888, #15169)

segment.source: This new behavior can be disabled using the new "Use enhanced event processing" setting in NVDA's advanced settings.
segment.target: Este novo comportamento pódese deshabilitar utilizando a nova opción "Utilizar proceso mellorado de eventos" nas opcións avanzadas de NVDA.

segment.source: NVDA is again able to track the focus in applications running within Windows Defender Application Guard (WDAG). (#15164)
segment.target: O NVDA é capaz de novo de seguir o foco en aplicacións que se executen dentro de Windows Defender Application Guard (WDAG). (#15164)

segment.source: The speech text is no longer updated when the mouse moves in the Speech Viewer. (#15952, @hwf1324)
segment.target: O texto falado xa non se actualiza cando o rato se move no Visualizador de Voz. (#15952, @hwf1324)

segment.source: NVDA will again switch back to browse mode when closing combo boxes with `escape` or `alt+upArrow` in Firefox or Chrome. (#15653)
segment.target: O NVDA voltará a cambiar ao modo exploración ao pechar caixas combinadas con `escape` ou `alt+Frecha arriba` en Firefox ou Chrome. (#15653)

segment.source: Arrowing up and down in combo boxes in iTunes will no longer inappropriately switch back to browse mode. (#15653)
segment.target: Moverse arriba e abaixo coas frechas en caixas combinadas en iTunes xa non cambiará inapropriadamente a modo exploración. (#15653)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Por favor consulta [a guía do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para información sobre o proceso de obsolescencia e eliminación da API de NVDA.

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Nota: esta é unha versión que rompe a compatibilidade coa API de complementos.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Os complementos necesitarán voltar a comprobarse e ter os seus manifestos actualizados.

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2022.
segment.target: Compilar NVDA ahora require de Visual Studio 2022.

segment.source: Please refer to the [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) for the specific list of Visual Studio components. (#14313)
segment.target: Por favor consulta os [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) para unha listaxe específica de compoñentes de Visual Studio. (#14313)

segment.source: Added the following extension points:
segment.target: Engadidos os seguintes puntos de extensión:

segment.source: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)
segment.target: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)

segment.source: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (should be retrieved calling `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (debería recuperarse chamando `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: It is now possible to use plural forms in an add-on's translations. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)
segment.target: Agora é posible utilizar formas plurais nas traducións de complementos. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)

segment.source: Included python3.dll in the binary distribution for use by add-ons with external libraries utilizing the [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)
segment.target: Incluido python3.dll na distribución de binarios para usar por complementos con librerías externas utilizando a [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)

segment.source: The `BrailleDisplayDriver` base class now has `numRows` and `numCols` properties to provide information about multi line braille displays.
segment.target: A crase base `BrailleDisplayDriver` agora ten as propriedades `numRows` e `numCols` para proporcionar información sobre pantallas braille de varias liñas.

segment.source: Setting `numCells` is still supported for single line braille displays and `numCells` will return the total number of cells for multi line braille displays. (#15386)
segment.target: A configuración de `numCells` aínda está admitida para pantallas braille de unha soa liña e `numCells` devolverá o número total de celdas para pantallas braille de varias liñas. (#15386)

segment.source: Updated BrlAPI for BRLTTY to version 0.8.5, and its corresponding python module to a Python 3.11 compatible build. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Actualizado BrlAPI para BRLTTY á versión 0.8.5 e o seu correspondente módulo python á compilación compatible Python 3.11. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the `speech.speakSsml` function, which allows you to write NVDA speech sequences using [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Engadida a función `speech.speakSsml`, que che permite escrebir secuencias de voz de NVDA utilizando [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The following tags are currently supported and translated to appropriate NVDA speech commands:
segment.target: As seguintes etiquetas admítense actualmente e tradúcense ás ordes de voz apropriadas de NVDA:

segment.source: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` and `volume`). Only multiplication (e.g. `200%` are supported.
segment.target: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` e `volume`). só multiplicación (ex. `200%` se soporta.

segment.source: `say-as` with the `interpret` attribute set to `characters`
segment.target: `say-as` co atributo `interpret` configurado a `characters`

segment.source: `voice` with the `xml:lang` set to an XML language
segment.target: `voice` co `xml:lang` configurado a unha linguaxe XML

segment.source: `break` with the `time` attribute set to a value in milliseconds, e.g. `200ms`
segment.target: `break` co atributo `time` configurado a un valor en milésimas de segundo, ex. `200ms`

segment.source: `mark` with the `name` attribute set to a mark name, e.g. `mark1`, requires providing a callback
segment.target: `mark` co atributo `name` configurado a un nome de marca, ex. `mark1`, require proporcionar unha callback

segment.source: Example: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`
segment.target: Exemplo: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`

segment.source: The SSML parsing capabilities are backed by the `SsmlParser` class in the `speechXml` module.
segment.target: As funcións de análise sintáctico de SSML están respaldadas pola crase `SsmlParser` no módulo `speechXml`.

segment.source: Changes to the NVDA Controller Client library:
segment.target: Cambios para a librería NVDA Controller Client:

segment.source: The file names of the library no longer contain a suffix denoting the architecture, i.e. `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` are now called `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Os nomes de ficheiro da libraría xa non conteñen un sufixo denotando a arquitectura, é dicir, `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` agora chámase `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Engadido un exemplo para demostrar o uso de nvdaControllerClient.dll dende Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the following functions to the controller client: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Engadidas as seguintes funcións ao controller client: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: To get the process id (PID) of the current instance of NVDA the controller client is using.
segment.target: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: para obter o id de proceso (PID) da instancia actual que está utilizando o NVDA controller client.

segment.source: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: To instruct NVDA to speak according to the given SSML. This function also supports:
segment.target: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: para instruir ao NVDA que fale de acordo co SSML dado. Esta función tamén soporta:

segment.source: Providing the symbol level.
segment.target: Proporcionar o nivel de símbolos.

segment.source: Providing the priority of speech to be spoken.
segment.target: Proporcionar a prioridade da voz a seren falada.

segment.source: Speaking both synchronously (blocking) and asynchronously (instant return).
segment.target: Falar síncronamente (bloqueando) e asíncronamente (devolución instantánea).

segment.source: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: To register a callback of type `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` that is called in synchronous mode for every `<mark />` tag encountered in the SSML sequence provided to `nvdaController_speakSsml`.
segment.target: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: Para rexistrar unha chamada de tipo `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` eso chámase en modo síncrono para cada `<mark />` tag atopado na secuencia SSML proporcionada a `nvdaController_speakSsml`.

segment.source: Note: the new functions in the controller client only support NVDA 2024.1 and above.
segment.target: Nota: as funcións novas no controller client só soportan NVDA 2024.1 e posteriores.

segment.source: Updated `include` dependencies:
segment.target: Actualizadas dependencias `include`:

segment.source: w3c-aria-practices to `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)
segment.target: w3c-aria-practices a `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)

segment.source: Device info yielded by `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` now contain the bus reported description of the USB device (key `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Información do dispositivo por `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` agora contén o bus que anuncia a descripción do dispositivo USB (key `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: For USB serial devices, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` and `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` now yield device matches containing a `deviceInfo` dictionary enriched with data about the USB device, such as `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Para dispositivos USB serie, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` e `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` agora produce coincidencias de dispositivo que conteñen un diccionario `deviceInfo` enriquecido con datos sobre o dispositivo USB, como `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: When the configuration file `nvda.ini` is corrupted, a backup copy is saved before it is reinitialized. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Cando o ficheiro de configuración `nvda.ini` está corrompido, gárdase unha copia de seguridade antes de reiniciarse. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the `speakOnDemand` boolean argument can be specified to control if a script should speak while in "on-demand" speech mode. (#481, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Cando se define un script co decorador de script, o argumento booleano `speakOnDemand` pode especificarse para controlar se un script debería falar mentres se estea no modo de voz "baixo demanda". (#481, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Scripts that provide information (e.g. say window title, report time/date) should speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Os Scripts que proporcionan información (ex. dicir título de xanela, anunciar hora/data) deberían falar no modo de voz "baixo demanda".

segment.source: Scripts that perform an action (e.g. move the cursor, change a parameter) should not speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Os Scripts que realicen unha ación (ex. mover o cursor, cambiar un parámetro) non deberían falarse no modo "baixo demanda".

segment.source: Fixed bug where deleting git-tracked files during `scons -c` resulted in missing UIA COM interfaces on rebuild. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo onde ao eliminar ficheiros git-tracked durante `scons -c` resultaba en falta de interfaces UIA COM ao recompilar. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Fix a bug where some code changes were not detected when building `dist`, that prevented a new build from being triggered.
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo onde algúns cambios de código non se detectaban ao compilar `dist`, o que impedía que se activara unha nova compilación.

segment.source: Now `dist` always rebuilds. (#13372, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Agora `dist` sempre recompila. (#13372, @hwf1324)

segment.source: A `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` with default type of standard, no longer throws a None conversion exception because no sound is assigned. (#16223, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Un `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` cun tipo predeterminado de estándar, xa non lanza unha excepción de conversión none porque non se asignara ningún son. (#16223, @XLTechie)

segment.source: API Breaking Changes
segment.target: Cambios que Rompen a API

segment.source: These are breaking API changes.
segment.target: Estos son os cambios que rompen a API.

segment.source: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.
segment.target: Por favor abre un GitHub issue si o teu complemento ten un problema coa actualización á nova API.

segment.source: NVDA is now built with Python 3.11. (#12064)
segment.target: NVDA agora compílase con Python 3.11. (#12064)

segment.source: Updated pip dependencies:
segment.target: Actualizadas as dependencias pip:

segment.source: configobj to 5.1.0dev commit `e2ba4457c4651fa54f8d59d8dcdd3da950e956b8`. (#15544)
segment.target: configobj a 5.1.0dev commit `e2ba4457c4651fa54f8d59d8dcdd3da950e956b8`. (#15544)

segment.source: Comtypes to 1.2.0. (#15513, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Comtypes a 1.2.0. (#15513, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Flake8 to 4.0.1. (#15636, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Flake8 a 4.0.1. (#15636, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: py2exe to 0.13.0.1dev commit `4e7b2b2c60face592e67cb1bc935172a20fa371d`. (#15544)
segment.target: py2exe a 0.13.0.1dev commit `4e7b2b2c60face592e67cb1bc935172a20fa371d`. (#15544)

segment.source: robotframework to 6.1.1. (#15544)
segment.target: robotframework a 6.1.1. (#15544)

segment.source: SCons to 4.5.2. (#15529, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: SCons a 4.5.2. (#15529, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Removed pip dependencies:
segment.target: Dependencias pip eliminadas:

segment.source: typing_extensions, these should be supported natively in Python 3.11 (#15544)
segment.target: typing_extensions, estas soportaríase nativamente en Python 3.11 (#15544)

segment.source: nose, instead unittest-xml-reporting is used to generate XML reports. (#15544)
segment.target: nota, a cambio úsase unittest-xml-reporting para xerar informes XML. (#15544)

segment.source: `IAccessibleHandler.SecureDesktopNVDAObject` has been removed.
segment.target: `IAccessibleHandler.SecureDesktopNVDAObject` eliminouse.

segment.source: Instead, when NVDA is running on the user profile, track the existence of the secure desktop with the extension point: `winAPI.secureDesktop.post_secureDesktopStateChange`. (#14488)
segment.target: A cambio, cando o NVDA está en execución no perfil de usuario, rastrea a existencia do escritorio seguro co punto de extensión: `winAPI.secureDesktop.post_secureDesktopStateChange`. (#14488)

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` has been removed with no public replacement. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` eliminouse sen remprazo público. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices and bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been removed.
segment.target: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices e bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` borráronse.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` class method instead.
segment.target: Os controladores de pantallas braille deberían implementar o método da crase `registerAutomaticDetection` a cambio.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ese método recibe un obxecto `DriverRegistrar` no que os métodos `addUsbDevices` e `addBluetoothDevices` poden usarse. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` now requires both the `threadSafe` and `supportsAutomaticDetection` attributes to be set to `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: A implementación predeterminada do método de comprobación en `BrailleDisplayDriver` agora require que os atributos `threadSafe` e `supportsAutomaticDetection` estean configurados a `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is no longer possible, as functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Pasar funciones lambda a `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` xa non é posible, xa que as funcións deberían ser débilmente referenciables. (#14627, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` has been removed. (#14924, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` foi eliminada. (#14924, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: To support capital pitch changes, synthesizers must now explicitly declare their support for the `PitchCommand` in the `supportedCommands` attribute on the driver. (#15433, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Para admitir cambios de tons para maiúsculas, os sintetizadores deben declarar agora explícitamente a súa compatibilidade con `PitchCommand` no atributo `supportedCommands` no controlador. (#15433, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars` has been removed. Use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead of `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath`. (#15614, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars` eliminouse. Utiliza `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` a cambio de `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath`. (#15614, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: `languageHandler.makeNpgettext` and `languageHandler.makePgettext` have been removed.
segment.target: `languageHandler.makeNpgettext` e `languageHandler.makePgettext` elimináronse.

segment.source: `npgettext` and `pgettext` are supported natively now. (#15546)
segment.target: `npgettext` e `pgettext` agora sopórtanse nativamente. (#15546)

segment.source: The app module for [Poedit](https://poedit.net) has been changed significantly. The `fetchObject` function has been removed. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O app module para [Poedit](https://poedit.net) foi cambiado significativamente. A función `fetchObject` function eliminouse. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)

segment.target: `PCWSTR`

segment.target: `gui.addonGui.AddonsDialog` eliminouse. (#15834)

segment.target: `touchHandler.TouchInputGesture.multiFingerActionLabel` eliminouse sen remprazo. (#15864, @CyrilleB79)

segment.target: `NVDAObjects.IAccessible.winword.WordDocument.script_reportCurrentHeaders` eliminouse sen remprazo. (#15904, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescencias

segment.source: Using `watchdog.getFormattedStacksForAllThreads` is deprecated - please use `logHandler.getFormattedStacksForAllThreads` instead. (#15616, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Utilizar `watchdog.getFormattedStacksForAllThreads` está obsoleto - por favor utiliza `logHandler.getFormattedStacksForAllThreads` a cambio. (#15616, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.canConfigTerminateOnDesktopSwitch` has been deprecated, as it became obsolete since Windows 7 is no longer supported. (#15644, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.canConfigTerminateOnDesktopSwitch` quedou obsoleto, xa que quedou obsoleto ao se rematar o soporte de Windows 7. (#15644, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `winVersion.isFullScreenMagnificationAvailable` has been deprecated - use `visionEnhancementProviders.screenCurtain.ScreenCurtainProvider.canStart` instead. (#15664, @josephsl)
segment.target: `winVersion.isFullScreenMagnificationAvailable` quedou obsoleto - utiliza `visionEnhancementProviders.screenCurtain.ScreenCurtainProvider.canStart` a cambio. (#15664, @josephsl)

segment.source: The following Windows release constants has been deprecated from winVersion module (#15647, @josephsl):
segment.target: As seguintes constantes de versión de Windows quedaron obsoletas do módulo winVersion (#15647, @josephsl):

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN7`
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN7`

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN7_SP1`
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN7_SP1`

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN8`
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN8`

segment.source: The `bdDetect.KEY_*` constants have been deprecated.
segment.target: As constantes `bdDetect.KEY_*` quedaron obsoletas.

segment.source: Use `bdDetect.DeviceType.*` instead. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: Utiliza `bdDetect.DeviceType.*` a cambio. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: The `bdDetect.DETECT_USB` and `bdDetect.DETECT_BLUETOOTH` constants have been deprecated with no public replacement. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: As constantes `bdDetect.DETECT_USB` e `bdDetect.DETECT_BLUETOOTH` quedaron obsoletas sen remprazo público. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: Using `gui.ExecAndPump` is deprecated - please use `systemUtils.ExecAndPump` instead. (#15852, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Utilizar `gui.ExecAndPump` está obsoleto - por favor usa `systemUtils.ExecAndPump` a cambio. (#15852, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue and installer issue.
segment.target: Este é un parche para arranxar un fallo de seguridade e un fallo do instalador.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor comunica responsablemente os problemas de seguridade seguindo as [políticas de seguridade do NVDA](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de segruridade

segment.source: Prevents loading custom configuration while secure mode is forced.
segment.target: Evita cargar a configuración persoalizada mentres se forza o modo seguro .

segment.source: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))
segment.target: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Fallos

segment.source: Fixed bug which caused the NVDA process to fail to exit correctly. (#16123)
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo que provocaba que o proceso de NVDA fallase ao non saír correctamente.

segment.source: Fixed bug where if the previous NVDA process failed to exit correctly, an NVDA installation could fail to an unrecoverable state. (#16122)
segment.target: Arránxase un erro onde Ao se executar o instalador, provocaba que a instalación entrase nun estado irrecuperable. (#16122, #16123)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Trátase dun parche para solucionar un problema de seguridade.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor revela responsablemente os problemas de seguridade seguindo as [políticas de seguridade](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md) do NVDA.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de seguridade

segment.source: Prevents possible reflected XSS attack from crafted content to cause arbitrary code execution.
segment.target: Evita un posible ataque XSS reflectido a partir de contido crafteado para provocar a execución de código arbitrario.

segment.source: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))
segment.target: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Trátase dun parche para solucionar un problema de seguridade.

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: O parche de seguridade en 2023.3.1 non se resolveu correctamente.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor revela responsablemente os problemas de seguridade seguindo as [políticas de seguridade](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md) do NVDA.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de Seguridade

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: O parche de seguridade en 2023.3.1 non se resolveu correctamente.

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Evita o posible acceso ao sistema e a execución de código arbitrario con privilexios do sistema para usuarios non autenticados..

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Trátase dun parche para solucionar un problema de seguridade.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor revela responsablemente os problemas de seguridade seguindo as [políticas de seguridade](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md) do NVDA.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de Seguridade

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Evita o posible acceso ao sistema e a execución de código arbitrario con privilexios do sistema para usuarios non autenticados.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This release includes improvements to performance, responsiveness and stability of audio output.
segment.target: Esta versión inclúe melloras no rendemento, a resposta e a estabilidade da saída de audio.

segment.source: Options have been added to control the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps, or to have them follow the volume of the voice you are using.
segment.target: Engadíronse opcións para controlar o volume dos sons e pitidos do NVDA, ou para telos seguindo ao volume da voz que esteas a usar.

segment.source: NVDA can now periodically refresh OCR results, speaking new text as it appears.
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode refrescar periódicamente os resultados do OCR, falando o texto novo según apareza.

segment.source: This can be configured in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Esto pode configurarse na categoría de OCR de Windows do diálogo opcións de NVDA.

segment.source: There's been several braille fixes, improving device detection and caret movement.
segment.target: Realizáronse varios arranxos no braille, mellorando a detección de dispositivos, e no movemento do cursor.

segment.source: It is now possible to opt-out unwanted drivers from automatic detection, to improve autodetection performance.
segment.target: Agora é posible excluir controladores non desexados da detección automática para mellorar o rendemento da autodetección.

segment.source: There are also new BRLTTY commands.
segment.target: Tamén hai novas ordes para BRLTTY.

segment.source: There's also been bug fixes for the Add-on Store, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Edge context menus, and Windows Calculator.
segment.target: Tamén se arranxaron erros na tenda de complementos, en Microsoft Office, nos menús de contexto de Microsoft Edge, e na calculadora de Windows.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Mellorada a xestión do son:

segment.source: A new Audio Settings panel:
segment.target: Un novo panel de opcións de Audio:

segment.source: This can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`. (#15497)
segment.target: Este pode abrirse con `NVDA+control+u`. (#15497)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Unha opción para facer que o volume dos sons e pitidos do NVDA siga á configuración do volúme da voz que esteas a usar. (#1409)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Unha opción para configurar por separado o volume dos sons do NVDA. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: The settings to change audio output device and toggle audio ducking have been moved to the new Audio settings panel from the Select Synthesizer dialog.
segment.target: As opcións para cambiar o dispositivo de audio e conmutar a atenuación de audio movéronse ao novo diálogo Opcións de audio do diálogo Selecionar Sintetizador.

segment.source: These options will be removed from the "select synthesizer" dialog in 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)
segment.target: Estas opcións borraranse do diálogo "selecionar Sintetizador" en 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)

segment.source: NVDA will now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)
segment.target: O NVDA agora sacará o audio a través da Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), o que pode mellorar a resposta, o rendemento e a estabilidade da fala e dos sons do NVDA. (#14697)

segment.source: Note: WASAPI is incompatible with some add-ons.
segment.target: Nota: WASAPI é incompatible con algúns complementos.

segment.source: Compatible updates are available for these add-ons, please update them before updating NVDA.
segment.target: Hai actualizacións compatibles dispoñibles para estos complementos, por favor actualízaos antes de actualizar o NVDA.

segment.source: Incompatible versions of these add-ons will be disabled when updating NVDA:
segment.target: As versións incompatibles destos complementos desactivaranse ao se actualizar o NVDA:

segment.source: Tony's Enhancements version 1.15 or older. (#15402)
segment.target: Tony's Enhancements versión 1.15 ou anteriores. (#15402)

segment.source: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 or older. (#15443)
segment.target: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 ou anteriores. (#15443)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to continually update the result when performing optical character recognition (OCR), speaking new text as it appears. (#2797)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode actualizar continuamente o resultado ao realizar o recoñecemento óptico de caracteres (OCR), falando o texto novo según apareza. (#2797)

segment.source: To enable this functionality, enable the option "Periodically refresh recognized content" in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Para habilitar esta funcionalidade, activa a opción "Refrescar periódicamente ol contido recoñecido" na categoría OCR de Windows do diálogo de opcións do NVDA.

segment.source: Once enabled, you can toggle speaking new text by toggling report dynamic content changes (pressing `NVDA+5`).
segment.target: Unha vez habilitado, podes conmutar a fala de texto novo activando anunciar cambios de contido dinámico (premendo `NVDA+5`).

segment.source: When using automatic detection of braille displays, it is now possible to opt-out drivers from detection from the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Ao usar a deteción automática de pantallas braille, agora é posible excluir os controladores da detección do diálogo de seleción de pantalla braille. (#15196)

segment.source: A new option in Document Formatting settings, "Ignore blank lines for line indentation reporting". (#13394)
segment.target: Unha nova opción nas opcións de Formateado de Documentos, "Ignorar liñas en branco para o anunciado de sangría de liña". (#13394)

segment.source: Added an unassigned gesture to navigate by tab groupings in browse mode. (#15046)
segment.target: Engadiuse un xesto sin asignar para navegar por grupos de pestanas en modo exploración. (#15046)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: When the text in a terminal changes without updating the caret, the text on a braille display will now properly update when positioned on a changed line.
segment.target: Cando o texto nunha terminal cambia sen actualizar o cursor do sistema, o texto nunha pantalla braille agora actualizarase correctamente ao situarse sobre unha liña que cambiara.

segment.source: This includes situations where braille is tethered to review. (#15115)
segment.target: Esto inclúe situacións onde o braille estea seguindo á revisión. (#15115)

segment.source: More BRLTTY key bindings are now mapped to NVDA commands (#6483):
segment.target: Máis combinacións de teclas para BRLTTY están asignadas agora a ordes do NVDA (#6483):

segment.source: `learn`: toggle NVDA input help
segment.target: `learn`: conmuta a axuda de entrada do NVDA

segment.source: `prefmenu`: open the NVDA menu
segment.target: `prefmenu`: abre o menú do NVDA

segment.source: `prefload`/`prefsave`: Load/save NVDA configuration
segment.target: `prefload` e `prefsave`: carga e garda a configuración do NVDA

segment.source: `time`: Show time
segment.target: `time`: amosa a hora

segment.source: `say_line`: Speak the current line where the review cursor is located
segment.target: `say_line`: fala a liña actual onde estea colocado o cursor de revisión

segment.source: `say_below`: Say all using review cursor
segment.target: `say_below`: le todo usando o cursor de revisión

segment.source: The BRLTTY driver is only available when a BRLTTY instance with BrlAPI enabled is running. (#15335)
segment.target: O controlador BRLTTY só está dispoñible cando estea en execución unha instancia BRLTTY con BrlAPI habilitado. (#15335)

segment.source: The advanced setting to enable support for HID braille has been removed in favor of a new option.
segment.target: Borrouse a configuración avanzada para habilitar a compatibilidade con HID braille en favor dunha nova opción.

segment.source: You can now disable specific drivers for braille display auto detection in the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Agora podes desactivar a auto detección de controladores específicos para pantallas braille no diálogo de seleción de pantalla braille. (#15196)

segment.source: Add-on Store: Installed add-ons will now be listed in the Available Add-ons tab, if they are available in the store. (#15374)
segment.target: Tenda de complementos: os complementos instalados agora enumeraranse na pestana Complementos Dispoñibles, se aínda están dispoñibles na tenda. (#15374)

segment.source: Some shortcut keys have been updated in the NVDA menu. (#15364)
segment.target: Algúns atallos de teclado actualizáronse no menú NVDA. (#15364)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: Fixed crash in Microsoft Word when Document formatting options "report headings" and "report comments and notes" were not enabled. (#15019)
segment.target: Arranxo dun fallo en Microsoft Word cando as opcións de formateado de documentos "anunciar cabeceiras" e "anunciar comentarios e notas" non estaban activadas. (#15019)

segment.source: In Word and Excel, text alignment will be correctly reported in more situations. (#15206, #15220)
segment.target: En Word e Excel, a aliñación de texto anunciarase correctamente en máis situacións. (#15206, #15220)

segment.source: Fixes the announcement of some cell formatting shortcuts in Excel. (#15527)
segment.target: Arranxo do anunciado de algúns atallos de formato de celda en Excel. (#15527)

segment.source: Microsoft Edge:
segment.target: Microsoft Edge:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer jump back to the last browse mode position when opening the context menu in Microsoft Edge. (#15309)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non voltará á última posición do modo exploración ao se abrir o menú de contexto en Microsoft Edge. (#15309)

segment.source: NVDA is once again able to read context menus of downloads in Microsoft Edge. (#14916)
segment.target: O NVDA volta a ser capaz de ler menús de contexto de descargas en Microsoft Edge. (#14916)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: The braille cursor and selection indicators will now always be updated correctly after showing or hiding respective indicators with a gesture. (#15115)
segment.target: O cursor braille e os indicadores de seleción agora sempre se actualizan correctamente despois de amosar ou agochar os indicadores respectivos cun xesto. (#15115)

segment.source: Fixed bug where Albatross braille displays try to initialize although another braille device has been connected. (#15226)
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo onde as pantallas braille Albatross tentan inicializarse aíndaque outro dispositivo braille fora conectado. (#15226)

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Tenda de Complementos:

segment.source: Fixed bug where unchecking "include incompatible add-ons" would result in incompatible add-ons still being listed in the store. (#15411)
segment.target: Arranxado un erro onde ao desmarcar "incluir complementos incompatibles" provocaría que os complementos incompatibles seguiran aparecendo na tenda. (#15411)

segment.source: Add-ons blocked due to compatibility reasons should now be filtered correctly when toggling the filter for enabled/disabled status. (#15416)
segment.target: Os complementos bloqueados debido a razóns de compatibilidade agora deberían filtrarse correctamente ao conmutar o filtro por estado habilitado e deshabilitado. (#15416)

segment.source: Fixed bug preventing overridden enabled incompatible add-ons being upgraded or replaced using the external install tool. (#15417)
segment.target: Arranxado un erro que evita que se actualicen ou substitúan complementos incompatibles instalados e habilitados mediante a ferramenta de instalación externa. (#15417)

segment.source: Fixed bug where NVDA would not speak until restarted after add-on installation. (#14525)
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo onde NVDA non falaría ate que se reiniciase despois da instalación de un complemento. (#14525)

segment.source: Fixed bug where add-ons cannot be installed if a previous download failed or was cancelled. (#15469)
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo onde os complementos non poden instalarse se fallou ou se se cancelou unha descarga anterior. (#15469)

segment.source: Fixed issues with handling incompatible add-ons when upgrading NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)
segment.target: Arranxados problemas co manexo de complementos imcompatibles ao se actualizar o NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)

segment.source: NVDA once again announces calculation results in the Windows 32bit calculator on Server, LTSC and LTSB versions of Windows. (#15230)
segment.target: O NVDA volta a anunciar os resultados de cálculo na calculadora de Windows 32bit nas versións Server, LTSC e LTSB de Windows. (#15284)

segment.source: NVDA no longer ignores focus changes when a nested window (grand child window) gets focus. (#15432)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non ignora os cambios do foco cando unha xanela anidada (xanela filla) obtén o foco. (#15432)

segment.source: Fixed a potential cause of crashing during NVDA startup. (#15517)
segment.target: Arranxouse unha posible causa de bloqueo durante o arranque do NVDA. (#15517)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Por favor consulta [a guía do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para información sobre o proceso de obsolescencia e eliminación da API do NVDA.

segment.source: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` and `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` have been changed in order not to update instantly.
segment.target: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` e `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` foron cambiadas para non actualizar instantáneamente.

segment.source: Before this change, when either of these methods was called very often, this would drain many resources.
segment.target: Antes deste cambio, cando se chamaba a calquera destos métodos con moita frecuencia, esto consumiría moitos recursos.

segment.source: These methods now queue an update at the end of every core cycle instead.
segment.target: Estos métodos agora poñen en cola unha actualización ao remate de cada ciclo do núcleo a cambio.

segment.source: They should also be thread safe, making it possible to call them from background threads. (#15163)
segment.target: Tamén deberían seren seguros para os fíos, facendo posible chamalos dende fíos en segundo plano. (#15163)

segment.source: Added official support to register custom braille display drivers in the automatic braille display detection process.
segment.target: Engadiuse o soporte oficial para rexistrar controladores persoalizados de pantallas braille no proceso de deteción automática de pantallas braille.

segment.source: Consult the `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` class documentation for more details.
segment.target: Consulta a documentación da clase `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` para máis detalles.

segment.source: Most notably, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` and the `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod` must be implemented. (#15196)
segment.target: En particular, o atributo `supportsAutomaticDetection` debe ter o valor `True` e debe implementarse o método `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod`. (#15196)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescencias

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` is now deprecated with no public replacement.
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` está obsoleto e non ten substituto público.

segment.source: It will be removed in 2024.1. (#15163)
segment.target: Borrarase en 2024.1. (#15163)

segment.source: Importing the constants `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` from `NVDAObjects.window.excel` is deprecated.
segment.target: Importar as constantes `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` dende `NVDAObjects.window.excel` está obsoleto.

segment.source: Use `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Usa as enumeracións `XlHAlign` ou `XlVAlign` a cambio. (#15205)

segment.source: The mapping `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` is deprecated.
segment.target: A asignación `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` está obsoleta.

segment.source: Use the `displayString` methods of `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Usa os métodos `displayString` das enumeracións `XlHAlign` ou `XlVAlign` a cambio. (#15205)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` and `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been deprecated.
segment.target: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` e `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` están obsoletas.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` classmethod instead.
segment.target: Os controladores de pantallas Braille deberían implementar o método de clase `registerAutomaticDetection` a cambio.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200)
segment.target: Ese método recibe un obxecto `DriverRegistrar` en cuxos métodos `addUsbDevices` e`addBluetoothDevices` poden usarse. (#15200)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` uses `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` for devices that are marked as thread safe.
segment.target: A implementación predeterminada do método de comprobación en `BrailleDisplayDriver` usa `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` para os dispositivos que están marcados como fío seguro.

segment.source: Starting from NVDA 2024.1, in order for the base method to use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` as well. (#15200)
segment.target: A partir de NVDA 2024.1, para que o método base use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, o atributo `supportsAutomaticDetection` tamén debe ter o valor `True`. (#15200)

segment.source: This release introduces the Add-on Store to replace the Add-ons Manager.
segment.target: Esta versión introduce a Tenda de Complementos para remprazar o Administrador de Complementos.

segment.source: In the Add-on Store you can browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: Na Tenda de Complementos podes explorar, buscar, instalar e actualizar complementos da comunidade.

segment.source: You can now manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons at your own risk.
segment.target: Tamén podes anular manualmente problemas de incompatibilidade con complementos desactualizados baixo a túa propria responsabilidade.

segment.source: There are new braille features, commands, and display support.
segment.target: Hai novas características, ordes e soporte para pantallas braille.

segment.source: There are also new input gestures for OCR and flattened object navigation.
segment.target: Tamén hai novos xestos de entrada para o OCR e para a navegación cha de obxectos.

segment.source: Navigating and reporting formatting in Microsoft Office is improved.
segment.target: Mellorouse a navegación e o anunciado do formato en Microsoft Office.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, particularly for braille, Microsoft Office, web browsers and Windows 11.
segment.target: Hai moitos máis fallos arranxados, particularmente para o braille, Microsoft Office, navegadores web e Windows 11.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: Actualizáronse eSpeak-NG, o transcriptor braille Liblouis e Unicode CLDR.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Add-on Store has been added to NVDA. (#13985)
segment.target: Engadiuse a Tenda de Complementos ao NVDA. (#13985)

segment.source: Browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: Explorar, procurar, instalar e actualizar complementos da comunidade.

segment.source: Manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons.
segment.target: Anular manualmente os problemas de compatibilidade con complementos obsoletos.

segment.source: The Add-ons Manager has been removed and replaced by the Add-on Store.
segment.target: O Xestor de Complementos eliminouse e remprazouse pola tenda de Complementos.

segment.source: For more information please read the updated user guide.
segment.target: Para máis información le por favor a Guía do usuario actualizada.

segment.source: New input gestures:
segment.target: Novos xestos de entrada:

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the available languages for Windows OCR. (#13036)
segment.target: Un xesto non asignado para percorrer as linguas dispoñibles para o OCR de Windows. (#13036)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the braille show messages modes. (#14864)
segment.target: Un xesto non asignado para percorrer os modos de amosado de mensaxes braille. (#14864)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to toggle showing the selection indicator for braille. (#14948)
segment.target: Un Xesto non asignado para conmutar o amosado do indicador de seleción en braille. (#14948)

segment.source: Added default keyboard gesture assignments to move to the next or previous object in a flattened view of the object hierarchy. (#15053)
segment.target: Engadíronse asignacións para xestos de teclado predeterminados para desprazarse aos obxectos seguintes ou anteriores nunha vista cha da xerarquía de obxectos. (#15053)

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+numpad9` and `NVDA+numpad3` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: Escritorio: `NVDA+9 teclado numérico` e `NVDA+3 teclado numérico` para desprazarse aos obxectos anterior e seguinte respectivamente.

segment.source: Laptop: `shift+NVDA+[` and `shift+NVDA+]` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: Portátil: `shift+NVDA+[` e `shift+NVDA+]` para desprazarse aos obxectos anterior e seguinte respectivamente.

segment.source: New braille features:
segment.target: Novas características Braille:

segment.source: Added support for the Help Tech Activator braille display. (#14917)
segment.target: Engadiuse o soporte para o activador Help Tech de pantallas Braille. (#14917)

segment.source: A new option to toggle showing the selection indicator (dots 7 and 8). (#14948)
segment.target: Unha opción nova para conmutar o amosado do indicador de seleción (puntos 7 e 8). (#14948)

segment.source: A new option to optionally move the system caret or focus when changing the review cursor position with braille routing keys. (#14885, #3166)
segment.target: Unha opción nova para mover o cursor do sistema ou o foco opcionalmente cando se cambie a posición do cursor de revisión cos sensores Braille. (#14885, #3166)

segment.source: When pressing `numpad2` three times to report the numerical value of the character at the position of the review cursor, the information is now also provided in braille. (#14826)
segment.target: Ao se premer o `2 teclado numérico` tres veces para anunciar o valor numérico do carácter na posición do cursor de revisión, a información agora tamén se proporciona en Braille. (#14826)

segment.source: Added support for the `aria-brailleroledescription` ARIA 1.3 attribute, allowing web authors to override the type of an element shown on the braille display. (#14748)
segment.target: Engadiuse o soporte para o atributo ARIA 1.3 `aria-brailleroledescription` , permitindo aos autores web anular o tipo dun elemento amosado na pantalla Braille. (#14748)

segment.source: Baum braille driver: added several braille chord gestures for performing common keyboard commands such as `windows+d` and `alt+tab`.
segment.target: Controlador de Baum Braille: engadíronse varios xestos cor Braille para realizar ordes comúns de teclado como `windows+d` e `alt+tab`.

segment.source: Please refer to the NVDA User Guide for a full list. (#14714)
segment.target: Por favor consulta a Guía do Usuario do NVDA para unha listaxe compreta. (#14714)

segment.source: Added pronunciation of Unicode symbols:
segment.target: Engadiuse a pronunciación de símbolos Unicode:

segment.source: braille symbols such as `⠐⠣⠃⠗⠇⠐⠜`. (#13778)
segment.target: símbolos braille como `⠐⠣⠃⠗⠇⠐⠜`. (#14548)

segment.source: Mac Option key symbol `⌥`. (#14682)
segment.target: O símbolo da tecla Opción do Mac `⌥`. (#14682)

segment.source: Added gestures for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross braille displays. (#14844, #15002)
segment.target: Engadíronse xestos para pantallas braille Tivomatic Caiku Albatross. (#14844, #15002)

segment.source: showing the braille settings dialog
segment.target: amosar o diálogo de opcións braille

segment.source: accessing the status bar
segment.target: acesar á barra de estado

segment.source: cycling the braille cursor shape
segment.target: percorrer as formas do cursor braille

segment.source: cycling the braille show messages mode
segment.target: percorrer os modos de amosado de mensaxes braille

segment.source: toggling the braille cursor on/off
segment.target: activar e desactivar o cursor braille

segment.source: toggling the "braille show selection indicator" state
segment.target: conmutar o amosado do estado do indicador de seleción braille

segment.source: cycling the "braille move system caret when routing review cursor" mode. (#15122)
segment.target: percorrer os modos "braille move o cursor do sistema ao enrutar o cursor de revisión". (#15122)

segment.source: Microsoft Office features:
segment.target: Características de Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When highlighted text is enabled Document Formatting, highlight colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#7396, #12101, #5866)
segment.target: Cando o texto subliñado estea habilitado no formateado de documentos, agora anúncianse as cores de resaltado en Microsoft Word. (#7396, #12101, #5866)

segment.source: When colors are enabled Document Formatting, background colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#5866)
segment.target: Cando as cores estean habilitadas en formateado de documentos, as cores de fondo agora anúncianse en Microsoft Word. (#5866)

segment.source: When using Excel shortcuts to toggle format such as bold, italic, underline and strike through of a cell in Excel, the result is now reported. (#14923)
segment.target: Ao usar atallos de teclado de Excel para conmutar formato como negriña, cursiva, subliñado e tachado nunha celda, agora anúnciase o resultado. (#14923)

segment.source: Experimental enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Mellora experimental da xestión do son:

segment.source: NVDA can now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode sacar o audio a través da Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), a que pode mellorar a resposta, o rendemento e a estabilidade da voz e dos sons do NVDA. (#14697)

segment.source: WASAPI usage can be enabled in Advanced settings.
segment.target: O uso de WASAPI pode habilitarse nas opcións Avanzadas.

segment.source: Additionally, if WASAPI is enabled, the following Advanced settings can also be configured.
segment.target: Adicionalmente, se WASAPI está habilitado, tamén poden configurarse as seguintes opcións avanzadas.

segment.source: An option to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Unha opción para ter o volume dos sons e pitidos do NVDA seguindo á opción de volume da voz que esteas a usar. (#1409)

segment.source: An option to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Unha opción para configurar por separado o volume dos sons do NVDA. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: There is a known issue with intermittent crashing when WASAPI is enabled. (#15150)
segment.target: Hai un fallo coñecido cun conxelamento intermitente cando WASAPI está habilitado. (#15150)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, NVDA now reports when a control opens a dialog, grid, list or tree if the author has specified this using `aria-haspopup`. (#8235)
segment.target: En Mozilla Firefox e en Google Chrome, o NVDA agora anuncia cando un control abre un diálogo, unha grella, unha listaxe ou unha árbore se o autor especificou este uso de `aria-haspopup`. (#14709)

segment.source: It is now possible to use system variables (such as `%temp%` or `%homepath%`) in the path specification while creating portable copies of NVDA. (#14680)
segment.target: Agora é posible usar variables do sistema (como `%temp%` ou `%homepath%`) na especificación da ruta mentres se crean copias portables do NVDA. (#14680)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA can announce virtual desktop names when opening, changing, and closing them. (#5641)
segment.target: Na actualización Windows 10 May 2019 e posteriores, o NVDA pode anunciar os nomes dos escritorios virtuais ao abrilos, cambialos e pechalos. (#5641)

segment.source: A system wide parameter has been added to allow users and system administrators to force NVDA to start in secure mode. (#10018)
segment.target: Engadiuse un parámetro en todo o sistema para permitir aos usuarios e aos administradores do sistema forzar ao NVDA a arrancar en modo seguro. (#10018)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Actualizacións de compoñentes:

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)
segment.target: eSpeak NG actualizouse a 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille LibLouis a [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 43.0. (#14918)
segment.target: CLDR actualizouse á versión 43.0. (#14918)

segment.source: LibreOffice changes:
segment.target: Cambios para LibreOffice:

segment.source: When reporting the review cursor location, the current cursor/caret location is now reported relative to the current page in LibreOffice Writer 7.6 and newer, similar to what is done for Microsoft Word. (#11696)
segment.target: Ao anunciar a posición do cursor de revisión, a posición actual do cursor agora anúnciase relativa á páxina actual en LibreOffice Writer para versións de LibreOffice >= 7.6, de modo semellante ao que se fai para Microsoft Word. (#11696)

segment.source: Announcement of the status bar (e.g. triggered by `NVDA+end`) works for LibreOffice. (#11698)
segment.target: O anunciado da barra de estado (ex.: disparada por `NVDA+fin`) funciona para LibreOffice. (#11698)

segment.source: When moving to a different cell in LibreOffice Calc, NVDA no longer incorrectly announces the coordinates of the previously focused cell when cell coordinate announcement is disabled in NVDA's settings. (#15098)
segment.target: Ao desprazarse a unha celda diferente en LibreOffice Calc, o NVDA xa non anuncia incorrectamente as coordenadas da celda enfocada anteriormente cando o anunciado de coordenadas de celda estea deshabilitado nas opcións do NVDA. (#15098)

segment.source: Braille changes:
segment.target: Cambios braille:

segment.source: When using a braille display via the Standard HID braille driver, the dpad can be used to emulate the arrow keys and enter.
segment.target: Ao usar unha pantalla braille a través do controlador Standard HID braille, o dpad pode usarse para emular as frechas e o intro.

segment.source: Also `space+dot1` and `space+dot4` now map to up and down arrow respectively. (#14713)
segment.target: Tamén `espacio+punto1` e `espacio+punto4` agora asígnanse a frechas arriba e abaixo respectivamente. (#14713)

segment.source: Updates to dynamic web content (ARIA live regions) are now displayed in braille.
segment.target: As actualizacións para o contido web dinámico (rexións ARIA live) agora amósanse en braille.

segment.source: This can be disabled in the Advanced Settings panel. (#7756)
segment.target: Esto pode deshabilitarse no panel das opcións Avanzadas. (#7756)

segment.source: Dash and em-dash symbols will always be sent to the synthesizer. (#13830)
segment.target: Os símbolos guión e raia sempre se enviarán ao sintetizador. (#13830)

segment.source: Distance reported in Microsoft Word will now honour the unit defined in Word's advanced options even when using UIA to access Word documents. (#14542)
segment.target: A distancia anunciada en Microsoft Word agora respetará a unidade definida nas opcións avanzadas de Word, incluso cando se use UIA para acesar a documentos de Word. (#14542)

segment.source: NVDA responds faster when moving the cursor in edit controls. (#14708)
segment.target: O NVDA responde máis rápido ao mover o cursor en controis de edición. (#14708)

segment.source: Script for reporting the destination of a link now reports from the caret / focus position rather than the navigator object. (#14659)
segment.target: O script para anunciar o destiño dunha ligazón agora anuncia dende a posición do cursor do sistema oo do foco en cambio dende o navegador de obxectos. (#14659)

segment.source: Portable copy creation no longer requires that a drive letter be entered as part of the absolute path. (#14680)
segment.target: A creación da copia portable xa non require que se introduza unha letra de unidade como parte da ruta absoluta. (#14681)

segment.source: If Windows is configured to display seconds in the system tray clock, using `NVDA+f12` to report the time now honors that setting. (#14742)
segment.target: Se Windows se configura para amosar segundos no reloxo da bandexa do sistema, usar `NVDA+f12` para anunciar a hora agora fai caso a esa configuración. (#14742)

segment.source: NVDA will now report unlabeled groupings that have useful position information, such as in recent versions of Microsoft Office 365 menus. (#14878)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciará grupos sen etiquetar que teñan unha información de posición útil, coma nos menús en versións recentes de Microsoft Office 365. (#14878)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correción de Erros

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: Several stability fixes to input/output for braille displays, resulting in less frequent errors and crashes of NVDA. (#14627)
segment.target: Varias correcións de estabilidade de entrada/saída para pantallas braille, resultando en menos erros cotidiáns e conxelamentos do NVDA. (#14627)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer unnecessarily switch to no braille multiple times during auto detection, resulting in a cleaner log and less overhead. (#14524)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non cambia innecesariamente a sen braille moitas veces durante a autodetección, resultando nun rexistro máis limpo e menos consumo xeral. (#14524)

segment.source: NVDA will now switch back to USB if a HID Bluetooth device (such as the HumanWare Brailliant or APH Mantis) is automatically detected and an USB connection becomes available.
segment.target: O NVDA agora voltará ao USB se un dispositivo HID Bluetooth (como a HumanWare Brailliant ou a APH Mantis) se detecta automáticamente e unha conexión USB queda dispoñible.

segment.source: This only worked for Bluetooth Serial ports before. (#14524)
segment.target: Esto só funciona para portos serie Bluetooth antes. (#14524)

segment.source: When no braille display is connected and the braille viewer is closed by pressing `alt+f4` or clicking the close button, the display size of the braille subsystem will again be reset to no cells. (#15214)
segment.target: Cando a pantalla sen braille estea conectada e o visualizador braille estea pechado premendo `alt+f4` ou facento clic no botón pechar, o tamano da pantalla do subsistema braille reiniciarase de novo a sen celdas. (#15214)

segment.source: Web browsers:
segment.target: Navegadores Web:

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally causes Mozilla Firefox to crash or stop responding. (#14647)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non provoca ocasionalmente que Mozilla Firefox se conxele ou deixe de respostar. (#14647)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, typed characters are no longer reported in some text boxes even when speak typed characters is disabled. (#8442)
segment.target: En Mozilla Firefox e Google Chrome, os caracteres escrebidos xa non se anuncian nalgunhas caixas de texto cando falar caracteres ao se escreber estea desactivado. (#14666)

segment.source: You can now use browse mode in Chromium Embedded Controls where it was not possible previously. (#13493, #8553)
segment.target: Agora podes usar modo exploración en controis integrados de Chromium onde non era posible anteriormente. (#13493, #8553)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving the mouse over text after a link now reliably reports the text. (#9235)
segment.target: En Mozilla Firefox, mover o rato sobre o texto despois dun ligazón agora anuncia o texto de xeito fiable. (#9235)

segment.source: The destination of graphic links is now reported accurately in more cases in Chrome and Edge. (#14783)
segment.target: O destino dos ligazóns gráficos agora anúnciase corectamente en Chrome e en Edge. (#14779)

segment.source: When trying to report the URL for a link without a href attribute NVDA is no longer silent.
segment.target: Ao tentar anunciar a URL para un ligazón sen un atributo href o NVDA xa non queda en silenzo.

segment.source: Instead NVDA reports that the link has no destination. (#14723)
segment.target: A cambio o NVDA anuncia que o ligazón non ten destino. (#14723)

segment.source: In Browse mode, NVDA will no longer incorrectly ignore focus moving to a parent or child control e.g. moving from a control to its parent list item or gridcell. (#14611)
segment.target: En modo exploración, o NVDA xa non ignora incorrectamente o movemento do foco a un control pai ou fillo por exemplo moverse dende un control elemento de listaxe ao seu pai. (#14611)

segment.source: Note however that this fix only applies when the Automatically set focus to focusable elements" option in Browse Mode settings is turned off (which is the default).
segment.target: Ten en conta, sen embargo, que esta correción só se aplica cando a opción "Poñer automáticamente o foco en elementos enfocables" nas opcións de Modo exploración estea desactivada (o que é o predeterminado).

segment.source: Fixes for Windows 11:
segment.target: Arranxos para Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA can once again announce Notepad status bar contents. (#14573)
segment.target: O NVDA pode voltar a anunciar o contido da barra de estado do Notepad. (#14573)

segment.source: Switching between tabs will announce the new tab name and position for Notepad and File Explorer. (#14587, #14388)
segment.target: Ao cambiar entre pestanas anunciarase o nome da nova pestana e a posición para Notepad e para o Explorador de Arquivos. (#14587, #14388)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce candidate items when entering text in languages such as Chinese and Japanese. (#14509)
segment.target: O NVDA voltará a anunciar os elementos candidatos ao se introducir texto en linguas coma o Chinés e o Xaponés. (#14509)

segment.source: It is once again possible to open the Contributors and License items on the NVDA Help menu. (#14725)
segment.target: De novo é posible abrir os elementos Colaboradores e Licenza no menú axuda do NVDA. (#14725)

segment.source: Microsoft Office fixes:
segment.target: Arranxos para Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When rapidly moving through cells in Excel, NVDA is now less likely to report the wrong cell or selection. (#14983, #12200, #12108)
segment.target: Ao se desprazar rápidamente polas celdas en Excel, agora é menos probable que o NVDA anuncie a celda ou seleción incorrectas. (#14983, #12200, #12108)

segment.source: When landing on an Excel cell from outside a work sheet, braille and focus highlighter are no longer needlessly updated to the object that had focus previously. (#15136)
segment.target: Ao aterrizar nunha celda de Excel dende fora dunha folla de cálculo, o braille e o resaltador do foco xa non se actualizan innecesariamente ao obxecto que tiña o foco anteriormente. (#15136)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce focusing password fields in Microsoft Excel and Outlook. (#14839)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non falla ao anunciar campos de contrasinal enfocables en Microsoft Excel e en Outlook. (#14839)

segment.source: For symbols which do not have a symbol description in the current locale, the default English symbol level will be used. (#14558, #14417)
segment.target: Para símbolos que non teñan unha descripción de símbolo na lingua actual, usarase o nivel de símbolo en inglés. (#14558, #14417)

segment.source: It is now possible to use the backslash character in the replacement field of a dictionaries entry, when the type is not set to regular expression. (#14556)
segment.target: Agora é posible usar o carácter barra inversa no campo remprazar dunha entrada de diccionario, cando o tipo non se axusta como unha expresión regular. (#14556)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator, a portable copy of NVDA will no longer do nothing or play error tones when entering expressions in standard calculator in compact overlay mode. (#14679)
segment.target: Na calculadora de Windows 10 e 11, unha copia portable do NVDA xa non fará nada nin reproducirá tons de erro ao se introducir expresións na calculadora estándar no modo de superposición compacto. (#14679)

segment.source: NVDA again recovers from many more situations such as applications that stop responding which previously caused it to freeze completely. (#14759)
segment.target: O NVDA volta a recuperarse de moitas máis situacións, como aplicacións que deixan de respostar, que antes provocaban que se conxelara por completo. (#14759)

segment.source: When forcing UIA support with certain terminal and consoles, a bug is fixed which caused a freeze and the log file to be spammed. (#14689)
segment.target: Ao forzar a compatibilidade con UIA con determinadas terminales e consolas, aránxase un erro que provocaba a conxelación e o lixo no ficheiro de rexistro. (#14689)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer refuse to save the configuration after a configuration reset. (#13187)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non refusará gardar a configuración despois de que se reinicie unha configuración. (#13187)

segment.source: When running a temporary version from the launcher, NVDA will not mislead users into thinking they can save the configuration. (#14914)
segment.target: Ao se executar unha versión temporal dende un lanzador, o NVDA non enganará ao usuario facéndolle crer que pode gardar a configuración. (#14914)

segment.source: NVDA now generally responds slightly faster to commands and focus changes. (#14928)
segment.target: O NVDA agora responde xeralmente un pouco máis rápido ás ordes e aos cambios do foco. (#14928)

segment.source: Displaying the OCR settings will not fail on some systems anymore. (#15017)
segment.target: A visualización das opcións do OCR non fallará nalgúns sistemas nunca máis. (#15017)

segment.source: Fix bug related to saving and loading the NVDA configuration, including switching synthesizers. (#14760)
segment.target: Arránxase un fallo relacionado con gardar e cargar a configuración do NVDA, incluindo cambiar sintetizadores. (#14760)

segment.source: Fix bug causing text review "flick up" touch gesture to move pages rather than move to previous line. (#15127)
segment.target: Arránxase un fallo que facía que o xesto táctil de revisión de texto "flic arriba" movese páxinas en lugar de mover á liña anterior. (#15127)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Por favor, consulta [a Guía do Desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter información sobre o proceso de obsolescencia e de eliminación da API de NVDA.

segment.source: Suggested conventions have been added to the add-on manifest specification.
segment.target: Engadíronse convencións suxeridas á especificación do manifesto do complemento.

segment.source: These are optional for NVDA compatibility, but are encouraged or required for submitting to the Add-on Store. (#14754)
segment.target: Son opcionais para a compatibilidade co NVDA, pero recoméndanse ou esíxense para o envío á tenda de complementos.

segment.source: Use `lowerCamelCase` for the name field.
segment.target: Usar `lowerCamelCase` para o campo de nome.

segment.source: Use `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` format for the version field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Usar o formato `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` para o campo versión (requerido para o almacén de datos do complemento).

segment.source: Use `https://` as the schema for the url field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Usar `https://` como esquema para o campo url (requerido para o almacén de datos do complemento).

segment.source: Added a new extension point type called `Chain`, which can be used to iterate over iterables returned by registered handlers. (#14531)
segment.target: Engadiuse un novo tipo de punto de extensión chamado `Chain`, que pode usarse para iterar sobre iterables devoltos por manexadores rexistrados. (#14531)

segment.source: Added the `bdDetect.scanForDevices` extension point.
segment.target: Engadiuse o punto de extensión `bdDetect.scanForDevices`.

segment.source: Handlers can be registered that yield `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` pairs that don't fit in existing categories, like USB or Bluetooth. (#14531)
segment.target: Os manexadores pódense rexistrar para producir `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` pares que non encaixan en categorías existentes, como USB ou Bluetooth. (#14531)

segment.source: Added extension point: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)
segment.target: Endadiuse o punto de extensión: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)

segment.source: The NVDA Synth Settings Ring now caches available setting values the first time they're needed, rather than when loading the synthesizer. (#14704)
segment.target: O anel de opcións do sintetizador agora almacena en caché os valores de opcións dispoñibles a primeira vez que se necesitan, en lugar de facelo ao cargar o sintetizador. (#14704)

segment.source: You can now call the export method on a gesture map to export it to a dictionary.
segment.target: Agora pódese chamar ao método de exportación dun mapa de xestos para exportalo a un dicionario.

segment.source: This dictionary can be imported in another gesture by passing it either to the constructor of `GlobalGestureMap` or to the update method on an existing map. (#14582)
segment.target: Este dicionario pode importarse noutro xesto pasándoo ao constructor de `GlobalGestureMap` ou ao método update nun mapa existente. (#14582)

segment.source: `hwIo.base.IoBase` and its derivatives now have a new constructor parameter to take a `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.
segment.target: `hwIo.base.IoBase` e os seus derivados agora teñen un novo parámetro constructor para tomar un `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.

segment.source: If not provided, the default thread is used. (#14627)
segment.target: Se non se proporciona, úsase o fío predeterminado. (#14627)

segment.source: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` now has a `setWaitableTimer` method to set a waitable timer using a python function.
segment.target: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` agora ten un método `setWaitableTimer` para establecer un temporizador de espera usando unha función python.

segment.source: Similarly, the new `getCompletionRoutine` method allows you to convert a python method into a completion routine safely. (#14627)
segment.target: Do mesmo xeito, o novo método `getCompletionRoutine` permíteche converter un método python nunha rutina de finalización de xeito seguro. (#14627)

segment.source: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` should now always return `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` as expected for a subclass of `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)
segment.target: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` agora debería voltar sempre `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` como se esperaba para unha subclase de `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)

segment.source: `highlight-color` is now a format field attribute. (#14610)
