segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescencias

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` is deprecated and usage is discouraged. (#14047)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` está obsoleto e desaconséllase o seu uso. (#14047)

segment.source: `config.addConfigDirsToPythonPackagePath` has been moved.
segment.target: `config.addConfigDirsToPythonPackagePath` moveuse.

segment.source: Use `addonHandler.packaging.addDirsToPythonPackagePath` instead. (#14350)
segment.target: Usa `addonHandler.packaging.addDirsToPythonPackagePath` a cambio. (#14350)

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.TETHER_*` are deprecated.
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.TETHER_*` está obsoleto.

segment.source: Use `configFlags.TetherTo.*.value` instead. (#14233)
segment.target: Usa `configFlags.TetherTo.*.value` a cambio. (#14233)

segment.source: `utils.security.postSessionLockStateChanged` is deprecated.
segment.target: `utils.security.postSessionLockStateChanged` está obsoleta.

segment.source: Use `utils.security.post_sessionLockStateChanged` instead. (#14486)
segment.target: Usa `utils.security.post_sessionLockStateChanged` a cambio. (#14486)

segment.source: `NVDAObject.hasDetails`, `NVDAObject.detailsSummary`, `NVDAObject.detailsRole` has been deprecated.
segment.target: `NVDAObject.hasDetails`, `NVDAObject.detailsSummary`, `NVDAObject.detailsRole` están obsoletos.

segment.source: Use `NVDAObject.annotations` instead. (#14507)
segment.target: Usa `NVDAObject.annotations` a cambio. (#14507)

segment.source: `keyboardHandler.SUPPORTED_NVDA_MODIFIER_KEYS` is deprecated with no direct replacement.
segment.target: `keyboardHandler.SUPPORTED_NVDA_MODIFIER_KEYS` está obsoleta sen ningún remplazo directo.

segment.source: Consider using the class `config.configFlags.NVDAKey` instead. (#14528)
segment.target: Considera usar a clase `config.configFlags.NVDAKey` a cambio. (#14528)

segment.source: `gui.MainFrame.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` has been deprecated.
segment.target: `gui.MainFrame.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` quedou obsoleto.

segment.source: Use `gui.MainFrame.SysTrayIcon.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` instead. (#14523)
segment.target: Usa `gui.MainFrame.SysTrayIcon.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` a cambio. (#14523)

segment.source: This release includes several new key commands, including table say all commands.
segment.target: Esta versión inclúe varias teclas de ordes novas, incluíndo ordes para ler toda a táboa.

segment.source: A "Quick Start Guide" section has been added to the User Guide.
segment.target: Engadiuse unha seción "Guía de Inicio Rápido" á Guía do Usuario.

segment.source: There are also several bug fixes.
segment.target: Tamén hai varios arranxos de erros.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated and LibLouis has been updated.
segment.target: Actualizáronse eSpeak e LibLouis.

segment.source: There are new Chinese, Swedish, Luganda and Kinyarwanda braille tables.
segment.target: Hai novas táboas braille para Chinés, sueco, Luganda e Kinyarwanda.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Added a "Quick Start Guide" section to the User Guide. (#13934)
segment.target: Engadiuse unha seción "Guía de Inicio rápido" á Guía do Usuario. (#13934)

segment.source: Introduced a new command to check the keyboard shortcut of the current focus. (#13960)
segment.target: Introduciuse unha nova orde para procurar o atallo de teclado do foco actual. (#13960)

segment.source: Desktop: `shift+numpad2`.
segment.target: Escritorio: `shift+2 do teclado numérico`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+ctrl+shift+.`.
segment.target: Portátil: `NVDA+ctrl+shift+.`.

segment.source: Introduced new commands to move the review cursor by page where supported by the application. (#14021)
segment.target: Introducíronse novas ordes para mover o cursor de revisión por páxinas onde se admita pola aplicación. (#14021)

segment.source: Move to previous page:
segment.target: Mover á páxina anterior:

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+pageUp`.
segment.target: Escritorio: `NVDA+rePáx`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageUp`.
segment.target: Portátil: `NVDA+shift+rePáx`.

segment.source: Move to next page:
segment.target: Mover á páxina seguinte:

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+pageDown`.
segment.target: Escritorio: `NVDA+avPáx`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageDown`.
segment.target: Portátil: `NVDA+shift+avPáx`.

segment.source: Added the following table commands. (#14070)
segment.target: Engadíronse as seguintes ordes de táboa. (#14070)

segment.source: Say all in column: `NVDA+control+alt+downArrow`
segment.target: Falar todo na columna: `NVDA+control+alt+frechaAbaixo`

segment.source: Say all in row: `NVDA+control+alt+rightArrow`
segment.target: Falar todo na fila: `NVDA+control+alt+frechaDereita`

segment.source: Read entire column: `NVDA+control+alt+upArrow`
segment.target: Ler toda a columna: `NVDA+control+alt+frechaArriba`

segment.source: Read entire row: `NVDA+control+alt+leftArrow`
segment.target: Ler toda a fila: `NVDA+control+alt+FrechaEsquerda`

segment.source: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation: NVDA now announces when moving out of a table within a spreadsheet. (#14165)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel a través de UI Automation: NVDA agora anuncia cando se saia dunha táboa dentro dunha folla de cálculo. (#14165)

segment.source: Reporting table headers can now be configured separately for rows and columns. (#14075)
segment.target: Anunciar cabeceiras de táboa agora pode se configurar separadamente por filas e columnas. (#14075)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `735ecdb8`. (#14060, #14079, #14118, #14203)
segment.target: eSpeak NG actualizouse a 1.52-dev commit `735ecdb8`. (#14060, #14079, #14118, #14203)

segment.source: Fixed reporting of Latin characters when using Mandarin. (#12952, #13572, #14197)
segment.target: Arranxado o anunciado de caracteres latinos ao usar Mandarín. (#12952, #13572, #14197)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.23.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.23.0). (#14112)
segment.target: Actualizouse o transcriptor braille LibLouis a [3.23.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.23.0). (#14112)

segment.source: Added braille tables:
segment.target: Engadíronse táboas braille:

segment.source: Chinese common braille (simplified Chinese characters)
segment.target: Braille común chinés (caracteres de chinés simplificado)

segment.source: Kinyarwanda literary braille
segment.target: Braille literario Kinyarwanda

segment.source: Luganda literary braille
segment.target: Braille literario Luganda

segment.source: Swedish uncontracted braille
segment.target: Braille sueco sen contracción

segment.source: Swedish partially contracted braille
segment.target: Braille sueco parcialmente contraído

segment.source: Swedish contracted braille
segment.target: Braille sueco contraído

segment.source: Chinese (China, Mandarin) Current Braille System (no tones) (#14138)
segment.target: Chinés (China, Mandarín) Sistema braille actual (sen tons) (#14138)

segment.source: NVDA now includes the architecture of the operating system as part of user statistics tracking. (#14019)
segment.target: O NVDA agora inclúe a arquitectura do sistema operativo coma parte do seguemento de estadísticas de usuario. (#14019)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: When updating NVDA using the Windows Package Manager CLI (aka winget), a released version of NVDA is no longer always treated as newer than whatever alpha version is installed. (#12469)
segment.target: Ao actualizar o NVDA usando o Windows Package Manager CLI (aka winget), unha versión liberada do NVDA xa non se trata sempre coma unha versión máis moderna que calquera versión alfa que estea instalada. (#12469)

segment.source: NVDA will now correctly announce Group boxes in Java applications. (#13962)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciará correctamente caixas de grupo en aplicacións Java. (#13962)

segment.source: Caret properly follows spoken text during "say all" in applications such as Bookworm, WordPad, or the NVDA log viewer. (#13420, #9179)
segment.target: O cursor do sistema segue apropriadamente o texto falado durante "falar todo" en aplicacións coma Bookworm, WordPad, ou o visualizador do rexistro do NVDA. (#13420, #9179)

segment.source: In programs using UI Automation, partially checked checkboxes will be reported correctly. (#13975)
segment.target: En programas que usen UI Automation, as caixas de verificación parcialmente marcadas anunciaranse correctamente. (#13975)

segment.source: Improved performance and stability in Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Terminal, and other UI Automation based applications. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: Mellorado o rendemento e a estabilidade en Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Terminal e outras aplicacións baseadas en UI Automation. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: These fixes apply to Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (version 22H2) and later.
segment.target: Estos arranxos aplícanse a Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (versión 22H2) e posteriores.

segment.source: Selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes now enabled by default.
segment.target: O rexistro selectivo para eventos UI Automation e cambios de propiedade agora habilítase por omisión.

segment.source: Text reporting, Braille output, and password suppression now work as expected in the embedded Windows Terminal control in Visual Studio 2022. (#14194)
segment.target: O anunciado de texto, a saída Braille e a supresión de contrasinais agora funcionan coma se esperaba no control integrado da Terminal de Windows en Visual Studio 2022. (#14194)

segment.source: NVDA is now DPI aware when using multiple monitors.
segment.target: O NVDA agora é conscente dos DPI cando se usen varios monitores.

segment.source: There are several fixes for using a DPI setting higher than 100% or multiple monitors.
segment.target: Hai varios arranxos para usar unha configuración de DPI superior a 100% ou varios monitores.

segment.source: Issues may still exist with versions of Windows older than Windows 10 1809.
segment.target: Aínda poden seguir existindo problemas con versións de Windows máis vellas que Windows 10 1809.

segment.source: For these fixes to work, applications which NVDA interacts with also need to be DPI aware.
segment.target: Para que funcionen estos arranxos, as aplicacións coas que interactúe o NVDA tamén teñen que seren conscentes de DPI.

segment.source: Note there are still known issues with Chrome and Edge. (#13254)
segment.target: Ten en conta que aínda hai fallos coñecidos con Chrome e Edge. (#13254)

segment.source: Visual highlighting frames should now be correctly placed in most applications. (#13370, #3875, #12070)
segment.target: Os marcos de resaltado visual agora deberían se colocar correctamente na maioría das aplicacións. (#13370, #3875, #12070)

segment.source: Touch screen interaction should now be accurate for most applications. (#7083)
segment.target: A interacción coa pantalla táctil agora debería ser precisa para a maioría das aplicacións. (#7083)

segment.source: Mouse tracking should now work for most applications. (#6722)
segment.target: O seguemento do rato agora debería funcionar para a maioría das aplicacións. (#6722)

segment.source: Orientation state (landscape/portrait) changes are now correctly ignored when there is no change (e.g. monitor changes). (#14035)
segment.target: Os cambios do estado da orientación (apaisado ou vertical) agora ignóranse correctamente cando non hai cambio (ex. cambios do monitor). (#14035)

segment.source: NVDA will announce dragging items on screen in places such as rearranging Windows 10 Start menu tiles and virtual desktops in Windows 11. (#12271, #14081)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciará elementos arrastrables na pantalla en lugares coma na reorganización dos mosaicos do menú Inicio en Windows 10 e nos escritorios virtuais en Windows 11. (#12271, #14081)

segment.source: In advanced settings, "Play a sound for logged errors" option is now correctly restored to its default value when pressing the "Restore defaults" button. (#14149)
segment.target: Nas opcións avanzadas, a opción "reproducir un son para rexistro de erros" agora restáurase correctamente a este valor predeterminado ao premer o botón "Restaurar predeterminados". (#14149)

segment.source: NVDA can now select text using the `NVDA+f10` keyboard shortcut on Java applications. (#14163)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode selecionar texto usando o atallo de teclado `NVDA+f10` en aplicacións Java. (#14163)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer get stuck in a menu when arrowing up and down threaded conversations in Microsoft Teams. (#14355)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non se atascará nun menú ao subir e baixar coas frechas por un fío de conversacións en Microsoft Teams. (#14355)-

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Por favor consulta [a guía do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter información sobre a obsolescencia da API do NVDA e o proceso de eliminación.

segment.source: The [NVDA API Announcement mailing list](https://groups.google.com/a/nvaccess.org/g/nvda-api/about) was created. (#13999)
segment.target: Creouse a [listaxe de correo de Anuncios da API de NVDA](https://groups.google.com/a/nvaccess.org/g/nvda-api/about). (#13999)

segment.source: NVDA no longer processes `textChange` events for most UI Automation applications due to their extreme negative performance impact. (#11002, #14067)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non procesa eventos `textChange` para a maioría das aplicacións UI Automation debido ao impacto do seu extremo rendemento negativo. (#11002, #14067)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescencias

segment.source: `core.post_windowMessageReceipt` is deprecated, use `winAPI.messageWindow.pre_handleWindowMessage` instead.
segment.target: `core.post_windowMessageReceipt` está obsoleto, usa `winAPI.messageWindow.pre_handleWindowMessage` a cambio.

segment.source: `winKernel.SYSTEM_POWER_STATUS` is deprecated and usage is discouraged, this has been moved to `winAPI._powerTracking.SystemPowerStatus`.
segment.target: `winKernel.SYSTEM_POWER_STATUS` está obsoleto e desaconséllase o seu uso, esto moveuse a `winAPI._powerTracking.SystemPowerStatus`.

segment.source: `winUser.SM_*` constants are deprecated, use `winAPI.winUser.constants.SystemMetrics` instead.
segment.target: As constantes `winUser.SM_*` están obsoletas, usa `winAPI.winUser.constants.SystemMetrics` a cambio.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix issues with 2022.3.2, 2022.3.1 and 2022.3.
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar problemas con 2022.3.2, 2022.3.1 e 2022.3.

segment.source: This also addresses a security issue.
segment.target: Esto tamén aborda un problema de seguridade.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de Seguridade

segment.source: Prevents possible system access (e.g. NVDA Python console) for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Evita un posible aceso ao sistema (por exemplo: na consola Python de NVDA) para usuarios non autenticados.

segment.source: ([GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7))
segment.target: ([GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: Fixed bug where if NVDA freezes when locking, NVDA will allow access to the users desktop while on the Windows lock screen. (#14416)
segment.target: Arranxado un erro no que se o NVDA conxélase cando se bloquea, o NVDA permitirá accesar aos usuarios do escritorio mentres se estea na pantalla de bloqueo de Windows. (#14416)

segment.source: Fixed bug where if NVDA freezes when locking, NVDA will not behave correctly, as if the device was still locked. (#14416)
segment.target: Arranxado un erro no que se o NVDA conxélase cando se bloquea, o NVDA non se comportará correctamente, coma se o dispositivo seguira aínda bloqueado. (#14416)

segment.source: Fixed accessibility issues with the Windows "forgot my PIN" process and Windows update/install experience. (#14368)
segment.target: Arranxados problemas de accesibilidade co proceso de Windows "olvidei o meu PIN" e coa experiencia de actualizar ou instalar Windows. (#14368)

segment.source: Fixed bug when trying to install NVDA in some Windows environments, e.g. Windows Server. (#14379)
segment.target: Arranxado un erro ao intentar instalar o NVDA nalgúns ambentes de Windows, por exemplo en Windows Server. (#14379)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescencias

segment.source: `utils.security.isObjectAboveLockScreen(obj)` is deprecated, instead use `obj.isBelowLockScreen`. (#14416)
segment.target: `utils.security.isObjectAboveLockScreen(obj)` está obsoleto, a cambio usa `obj.isBelowLockScreen`. (#14416)

segment.source: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are deprecated for removal in 2023.1. (#14416)
segment.target: As seguintes funcións en `winAPI.sessionTracking` están obsoletas para a súa eliminación en 2023.1. (#14416)

segment.source: `isWindowsLocked`
segment.target: `isWindowsLocked`

segment.source: `handleSessionChange`
segment.target: `handleSessionChange`

segment.source: `unregister`
segment.target: `unregister`

segment.source: `register`
segment.target: `register`

segment.source: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`
segment.target: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix regressions with 2022.3.1 and address a security issue.
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar regresións con 2022.3.1 e para abordar un problema de seguridade.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de Seguridade

segment.source: Prevents possible system level access for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Evita o posible aceso a nivel de sistema para usuarios non autentificados.

segment.source: ([GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w))
segment.target: ([GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: Fixes a regression from 2022.3.1 where certain functionality was disabled on secure screens. (#14286)
segment.target: Arránxase unha regresión de 2022.3.1 onde certas funcionalidades deshabilitábanse en pantallas seguras. (#14286)

segment.source: Fixes a regression from 2022.3.1 where certain functionality was disabled after sign-in, if NVDA started on the lock screen. (#14301)
segment.target: Arránxase unha regresión de 2022.3.1 onde certas funcionalidades desabilitábanse despois de autentificarse se o NVDA se iniciaba na pantalla de bloqueo. (#14301)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues.
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar varios problemas de seguridade.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor comunica responsablemente os problemas de seguridade a <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de Seguridade

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to elevate from user to system privileges.
segment.target: Arranxouse o exploit polo que era posible elevar ao usuario os privilexios de sistema

segment.source: ([GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5))
segment.target: ([GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5))

segment.source: Fixed a security issue allowing access to the python console on the lock screen via a race condition for NVDA startup.
segment.target: Arranxouse un problema de seguridade que permitía o aceso á consola de python na pantalla de bloqueo a través dunha condición race para o arranque do NVDA.

segment.source: ([GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w))
segment.target: ([GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w))

segment.source: Fixed issue where speech viewer text is cached when locking Windows.
segment.target: Arranxouse un problema polo que o texto do visualizador de voz se gardaba en caché ao bloquear Windows.

segment.source: ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))
segment.target: ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: Prevent an unauthenticated user from updating settings for speech and Braille viewer on the lock screen. ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))
segment.target: Evítase que un usuario non autentificado actualice as opcións para os visualizadores de voz e Braille na pantalla de bloqueo. ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))

segment.source: A significant amount of this release was contributed by the NVDA development community.
segment.target: A comunidade de desenvolvedores do NVDA contribuíu en grande medida a esta versión.

segment.source: This includes delayed character descriptions and improved Windows Console support.
segment.target: Esto inclúe o retraso das descripcións dos caracteres e a mellora do soporte da Consola de Windows.

segment.source: This release also includes several bug fixes.
segment.target: Esta versión tamén inclúe varios arranxos de fallos.

segment.source: Notably, up-to-date versions of Adobe Acrobat/Reader will no longer crash when reading a PDF document.
segment.target: En particular, as versións actualizadas de Adobe Acrobat/Reader xa non se bloquean ao ler un documento PDF.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated, which introduces 3 new languages: Belarusian, Luxembourgish and Totontepec Mixe.
segment.target: eSpeak actualizouse, o que introduce tres linguas novas: Bielorruso, Luxemburgués e Totontepec Mixe.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: In the Windows Console Host used by Command Prompt, PowerShell, and the Windows Subsystem for Linux on Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2) and later:
segment.target: Na Consola de Windows úsase Host polo Símbolo do Sistema, por PowerShell e polo subsistema de Windows para Linux en Windows 11 versión 22H2 (Sun Valley 2) e posterior:

segment.source: Vastly improved performance and stability. (#10964)
segment.target: Rendemento e estabilidade moi mellorados. (#10964)

segment.source: When pressing `control+f` to find text, the review cursor position is updated to follow the found term. (#11172)
segment.target: Ao premer `control+f` para procurar texto, a posición do cursor de revisión actualízase para seguer ao término atopado. (#11172)

segment.source: Reporting of typed text that does not appear on-screen (such as passwords) is disabled by default.
segment.target: O anunciado do texto escrebido que non apareza na pantalla (como as contrasinais) deshabilítanse predeterminadamente.

segment.source: It can be re-enabled in NVDA's advanced settings panel. (#11554)
segment.target: Pode voltar a habilitarse no panel Avanzado dos axustes do NVDA. (#11554)

segment.source: Text that has scrolled offscreen can be reviewed without scrolling the console window. (#12669)
segment.target: O texto que se desprazara fora da pantalla pódese revisar sen desprazar a xanela da consola. (#12669)

segment.source: More detailed text formatting information is available. ([microsoft/terminal PR 10336](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/10336))
segment.target: Está dispoñible máis información detallada de formato de texto. ([microsoft/terminal PR 10336](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/10336))

segment.source: A new Speech option has been added to read character descriptions after a delay. (#13509)
segment.target: Engadiuse unha nova opción de Fala para ler as descripcións de caracteres tras un retraso. (#13509)

segment.source: A new Braille option has been added to determine if scrolling the display forward/back should interrupt speech. (#2124)
segment.target: Engadiuse unha nova opción de Braille para determinar se o desprazamento cara adiante ou cara atrás da pantalla debería interrumpir a fala. (#2124)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `9de65fcb`. (#13295)
segment.target: eSpeak NG actualizouse a 1.52-dev commit `9de65fcb`. (#13295)

segment.source: Added languages:
segment.target: Linguas engadidas:

segment.source: Belarusian
segment.target: Bielorruso

segment.source: Luxembourgish
segment.target: Luxemburgués

segment.source: Totontepec Mixe
segment.target: Totontepec Mixe

segment.source: When using UI Automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls, NVDA is now able to report when a cell is merged. (#12843)
segment.target: Ao se usar UI Automation para acesar a controis de folla de cálculo de Microsoft Excel, o NVDA agora pode anunciar cando unha celda está fusionada. (#12843)

segment.source: Instead of reporting "has details" the purpose of details is included where possible, for example "has comment". (#13649)
segment.target: A cambio de anunciar "ten detalles" inclúese o propósito dos detalles cando sexa posible, por exemplo "ten comentarios". (#13649)

segment.source: The installation size of NVDA is now shown in Windows Programs and Feature section. (#13909)
segment.target: O tamano de instalación do NVDA agora amósase na seción Programas e Características de Windows. (#13909)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat / Reader 64 bit will no longer crash when reading a PDF document. (#12920)
segment.target: O Adobe Acrobat / Reader de 64 bits xa non se bloqueará ao ler un documento PDF. (#12920)

segment.source: Note that the most up to date version of Adobe Acrobat / Reader is also required to avoid the crash.
segment.target: Ten en conta que é necesaria tamén a versión máis actualizada do Adobe Acrobat / Reader para evitar o bloqueo.

segment.source: Font size measurements are now translatable in NVDA. (#13573)
segment.target: As medidas de tamano de fonte agora son traducibles no NVDA. (#13573)

segment.source: Ignore Java Access Bridge events where no window handle can be found for Java applications.
segment.target: Ignóranse os eventos de Java Access Bridge nos que non se poda atopar un manexador de xanela para as aplicacións Java.

segment.source: This will improve performance for some Java applications including IntelliJ IDEA. (#13039)
segment.target: Esto mellorará o rendemento para algunhas aplicacións Java incluíndo IntelliJ IDEA. (#13039)

segment.source: Announcement of selected cells for LibreOffice Calc is more efficient and no longer results in a Calc freeze when many cells are selected. (#13232)
segment.target: O anunciado de celdas selecionadas para LibreOffice Calc é máis eficaz e xa non da lugar á conxelación de Calc cando se selecionen moitas celdas. (#13232)

segment.source: When running under a different user, Microsoft Edge is no longer inaccessible. (#13032)
segment.target: Cando se execute nun usuario diferente, Microsoft Edge xa non é inaccesible. (#13032)

segment.source: When rate boost is off, eSpeak's rate does not drop anymore between rates 99% and 100%. (#13876)
segment.target: Cando o aumento brusco de velocidade estea desactivado, a velocidade do eSpeak non descende máis entre velocidades do 99% e 100%. (#13876)

segment.source: Fix bug which allowed 2 Input Gestures dialogs to open. (#13854)
segment.target: Arranxouse un erro que permitía que se abriran 2 diálogos de xestos de Entrada. (#13854)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Updated Comtypes to version 1.1.11. (#12953)
segment.target: Actualizado Comtypes á versión 1.1.11. (#12953)

segment.source: In builds of Windows Console (`conhost.exe`) with an NVDA API level of 2 (`FORMATTED`) or greater, such as those included with Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2), UI Automation is now used by default. (#10964)
segment.target: En compilacións da Consola de Windows (`conhost.exe`) cun nivel 2 da API de NVDA (`FORMATTED`) ou máis grandes, como aqueles incluídos co Windows 11 versión 22H2 (Sun Valley 2), UI Automation agora úsase por defecto. (#10964)

segment.source: This can be overridden by changing the "Windows Console support" setting in NVDA's advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Esto pódese anular cambiando a opción "Soporte da Consola de Windows" no panel Avanzado da configuración do NVDA.

segment.source: To find your Windows Console's NVDA API level, set "Windows Console support" to "UIA when available", then check the NVDA+F1 log opened from a running Windows Console instance.
segment.target: Para atopar o teu nivel de API de NVDA para a Consola de Windows, configura "Soporte de Consola de Windows" a "UIA cando estea dispoñible", entón verifica que o rexistro estea aberto con NVDA+F1 dende unha instancia de Consola de Windows en execución.

segment.source: The Chromium virtual buffer is now loaded even when the document object has the MSAA `STATE_SYSTEM_BUSY` exposed via IA2. (#13306)
segment.target: O Búfer virtual de Chromium agora cárgase incluso cando o obxecto documento teña o MSAA `STATE_SYSTEM_BUSY` exposto a través de IA2. (#13306)

segment.source: A config spec type `featureFlag` has been created for use with experimental features in NVDA. See `devDocs/featureFlag.md` for more information. (#13859)
segment.target: Creouse un tipo específico de configuración `featureFlag` para utilizar con características experimentais en NVDA. Consulta `devDocs/featureFlag.md` para máis información. (#13859)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescencias

segment.source: There are no deprecations proposed in 2022.3.
segment.target: Non se propoñen obsolescencias en 2022.3.

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Este é un parche liberado para arranxar un fallo de seguridade.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Corrección de Erros

segment.source: Fixed an exploit where it was possible to open the NVDA python console via the log viewer on the lock screen.
segment.target: Arranxouse un fallo polo que era posible abrir a consola python do NVDA a través do visualizador do rexistro na pantalla de bloqueo.

segment.source: ([GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg))
segment.target: ([GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix an accidental API breakage introduced in 2022.2.1.
segment.target: Este é un parche liberado para arranxar unha rotura acidental da API introducida en 2022.2.1.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Fallos

segment.source: Fixed a bug where NVDA did not announce "Secure Desktop" when entering a secure desktop.
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo onde o NVDA non anunciaba "Escritorio Seguro" ao entrar nun escritorio seguro.

segment.source: This caused NVDA remote to not recognize secure desktops. (#14094)
segment.target: Esto provocaba que o NVDA remote non recoñecese os escritorios seguros. (#14094)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug introduced in 2022.2.1 with input gestures.
segment.target: Este é un parche liberado para arranxar un fallo introducido en 2022.2.1 cos xestos de entrada.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Fallos

segment.source: Fixed a bug where input gestures didn't always work. (#14065)
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo onde os xestos de entrada non sempre funcionaban. (#14065)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar un problema de seguridade.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, comunica responsablemente os fallos de seguridade a <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de Seguridade

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to run a python console from the lockscreen. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: Arranxouse un fallo polo que era posible executar unha consola python dende a pantalla de bloqueo. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to escape the lockscreen using object navigation. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: Arranxouse o fallo polo que era posible escapar da pantalla de bloqueo usando a navegación de obxectos. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescencias

segment.source: These deprecations are currently not scheduled for removal.
segment.target: Estas obsolescencias non se programaron actualmente para a súa eliminación.

segment.source: The deprecated aliases will remain until further notice.
segment.target: Os alias obsoletos permanecerán ata novo aviso.

segment.source: Please test the new API and provide feedback.
segment.target: Por favor, proba a nova API e proporciona retroalimentación.

segment.source: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.
segment.target: Para autores de complementos, por favor abride unha incidencia en GitHub se estos cambios impiden que a API satisfaga as vosas necesidades.

segment.source: `appModules.lockapp.LockAppObject` should be replaced with `NVDAObjects.lockscreen.LockScreenObject`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: `appModules.lockapp.LockAppObject` debería reemplazarse con `NVDAObjects.lockscreen.LockScreenObject`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: `appModules.lockapp.AppModule.SAFE_SCRIPTS` should be replaced with `utils.security.getSafeScripts()`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: `appModules.lockapp.AppModule.SAFE_SCRIPTS` debería reemplazarse con `utils.security.getSafeScripts()`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: This release includes many bug fixes.
segment.target: Esta versión inclúe moitos arranxos de fallos.

segment.source: Notably, there are significant improvements for Java based applications, braille displays and Windows features.
segment.target: En particular, hai grandes melloras para aplicacións baseadas en Java, para pantallas braille e para características de Windows.

segment.source: New table navigation commands have been introduced.
segment.target: Introducíronse novas ordes de navegación de táboas.

segment.source: Unicode CLDR has been updated.
segment.target: Actualizouse Unicode CLDR.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, which includes a new German braille table.
segment.target: Actualizouse LibLouis, o que inclúe unha táboa braille alemana nova.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Support for interacting with Microsoft Loop Components in Microsoft Office products. (#13617)
segment.target: Soporte para interactuar con Microsoft Loop Components en productos de Microsoft Office. (#13617)

segment.source: New table navigation commands have been added. (#957)
segment.target: Engadíronse novas ordes de navegación por táboas. (#957)

segment.source: `control+alt+home/end` to jump to first/last column.
segment.target: `control+alt+inicio/fin` para saltar á primeira/última columna.

segment.source: `control+alt+pageUp/pageDown` to jump to first/last row.
segment.target: `control+alt+repáx/avpáx` para saltar á primeira/última fila.

segment.source: An unassigned script to cycle through language and dialect switching modes has been added. (#10253)
segment.target: Engadiuse un script sen asignar para moverse circularmente entre cambio de modos de lingua e de dialecto. (#10253)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: NSIS has been updated to version 3.08. (#9134)
segment.target: NSIS actualizouse á versión 3.08. (#9134)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 41.0. (#13582)
segment.target: CLDR actualizouse á versión 41.0. (#13582)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.22.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.22.0). (#13775)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille libLouis a [3.22.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.22.0). (#13775)

segment.source: New braille table: German grade 2 (detailed)
segment.target: Nova táboa braille: alemán grao 2 (detallada)

segment.source: Added new role for "busy indicator" controls. (#10644)
segment.target: Engadiuse un novo rol para controis "indicador ocupado". (#10644)

segment.source: NVDA now announces when an NVDA action cannot be performed. (#13500)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anuncia cando non se poda realizar unha acción. (#13500)

segment.source: This includes when:
segment.target: Esto inclúe cando:

segment.source: Using the NVDA Windows Store version.
segment.target: Se use a versión do NVDA da Tenda de Windows.

segment.source: In a secure context.
segment.target: Nun contexto seguro.

segment.source: Waiting for a response to a modal dialog.
segment.target: Esperando pola resposta dun diálogo modal.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Fallos

segment.source: Fixes for Java based applications:
segment.target: Arranxos para aplicacións baseadas en Java:

segment.source: NVDA will now announce read-only state. (#13692)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciará o estado de só lectura. (#13692)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce disabled/enabled state correctly. (#10993)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciará os estados deshabilitado/habilitado correctamente. (#10993)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce function key shortcuts. (#13643)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciará os atallos de teclas de función. (#13643)

segment.source: NVDA can now beep or speak on progress bars. (#13594)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode pitar ou falar en barras de progreso. (#13594)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer incorrectly remove text from widgets when presenting to the user. (#13102)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non eliminará incorrectamente texto dos widgets cando se presenten ao usuario. (#13102)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce the state of toggle buttons. (#9728)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciará o estado dos botóns conmutables. (#9728)

segment.source: NVDA will now identify the window in a Java application with multiple windows. (#9184)
segment.target: O NVDA agora identificará a xanela nunha aplicación Java con varias xanelas. (#9184)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce position information for tab controls. (#13744)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciará información da posición para controis de pestaña. (#13744)

segment.source: Braille fixes:
segment.target: Arranxos de braille:

segment.source: Fix braille output when navigating certain text in Mozilla rich edit controls, such as drafting a message in Thunderbird. (#12542)
segment.target: Arranxada a saída braille ao navegar por certo texto en conrois de edición enriquecidos de Mozilla, coma redactar unha mensaxe en Thunderbird. (#12542)

segment.source: When braille is tethered automatically and the mouse is moved with mouse tracking enabled,
segment.target: Cando se segue ao braille automáticamente e o rato móvese co seguemento do rato habilitado,

segment.source: text review commands now update the braille display with the spoken content. (#11519)
segment.target: as ordes de revisión de texto agora actualizan a pantalla braille co contido falado. (#11519)

segment.source: It is now possible to pan the braille display through content after use of text review commands. (#8682)
segment.target: Agora é posible desprazar a pantalla braille polo contido ao usar as ordes de revisión de texto. (#8682)

segment.source: The NVDA installer can now run from directories with special characters. (#13270)
segment.target: O instalador de NVDA agora pode executarse dende directorios con caracteres especiais. (#13270)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer fails to report items in web pages when aria-rowindex, aria-colindex, aria-rowcount or aria-colcount attributes are invalid. (#13405)
segment.target: En Firefox, o NVDA xa non falla ao anunciar elementos en páxinas web onde os atributos aria-rowindex, aria-colindex, aria-rowcount ou aria-colcount sexan inválidos. (#13405)

segment.source: The cursor does not switch row or column anymore when using table navigation to navigate through merged cells. (#7278)
segment.target: O cursor xa non cambia de fila ou de columna ao se usar a navegación de táboas para navegar polas celdas fusionadas. (#7278)

segment.source: When reading non-interactive PDFs in Adobe Reader, the type and state of form fields (such as checkboxes and radio buttons) are now reported. (#13285)
segment.target: Ao ler PDFs non interactivos en Adobe Reader, o tipo e estado dos campos de formulario (como caixas de verificación e botóns de opción) agora anúncianse. (#13285)

segment.source: "Reset configuration to factory defaults" is now accessible in the NVDA menu during secure mode. (#13547)
segment.target: "Reiniciar a configuración aos valores predeterminados de fábrica" agora é acesible no menú de NVDA durante o modo seguro. (#13547)

segment.source: Any locked mouse keys will be unlocked when NVDA exits, previously the mouse button would remain locked. (#13410)
segment.target: Calquera tecla de rato bloqueada desbloquearase cando se saia do NVDA, anteriormente o botón do rato seguía bloqueado. (#13410)

segment.source: Visual Studio now reports line numbers. (#13604)
segment.target: Visual Studio agora anuncia os números de liña. (#13604)

segment.source: Note that for line number reporting to work, showing line numbers must be enabled in Visual Studio and NVDA.
segment.target: Ten en conta que para que funcione o anunciado de números de liña, debe estar habilitado o amosado de números de liña en Visual Studio e en NVDA.

segment.source: Visual Studio now correctly reports line indentation. (#13574)
segment.target: Visual Studio agora anuncia correctamente a sangría de liñas. (#13574)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce Start menu search result details in recent Windows 10 and 11 releases. (#13544)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciará de novo unha vez os detalles dos resultados da procura do menú Inicio en versións recentes de Windows 10 e 11. (#13544)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator version 10.1908 and later,
segment.target: Na versión 10.1908 e superior da calculadora en Windows 10 e 11,

segment.source: NVDA will announce results when more commands are pressed, such as commands from scientific mode. (#13383)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciará resultados cando se pulsen máis ordes, coma ordes do modo científico. (#13386)

segment.source: In Windows 11, it is again possible to navigate and interact with user interface elements,
segment.target: En Windows 11 é posible de novo navegar e interactuar con elementos da interface de usuario

segment.source: such as Taskbar and Task View using mouse and touch interaction. (#13506)
segment.target: coma Barra de tarefas e visualizador de Tarefas usando interación de rato e tactil. (#13508)

segment.source: NVDA will announce status bar content in Windows 11 Notepad. (#13688)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciará o contido da barra de estado en Notepad en Windows 11. (#13386)

segment.source: Navigator object highlighting now shows up immediately upon activation of the feature. (#13641)
segment.target: O resaltado do navegador de obxectos agora aparece inmediatamente trala activación da característica. (#13641)

segment.source: Fix reading single column list view items. (#13659, #13735)
segment.target: Arránxase a lectura dos elementos da vista de listaxe duna soa columna. (#13659, #13735)

segment.source: Fix eSpeak automatic language switching for English and French falling back to British English and French (France). (#13727)
segment.target: Arránxase o cambio automático de lingua de eSpeak para inglés e francés voltando a seren inglés británico e francés (Francia). (#13727)

segment.source: Fix OneCore automatic language switching when trying to switch to a formerly installed language. (#13732)
segment.target: Arránxase o cambio automático de lingua de OneCore cando se tenta cambiar a unha lingua xa instalada. (#13732)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies with Visual Studio 2022 (17.0) is now supported.
segment.target: Agora admítese compilar as dependencias do NVDA con Visual Studio 2022 (17.0).

segment.source: For development and release builds, Visual Studio 2019 is still used. (#13033)
segment.target: aínda se usa Visual Studio 2019 para compilacións de desenvolvemento e de lanzamento. (#13033)

segment.source: When retrieving the count of selected children via accSelection,
segment.target: Cando se recupera a conta dos fillos selecionados a través de accSelection,

segment.source: the case where a negative child ID or an IDispatch is returned by `IAccessible::get_accSelection` is now handled properly. (#13277)
segment.target: o caso se un ID de fillo negativo ou se devolve un IDispatch por `IAccessible::get_accSelection` agora manéxase apropriadamente. (#13276)

segment.source: New convenience functions `registerExecutableWithAppModule` and `unregisterExecutable` were added to the `appModuleHandler` module.
segment.target: Novas funcións convintes `registerExecutableWithAppModule` e `unregisterExecutable` engadíronse ao módulo `appModuleHandler`.

segment.source: They can be used to use a single App Module with multiple executables. (#13366)
segment.target: Poden usarse para usar un so App Module con varios executables. (#13366)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescencias

segment.source: These are proposed API breaking changes.
segment.target: Estos son os cambios de ruptura de API propostos.

segment.source: The deprecated part of the API will continue to be available until the specified release.
segment.target: A parte obsoleta da API continuará estando dispoñible ate a versión especificada.

segment.source: If no release is specified, the plan for removal has not been determined.
segment.target: Se non se especifica unha versión, o plan para a eliminación non foi determinado.

segment.source: Note, the roadmap for removals is 'best effort' and may be subject to change.
segment.target: Nota, a folla de ruta para a eliminación é 'o maior dos esforzos' e pode estar suxeito a cambios.

segment.source: Please test the new API and provide feedback.
segment.target: Por favor proba a nova API e proporciona retroalimentación.

segment.source: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.
segment.target: Para autores de complementos, por favor abre un comentario de GitHub se estos cambios alonxan a API das túas necesidades.

segment.source: `appModuleHandler.NVDAProcessID` is deprecated, use `globalVars.appPid` instead. (#13646)
segment.target: Foi posto coma obsoleto `appModuleHandler.NVDAProcessID` - usa `globalVars.appPid` a cambio. (#13646)

segment.source: `gui.quit` is deprecated, use `wx.CallAfter(mainFrame.onExitCommand, None)` instead. (#13498)
segment.target: `gui.quit` foi posto como obsoleto, usa `wx.CallAfter(mainFrame.onExitCommand, None)` a cambio. (#13498)

segment.source: Some alias appModules are marked as deprecated.
segment.target: Algúns alias appModules márcanse coma obsoletos e borraranse en 2023.1.

segment.source: Code which imports from one of them, should instead import from the replacement module. (#13366)
segment.target: O código que se importe dende un deles, debería importarse dende o módulo reemplazado a cambio. (#13366)

segment.source: Removed module name |Replacement module
segment.target: Nome do módulo eliminado |Módulo de reemprazo

segment.target: zend-eclipse-php |eclipse

segment.source: zendstudio |eclipse
segment.target: zendstudio |eclipse

segment.source: This release includes major improvements to UIA support with MS Office.
segment.target: Esta versión inclúe grandes melloras para o soporte UIA con MS Office.

segment.source: For Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 and higher on Windows 11, NVDA will use UI Automation to access Microsoft Word documents by default.
segment.target: Para Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 e superiores en Windows 11, o NVDA usará UI Automation para aceder a documentos de Microsoft Word por defecto.

segment.source: This provides a significant performance improvement over the old Object model access.
segment.target: Esto proporciona unha mellora de rendemento significativa sobre o vello modelo de aceso de obxectos.

segment.source: There are improvements to braille display drivers including Seika Notetaker, Papenmeier and HID Braille.
segment.target: Hai melloras para os controladores de pantalla braille incluindo Seika Notetaker, Papenmeier e HID Braille.

segment.source: There are also various Windows 11 bug fixes, for apps such as Calculator, Console, Terminal, Mail and Emoji Panel.
segment.target: Tamén hai varios arranxos de erros para Windows 11, para aplicacións como a Calculadora, a Consola, a Terminal, Mail e o Panel de Emoji.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG and LibLouis have been updated, adding new Japanese, German and Catalan tables.
segment.target: Actualizáronse eSpeak-NG e LibLouis, engadíronse novas táboas Xaponesa, Alemana e Catalana.

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Nota:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Esta versión rompe a compatibilidade cos complementos existentes.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Support for reporting notes in MS Excel with UI Automation enabled on Windows 11. (#12861)
segment.target: Soporte para o anunciado de notas en MS Excel co UI Automation habilitado en Windows 11. (#12861)

segment.source: In recent builds of Microsoft Word via UI Automation on Windows 11, the existence of bookmarks, draft comments and resolved comments are now reported in both speech and braille. (#12861)
segment.target: En compilacións recentes de Microsoft Word a través de UI Automation en Windows 11, a existencia de marcas, borradores de comentarios e comentarios resoltos agora anúncianse en voz e braille. (#12861)

segment.source: The new `--lang` command line parameter allows overriding the configured NVDA language. (#10044)
segment.target: O novo parámetro de liña de ordes `--lang` sempre sobrescrebe a lingua configurada de NVDA. (#10044)

segment.source: NVDA now warns about command line parameters which are unknown and not used by any add-ons. (#12795)
segment.target: O NVDA agora advirte sobre os parámetros de liña de ordes que son descoñecidos e que non se usan por ningún compremento. (#12795)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word accessed via UI Automation, NVDA will now make use of mathPlayer to read and navigate Office math equations. (#12946)
segment.target: En Microsoft Word acesado a través de UI Automation, o NVDA agora fará uso de mathPlayer para ler e navegar as ecuacións matemáticas de Office. (#12946)

segment.source: For this to work, you must be running Microsoft Word 365/2016 build 14326 or later.
segment.target: Para que esto funcione, debes estar executando Microsoft Word 365/2016 compilación 14326 ou posterior.

segment.source: MathType equations must also be manually converted to Office Math by selecting each, opening the context menu, choosing Equation options, Convert to Office Math.
segment.target: As ecuacións MathType tamén deben converterse manualmente a Office Math selecionando cada unha e escollendo Opcións de Ecuación -> Converter a Office Math no menú de contexto.

segment.source: Reporting of "has details" and the associated command to summarize the details relation have been updated to work in focus mode. (#13106)
segment.target: Actualizuse o anunciado de "ten detalles" e a orde asociada para resumir a relación de detalles para que funcionen en modo foco. (#13106)

segment.source: Seika Notetaker can now be auto-detected when connected via USB and Bluetooth. (#13191, #13142)
segment.target: A Seika Notetaker agora pode autodetectarse ao conectala a través do USB e do Bluetooth. (#13191, #13142)

segment.source: This affects the following devices: MiniSeika (16, 24 cells), V6, and V6Pro (40 cells)
segment.target: Esto afecta aos seguintes dispositivos: MiniSeika (16, 24 celdas), V6 e V6Pro (40 celdas)

segment.source: Manually selecting the bluetooth COM port is also now supported.
segment.target: A seleción manual do porto bluetooth COM tamén se admite agora.

segment.source: Added a command to toggle the braille viewer; there is no default associated gesture. (#13258)
segment.target: Engadida unha orde para conmutar o Visualizador de braille; non hai un xesto predeterminado asociado. (#13258)

segment.source: Added commands for toggling multiple modifiers simultaneously with a Braille display (#13152)
segment.target: Engadidas ordes para conmutar varios modificadores simultáneamente cunha pantalla braille (#13152)

segment.source: The Speech Dictionary dialog now features a "Remove all" button to help clear a whole dictionary. (#11802)
segment.target: O diálogo diccionarios da fala agora implementa un botón "Borrar todo" para axudar a borrar un diccionario enteiro. (#11802)

segment.source: Added support for Windows 11 Calculator. (#13212)
segment.target: Engadido o soporte para a Calculadora de Windows 11. (#13212)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word with UI Automation enabled on Windows 11, line numbers and section numbers can now be reported. (#13283, #13515)
segment.target: En Microsoft Word con UI Automation habilitado en Windows 11, os números de liña e de seción agora poden anunciarse. (#13283, #13515)

segment.source: For Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 and higher on Windows 11, NVDA will use UI Automation to access Microsoft Word documents by default, providing a significant performance improvement over the old Object model access. (#13437)
segment.target: Para Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 e superiores en Windows 11, o NVDA utilizará UI Automation para aceder a documentos de Microsoft Word por defecto, proporcionando unha significativa mellora de rendemento sobre o aceso ao vello modelo de obxectos. (#13437)

segment.source: This includes documents in Microsoft Word itself, and also the message reader and composer in Microsoft Outlook.
segment.target: Esto inclúe documentos no proprio Microsoft Word e tamén no lector e redactor de mensaxes en Microsoft Outlook.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `7e5457f91e10`. (#12950)
segment.target: Espeak-ng actualizouse a 1.51-dev commit `7e5457f91e10`. (#12950)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.21.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.21.0). (#13141, #13438)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille liblouis a [3.21.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.21.0). (#13141, #13438)

segment.source: Added new braille table: Japanese (Kantenji) literary braille.
segment.target: Engadida nova táboa braille: braille literario Xaponés (Kantenji)

segment.source: Added new German 6 dot computer braille table.
segment.target: Engadida nova táboa alemana braille computerizado de 6 puntos.

segment.source: Added Catalan grade 1 braille table. (#13408)
segment.target: Engadida nova táboa braille catalana grado 1. (#13408)

segment.source: NVDA will report selection and merged cells in LibreOffice Calc 7.3 and above. (#9310, #6897)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciará a seleción e a fusión de celdas en LibreOffice Calc 7.3 e posterior. (#9310, #6897)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) to 40.0. (#12999)
segment.target: Actualizado o Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) a 40.0. (#12999)

segment.source: `NVDA+Numpad Delete` reports the location of the caret or focused object by default. (#13060)
segment.target: `NVDA+Suprimir do teclado numérico` anuncia a localización do cursor ou do obxecto enfocado por defecto. (#13060)

segment.source: `NVDA+Shift+Numpad Delete` reports the location of the review cursor. (#13060)
segment.target: `NVDA+Shift+Suprimir do teclado numérico` anuncia a localización do cursor de revisión. (#13060)

segment.source: Added default bindings for toggling modifier keys to Freedom Scientific displays (#13152)
segment.target: Engadidos bindings predeterminados para conmutar as teclas modificadoras ás pantallas braille de Freedom Scientific (#13152)

segment.source: "Baseline" is no longer reported via the report text formatting command (`NVDA+f`). (#11815)
segment.target: Xa non se anuncia "Baseline" a través da orde anunciar formato de texto (`NVDA+F`). (#11815)

segment.source: Activate long description no longer has a default gesture assigned. (#13380)
segment.target: Activar descripción lnga xa non ten un xesto predeterminado asignado. (#13380)

segment.source: Report details summary now has a default gesture (`NVDA+d`). (#13380)
segment.target: Anunciar resumo de detalles agora ten un xesto predeterminado, `NVDA+d`. (#13380)

segment.source: NVDA needs to be restarted after installing MathPlayer. (#13486)
segment.target: o NVDA necesita se reiniciar despois de instalar MathPlayer. (#13486)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Fallos

segment.source: Clipboard manager pane should no longer incorrectly steal focus when opening some Office programs. (#12736)
segment.target: O panel do xestor do portapapeis xa non debería secuestrar incorrectamente o foco ao abrir algúns programas de Office. (#12736)

segment.source: On a system where the user has chosen to swap the primary mouse button from the left to the right, NVDA will no longer accidentally bring up a context menu instead of activating an item, in applications such as web browsers. (#12642)
segment.target: Nun sistema onde o usuario escollera cambiar o botón primario do rato da esquerda á dereita, o NVDA xa non despregará accidentalmente un menú de contexto en lugar de activar un elemento, en aplicacións como navegadores web. (#12642)

segment.source: When moving the review cursor past the end of text controls, such as in Microsoft Word with UI Automation, "bottom" is correctly reported in more situations. (#12808)
segment.target: Ao mover o cursor de revisión máis aló do fin dos controis de texto, como en Microsoft Word con UI Automation, "inferior" anúncianse correctamente en máis situacións. (#12808)

segment.source: NVDA can report the application name and version for binaries placed in system32 when running under 64-bit version of Windows. (#12943)
segment.target: O NVDA pode anunciar o nome da aplicación e a versión para os binarios colocados en system32 cando se executen nunha versión de 64 bits de Windows. (#12943)

segment.source: Improved consistency of output reading in terminal programs. (#12974)
segment.target: Mellorouse a consistencia da lectura da saída dos programas de terminal. (#12974)

segment.source: Note that in some situations, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters after the caret may again be read out.
segment.target: Ten en conta que en algunhas situacións, ao insertar ou borrar caracteres no medio dunha liña, os caracteres despois do cursor poden seren lidos de novo.

segment.source: MS word with UIA: heading quick nav in browse mode no longer gets stuck on the final heading of a document, nor is this heading shown twice in the NVDA elements list. (#9540)
segment.target: MS word con UIA: a navegación rápida por cabeceiras en modo exploración xa non se queda atascada na cabeceira final dun documento, nin esta cabeceira amósase dúas veces na listaxe de elementos do NVDA. (#9540)

segment.source: In Windows 8 and later, the File Explorer status bar can now be retrieved using the standard gesture NVDA+end (desktop) / NVDA+shift+end (laptop). (#12845)
segment.target: En Windows 8 e posterior, a barra de estado do Explorador de Arquivos agora pódese recuperar usando o xesto estándar NVDA+fin (escritorio) / NVDA+shift+fin (portátil). (#12845)

segment.source: Incoming messages in the chat of Skype for Business are reported again. (#9295)
segment.target: As mensaxes entrantes no chat de Skype for Business anúncianse de novo. (#9295)

segment.source: NVDA can again duck audio when using the SAPI5 synthesizer on Windows 11. (#12913)
segment.target: O NVDA pode voltar a atenuar o audio ao se usar o sintetizador SAPI5 en Windows 11. (#12913)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will announce labels for history and memory list items. (#11858)
segment.target: Na Calculadora de Windows 10, o NVDA anunciará as etiquetas da listaxe de elementos do historial e da memoria. (#11858)

segment.source: Gestures such as scrolling and routing again work with HID Braille devices. (#13228)
segment.target: Os xestos coma o desprazamento e enrutamento voltan a funcionar cos dispositivos HID Braille. (#13228)

segment.source: Windows 11 Mail: After switching focus between apps, while reading a long email, NVDA no longer gets stuck on a line of the email. (#13050)
segment.target: Windows 11 Mail: despois de cambiar o foco entre aplicacións, mentres se lía un correo electrónico longo, o NVDA quedábase atascado nunha liña do correo. (#13050)

segment.source: HID braille: chorded gestures (e.g. `space+dot4`) can be successfully performed from the Braille display. (#13326)
segment.target: HID braille: os xestos cor (por exemplo: `espazo+punto4`) pódense realizar con éxito dende a pantalla braille. (#13326)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where multiple settings dialogs could be opened at the same time. (#12818)
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo polo que se podían abrir varios diálogos de opcións ao mesmo tempo. (#12818)

segment.source: Fixed a problem where some Focus Blue Braille displays would stop working after waking the computer from sleep. (#9830)
segment.target: Arranxado un problema polo que algunhas pantallas braille Focus Blue deixaban de funcionar despois de que se espertase o computador tras a suspensión. (#9830)

segment.source: "Baseline" is no longer spuriously reported when the "report superscript and subscript" option is active. (#11078)
segment.target: Xa non se anuncia 'Baseline' cando a opción 'anunciar superíndice e subíndice' estea activa. (#11078)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer prevent navigation in emoji panel when selecting emojis. (#13104)
segment.target: En Windows 11, o NVDA xa non impedirá a navegación no panel de emoji ao se selecionar emojis. (#13104)

segment.source: Prevents a bug causing double-reporting when using Windows Console and Terminal. (#13261)
segment.target: Evítase un erro que causaba un dobre anunciado ao se usar a consola de Windows e a Terminal. (#13261)

segment.source: Fixed several cases where list items could not be reported in 64 bit applications, such as REAPER. (#8175)
segment.target: Arranxados varios casos nos que os elementos da listaxe non se podían anunciar en aplicacións de 64 bits, como REAPER. (#8175)

segment.source: In the Microsoft Edge downloads manager, NVDA will now automatically switch to focus mode once the list item with the most recent download gains focus. (#13221)
segment.target: No xestor de descargas de Microsoft Edge, o NVDA agora cambiará automáticamente a modo Foco unha vez o elemento de listaxe coa descarga máis recente obteña o foco. (#13221)

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes 64-bit versions of Notepad++ 8.3 and above to crash. (#13311)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non provoca que as versións de 64 bits de Notepad++ 8.3 e superiores se colguen. (#13311)

segment.source: Adobe Reader no longer crashes on startup if Adobe Reader's protected mode is enabled. (#11568)
segment.target: Adobe Reader xa non se colga ao arrancar se o modo protexido de Adobe Reader está habilitado. (#11568)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where selecting the Papenmeier Braille Display Driver caused NVDA to crash. (#13348)
segment.target: Arranxado un fallo onde ao selecionar o controlador da pantalla braille Papenmeier provocaba que o NVDA se colgase. (#13348)

segment.source: In Microsoft word with UIA: page number and other formatting is no longer inappropriately announced when moving from a blank table cell to a cell with content, or from the end of the document into existing content. (#13458, #13459)
segment.target: En Microsoft word con UIA: o número de páxina e outros formatos xa non se anuncian inapropriadamente ao se mover dende unha celda de táboa en branco a unha celda con contido, ou dende o final do documento a un contido existente. (#13458, #13459)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to report the page title and start automatically reading, when a page loads in Google chrome 100. (#13571)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non falla ao anunciar o título de páxina e ao comezar a lectura automática cando se cargue unha páxina en Google chrome 100. (#13571)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when resetting the NVDA configuration to factory defaults while speak command keys is on. (#13634)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non se bloquea ao se reiniciar a configuración de NVDA aos valores predeterminados de fábrica mentras falar teclas de ordes estea activado. (#13634)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Note: this is a Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Nota: esta é unha versión que rompe a compatibilidade coa API dos comprementos. os comprementos terán que voltar a probarse e actualizar o seu manifesto.

segment.source: Although NVDA still requires Visual Studio 2019, Builds should no longer fail if a newer version of Visual Studio (E.g. 2022) is installed along side 2019. (#13033, #13387)
segment.target: Aíndaque o NVDA segue a requerir o Visual Studio 2019, as compilacións xa non deberían fallar se se instala unha versión máis recente de Visual Studio (por exemplo, 2022) xunto con 2019. (#13033, #13387)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 4.3.0. (#13033)
segment.target: Actualizado SCons á versión 4.3.0. (#13033)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.11.1.0. (#13510)
segment.target: Actualizado py2exe á versión 0.11.0.1.0 (#13510)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been removed. Use `apiLevel` instead. (#12955, #12660)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` borrouse. Usa `apiLevel` a cambio. (#12955, #12660)

segment.source: `TVItemStruct` has been removed from `sysTreeView32`. (#12935)
segment.target: `TVItemStruct` borrouse de `sysTreeView32`. (#12935)

segment.source: `MessageItem` has been removed from the Outlook appModule. (#12935)
segment.target: `MessageItem` borrouse dol appModule Outlook. (#12935)

segment.source: `audioDucking.AUDIODUCKINGMODE_*` constants are now a `DisplayStringIntEnum`. (#12926)
segment.target: As constantes `audioDucking.AUDIODUCKINGMODE_*` agora son unha `DisplayStringIntEnum`. (#12926)

segment.source: usages should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*`
segment.target: o seu uso debería substituirse con `AudioDuckingMode.*`

segment.source: usages of `audioDucking.audioDuckingModes` should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*.displayString`
segment.target: O uso de `audioDucking.audioDuckingModes` debería remprazarse con `AudioDuckingMode.*.displayString`

segment.source: `audioDucking.ANRUS_ducking_*` constants usages should be replaced with `ANRUSDucking.*`. (#12926)
segment.target: O uso das constantes `audioDucking.ANRUS_ducking_*` debería remprazarse con `ANRUSDucking.*`. (#12926)

segment.source: `synthDrivers.sapi5` changes (#12927):
segment.target: Cambios en `synthDrivers.sapi5` (#12927):

segment.source: `SPAS_*` usages should be replaced with `SPAudioState.*`
segment.target: o uso de `SPAS_*` debería remprazarse con `SPAudioState.*`

segment.source: `constants.SVSF*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.*`
segment.target: o uso de `constants.SVSF*` debería remprazarse con `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.*`

segment.source: Note: `SVSFlagsAsync` should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.Async` not `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.lagsAsync`
segment.target: Nota: `SVSFlagsAsync` debería remprazarse con `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.Async` non con `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.lagsAsync`

segment.source: `constants.SVE*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceEvents.*`
segment.target: o uso de `constants.SVE*` debería remprazarse con `SpeechVoiceEvents.*`

segment.source: The `soffice` appModule has the following classes and functions removed `JAB_OOTableCell`, `JAB_OOTable`, `gridCoordStringToNumbers`. (#12849)
segment.target: o appModule `soffice` borrou as seguintes crasses e funcións `JAB_OOTableCell`, `JAB_OOTable`, `gridCoordStringToNumbers`. (#12849)

segment.source: `core.CallCancelled` is now `exceptions.CallCancelled`. (#12940)
segment.target: `core.CallCancelled` agora é `exceptions.CallCancelled`. (#12940)

segment.source: All constants starting with RPC from `core` and `logHandler` are moved into `RPCConstants.RPC` enum. (#12940)
segment.target: Todas as constantes que comecen con RPC de `core` e de `logHandler` movéronse a `RPCConstants.RPC` enum. (#12940)

segment.source: It is recommended that `mouseHandler.doPrimaryClick` and `mouseHandler.doSecondaryClick` functions should be used to click the mouse to perform a logical action such as activating (primary) or secondary (show context menu),
segment.target: Recoméndase que as funcións `mouseHandler.doPrimaryClick` e `mouseHandler.doSecondaryClick` deberían usarse para facer clic co rato que realicen unha ación lóxica como activar (primario) ou secundario (amosar menú de contexto),

segment.source: rather than using `executeMouseEvent` and specifying the left or right mouse button specifically.
segment.target: en lugar de usar `executeMouseEvent` e especificar os botóns esquerdo e dereito do rato específicamente.

segment.source: This ensures code will honor the Windows user setting for swapping the primary mouse button. (#12642)
segment.target: Esto asegura que o código respetará a configuración do usuario de Windows para intercambiar o botón primario do rato. (#12642)

segment.source: `config.getSystemConfigPath` has been removed - there is no replacement. (#12943)
segment.target: `config.getSystemConfigPath` borrouse - non hai remprazo. (#12943)

segment.source: `shlobj.SHGetFolderPath` has been removed - please use `shlobj.SHGetKnownFolderPath` instead. (#12943)
segment.target: `shlobj.SHGetFolderPath` borrouse - por favor usa `shlobj.SHGetKnownFolderPath` a cambio. (#12943)

segment.source: `shlobj` constants have been removed. A new enum has been created, `shlobj.FolderId` for usage with `SHGetKnownFolderPath`. (#12943)
segment.target: Borráronse as constantes `shlobj`. creouse unha nova enumeración, `shlobj.FolderId` para usar con `SHGetKnownFolderPath`. (#12943)

segment.source: `diffHandler.get_dmp_algo` and `diffHandler.get_difflib_algo` have been replaced with `diffHandler.prefer_dmp` and `diffHandler.prefer_difflib` respectively. (#12974)
segment.target: `diffHandler.get_dmp_algo` e `diffHandler.get_difflib_algo` remprazáronse con `diffHandler.prefer_dmp` e `diffHandler.prefer_difflib` respectivamente. (#12974)

segment.source: `languageHandler.curLang` has been removed - to get the current NVDA language use `languageHandler.getLanguage()`. (#13082)
segment.target: `languageHandler.curLang` borrouse - para obter a lingua actual do NVDA usa `languageHandler.getLanguage()`. (#13082)

segment.source: A `getStatusBarText` method can be implemented on an appModule to customize the way NVDA fetches the text from the status bar. (#12845)
segment.target: Pode implementarse un novo método `getStatusBarText` nun appModule para persoalizar o modo no que o NVDA obtén o texto da barra de estado. (#12845)

segment.source: `globalVars.appArgsExtra` has been removed. (#13087)
segment.target: `globalVars.appArgsExtra` eliminouse. (#13087)

segment.source: If your add-on need to process additional command line arguments see the documentation of `addonHandler.isCLIParamKnown` and the developer guide for details.
segment.target: Se o teu compremento necesita procesar argumentos adicionais de liña de ordes consulta a documentación de `addonHandler.isCLIParamKnown` e a guía de desenvolvedores para máis detalles.

segment.source: The UIA handler module and other UIA support modules are now part of a UIAHandler package. (#10916)
segment.target: O módulo UIA handler e outros módulos UIA soportados agora son parte dun paquete UIAHandler. (#10916)

segment.source: `UIAUtils` is now `UIAHandler.utils`
segment.target: `UIAUtils` agora é `UIAHandler.utils`

segment.source: `UIABrowseMode` is now `UIAHandler.browseMode`
segment.target: `UIABrowseMode` agora é `UIAHandler.browseMode`

segment.source: `_UIAConstants` is now `UIAHandler.constants`
segment.target: `_UIAConstants` agora é `UIAHandler.constants`

segment.source: `_UIACustomProps` is now `UIAHandler.customProps`
segment.target: `_UIACustomProps` agora é `UIAHandler.customProps`

segment.source: `_UIACustomAnnotations` is now `UIAHandler.customAnnotations`
segment.target: `_UIACustomAnnotations` agora é `UIAHandler.customAnnotations`

segment.source: The `IAccessibleHandler` `IA2_RELATION_*` constants have been replaced with the `IAccessibleHandler.RelationType` enum. (#13096)
segment.target: As constantes `IAccessibleHandler` `IA2_RELATION_*` remprazáronse coa `IAccessibleHandler.RelationType` enum. (#13096)

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_FROM`
segment.target: Borrado `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_FROM`

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_TO`
segment.target: Borrado `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_TO`

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_CONTAINING_DOCUMENT`
segment.target: Borrado `IA2_RELATION_CONTAINING_DOCUMENT`

segment.source: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are removed from `languageHandler` - use members of `languageHandler.LOCALE` instead. (#12753)
segment.target: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` e `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` borráronse de `languageHandler` - usa membros de `languageHandler.LOCALE` a cambio. (#12753)

segment.source: Switched from Minhook to Microsoft Detours as a hooking library for NVDA. Hooking with this library is mainly used to aid the display model. (#12964)
segment.target: Cambiamos de Minhook a Microsoft Detours como librería de enganche para o NVDA. O enganche con esta librería úsase principalmente para axudar ao modelo de visualización. (#12964)

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` is removed. (#13211)
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` borrouse. (#13211)

segment.source: SCons now warns to build with a number of jobs that is equal to the number of logical processors in the system.
segment.target: SCons agora compílase con varias tarefas concurrrentes, igual ao número de procesadores lóxicos do sistema.

segment.source: This can dramatically decrease build times on multi core systems. (#13226, #13371)
segment.target: Esto pode reducir dramáticamente os tempos de compilación en sistemas multinúcleo. (#13226)

segment.source: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants are removed - please use `characterProcessing.SymbolLevel.*` instead. (#13248)
segment.target: As constantes `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` borráronse - por favor usa `characterProcessing.SymbolLevel.*` a cambio. (#13248)

segment.source: Functions `loadState` and `saveState` are removed from addonHandler - please use `addonHandler.state.load` and `addonHandler.state.save` instead. (#13245)
segment.target: As funcións `loadState` e `saveState` borráronse de addonHandler - por favor usa `addonHandler.state.load` e `addonHandler.state.save` a cambio. (#13245)

segment.source: Moved the UWP/OneCore interaction layer of NVDAHelper [from C++/CX to C++/Winrt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/cpp-and-winrt-apis/move-to-winrt-from-cx). (#10662)
segment.target: Moveuse a capa de interacción UWP/OneCore de NVDAHelper [de C++/CX a C++/Winrt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/cpp-and-winrt-apis/move-to-winrt-from-cx). (#10662)

segment.source: It is now mandatory to subclass `DictionaryDialog` to use it. (#13268)
segment.target: Agora é obrigatorio usar a subcrase `DictionaryDialog`. (#13268)

segment.source: `config.RUN_REGKEY`, `config.NVDA_REGKEY` are deprecated, please use `config.RegistryKey.RUN`, `config.RegistryKey.NVDA` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `config.RUN_REGKEY`, `config.NVDA_REGKEY` están obsoletas, por favor usa `config.RegistryKey.RUN`, `config.RegistryKey.NVDA` a cambio. Borraranse en 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.ROOT_KEY`, `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_PATH` are deprecated, please use`easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.ROOT`, `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.APP` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.ROOT_KEY`, `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_PATH` están obsoletas, por favor usa `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.ROOT`, `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.APP` a cambio. Borraranse en 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_NAME` has been deprecated, to be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_NAME` quedou obsoleta, borrarase en 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `DictionaryDialog` and `DictionaryEntryDialog` are moved from `gui.settingsDialogs` to `gui.speechDict`. (#13294)
segment.target: `DictionaryDialog` e `DictionaryEntryDialog` novéronse dende `gui.settingsDialogs` a `gui.speechDict`. (#13294)

segment.source: IAccessible2 relations are now shown in developer info for IAccessible2 objects. (#13315)
segment.target: As relacións IAccessible2 agora amósanse en información para desenvolvedores para obxectos IAccessible2. (#13315)

segment.source: `languageHandler.windowsPrimaryLCIDsToLocaleNames` has been removed, instead use `languageHandler.windowsLCIDToLocaleName` or `winKernel.LCIDToLocaleName`. (#13342)
segment.target: `languageHandler.windowsPrimaryLCIDsToLocaleNames` borrouse, a cambio usa `languageHandler.windowsLCIDToLocaleName` or `winKernel.LCIDToLocaleName`. (#13342)

segment.source: `UIAAutomationId` property for UIA objects should be preferred over `cachedAutomationId`. (#13125, #11447)
segment.target: A propiedade `UIAAutomationId` para obxectos UIA debería preferirse a `cachedAutomationId`. (#13125, #11447)
