segment.source: `cachedAutomationId` can be used if obtained directly from the element.
segment.target: `cachedAutomationId` pode usarse se se obtén directamente do elemento.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct` has moved to `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.Scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct`. (#13364)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct` moveuse a `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.Scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct`. (#13364)

segment.source: Boolean `gui.isInMessageBox` is removed, please use the function `gui.message.isModalMessageBoxActive` instead. (#12984, #13376)
segment.target: O boolean `gui.isInMessageBox` borrouse, por favor usa a función `gui.message.isModalMessageBoxActive` a cambio. (#12984, #13376)

segment.source: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules. (#12510, #13588)
segment.target: `controlTypes` separouse en varios submodules. (#12510, #13588)

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` have been replaced with `Role.*` and `State.*`.
segment.target: `ROLE_*` e `STATE_*` remprrazáronse por `Role.*` e `State.*`.

segment.source: Although still available, the following should be considered deprecated:
segment.target: Aíndaque todavía están dispoñibles, as seguintes deben considerarse obsoletas:

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*`, use `Role.*` and `State.*` instead.
segment.target: `ROLE_*` e `STATE_*`, usa `Role.*` e `State.*` a cambio.

segment.source: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels`, usages like `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced with their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.
segment.target: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` e `negativeStateLabels`, usos coma `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` deberíanse de remprazar polas súas equivalencias `Role.*.displayString` ou `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.

segment.source: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` should use `processAndLabelStates` instead.
segment.target: `processPositiveStates` e `processNegativeStates` deberían usar `processAndLabelStates` a cambio.

segment.source: Excel cell state constants (`NVSTATE_*`) are now values in the `NvCellState` enum, mirrored in the `NvCellState` enum in `NVDAObjects/window/excel.py` and mapped to `controlTypes.State` via _nvCellStatesToStates. (#13465)
segment.target: As constantes de celda de Excel (`NVSTATE_*`) agora son valores no enum `NvCellState`, refrectidas na enum `NvCellState` en `NVDAObjects/window/excel.py` e mapeadas en `controlTypes.State` a través de _nvCellStatesToStates. (#13465)

segment.source: `EXCEL_CELLINFO` struct member `state` is now `nvCellStates`.
segment.target: O menbro da estructura `EXCEL_CELLINFO` `state` agora é `nvCellStates`.

segment.source: `mathPres.ensureInit` has been removed, MathPlayer is now initialized when NVDA starts. (#13486)
segment.target: `mathPres.ensureInit` borrouse, MathPlayer agora reinicialízase cando o NVDA arranca. (#13486)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar un problema de seguridade.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, comunica responsablemente os fallos de seguridade a <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de Seguridade

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-xc5m-v23f-pgr7`.
segment.target: Arranxouse o aviso de seguridade `GHSA-xc5m-v23f-pgr7`.

segment.source: The symbol pronunciation dialog is now disabled in secure mode.
segment.target: O diálogo pronunciación de símbolos agora deshabilítase en modo seguro.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues raised.
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar varios problemas de seguridade descobertos.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, comunica responsablemente os fallos de seguridade a <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Arranxos de Seguridade

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-354r-wr4v-cx28`. (#13488)
segment.target: Arranxouse o aviso de seguridade `GHSA-354r-wr4v-cx28`. (#13488)

segment.source: Remove the ability to start NVDA with debug logging enabled when NVDA runs in secure mode.
segment.target: Quítase a capacidade de arrancar o NVDA co rexistro de depuración habilitado cando o NVDA se executa en modo seguro.

segment.source: Remove the ability to update NVDA when NVDA runs in secure mode.
segment.target: Quítase a capacidade de actualizar o NVDA cando o NVDA se execute en modo seguro.

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-wg65-7r23-h6p9`. (#13489)
segment.target: Arranxouse o aviso de seguridade `GHSA-wg65-7r23-h6p9`. (#13489)

segment.source: Remove the ability to open the input gestures dialog in secure mode.
segment.target: Quítase a capacidade de abrir o diálogo Xestos de Entrada en modo seguro.

segment.source: Remove the ability to open the default, temporary and voice dictionary dialogs in secure mode.
segment.target: Quítase a capacidade de abrir os diálogos de diccionario predeterminado, diccionario temporal e diccionario por voces en modo seguro.

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-mvc8-5rv9-w3hx`. (#13487)
segment.target: Arranxouse o aviso de seguridade `GHSA-mvc8-5rv9-w3hx`. (#13487)

segment.source: The wx GUI inspection tool is now disabled in secure mode.
segment.target: A utilidade wx GUI inspection agora está desactivada en modo seguro.

segment.source: This release is identical to 2021.3.2.
segment.target: Esta versión é idéntica á 2021.3.2.

segment.source: A bug existed in NVDA 2021.3.2 where it incorrectly identified itself as 2021.3.1.
segment.target: Existía un erro no NVDA 2021.3.2 no que se identificaba incorrectamente como 2021.3.1.

segment.source: This release correctly identifies itself as 2021.3.3.
segment.target: Nesta versión identifícase correctamente como 2021.3.3.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues raised.
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar varios problemas de seguridade atopados.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, comunica responsablemente os fallos de seguridade a <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: Security fix: Prevent object navigation outside of the lockscreen on Windows 10 and Windows 11. (#13328)
segment.target: Aranxo de seguridade: evítase a navegación de obxectos fora da pantalla de bloqueo en Windows 10 e Windows 11. (#13328)

segment.source: Security fix: The addons manager dialog is now disabled on secure screens. (#13059)
segment.target: Arranxo de seguridade: a caixa de diálogo do Administrador de complementos está agora desactivada nas pantallas seguras. (#13059)

segment.source: Security fix: NVDA context help is no longer available on secure screens. (#13353)
segment.target: Arranxo de seguridade: a axuda de contexto de NVDA xa non está dispoñible en pantallas seguras. (#13353)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several issues in 2021.3.
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar varios problemas en 2021.3.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: The new HID Braille protocol is no longer preferred when another braille display driver can be used. (#13153)
segment.target: O novo protocolo HID Braille xa non é o preferido cando se poda usar outro controlador de pantalla braille. (#13153)

segment.source: The new HID Braille protocol can be disabled via a setting in the advanced settings panel. (#13180)
segment.target: O novo protocolo HID Braille pode deshabilitarse a través dunha configuración no panel de opcións avanzadas. (#13180)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: Landmark is once again abbreviated in braille. #13158
segment.target: De novo acúrtanse as rexións en braille. #13158

segment.source: Fixed unstable braille display auto detection for Humanware Brailliant and APH Mantis Q40 braille displays when using Bluetooth. (#13153)
segment.target: Arranxada a autodeteción inestable das pantallas braille Humanware Brailliant e APH Mantis Q40 cando se usa o Bluetooth. (#13153)

segment.source: This release introduces support for the new HID Braille specification.
segment.target: Esta versión introduce o soporte para a nova especificación Braille HID.

segment.source: This specification aims to standardise support for Braille Displays without needing individual drivers.
segment.target: Esta especificación tenta estandarizar o soporte de pantallas braille sen a necesidade de controladores individuais.

segment.source: There are updates to eSpeak-NG and LibLouis, including new Russian and Tshivenda tables.
segment.target: Hai actualizacións para eSpeak-NG e LibLouis, incluindo táboas novas para ruso e Tshivenda.

segment.source: Error sounds can be enabled in stable builds of NVDA via a new advanced settings option.
segment.target: Os sons de erro poden habilitarse en compilacións estables de NVDA a través dunha opción nova nas opcións avanzadas.

segment.source: Say all in Word now scrolls the view to keep the current position visible.
segment.target: Falar todo en Word agora despraza a vista para manter visible a posición actual.

segment.source: There are lots of improvements when using Office with UIA.
segment.target: Hai moitas melloras ao se usar Office con UIA.

segment.source: One UIA fix is that Outlook now ignores more types of layout tables in messages.
segment.target: Un dos arranxos de UIA é que Outlook agora ignora máis tipos de táboas de deseño nas mensaxes.

segment.source: Important notes:
segment.target: Notas importantes:

segment.source: Due to an update to our security certificate, a small number of users get an error when NVDA 2021.2 checks for updates.
segment.target: Debido a unha actualización do noso certificado de seguridade, un pequeno número de usuarios obtén un erro cando o NVDA 2021.2 procura actualizacións.

segment.source: NVDA now asks Windows to update security certificates, which will prevent this error in future.
segment.target: O NVDA agora pide a Windows que actualice os certificados de seguridade, o que evitará este erro no futuro.

segment.source: Affected users will need to download this update manually.
segment.target: Os usuarios afectados terán que descargar esta actualización manualmente.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Adds an input gesture for toggling settings for reporting the style of cell borders. (#10408)
segment.target: Engádese un xesto de entrada para conmutar opcións para anunciar o estilo de bordes da celda. (#10408)

segment.source: Support for the new HID Braille specification which aims to standardise support for Braille Displays. (#12523)
segment.target: Soporte para a nova especificación HID Braille que pretende estandarizar o soporte para pantallas Braille. (#12523)

segment.source: Devices that support this specification will be auto detected by NVDA.
segment.target: Os dispositivos que admitan esta especificación autodetectaranse polo NVDA.

segment.source: For technical details on NVDA's implementation of this specification, see https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/devDocs/hidBrailleTechnicalNotes.md
segment.target: Para máis detalles técnicos sobre a implementación de NVDA desta especificación, consulta https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/devDocs/hidBrailleTechnicalNotes.md

segment.source: Add support for the VisioBraille Vario 4 Braille Device. (#12607)
segment.target: Engadido o soporte para o dispositivo braille VisioBraille Vario 4. (#12607)

segment.source: Error notifications can be enabled (advanced settings) when using any version of NVDA. (#12672)
segment.target: Pódense habilitar as notificacións de erro (opcións avanzadas) cando se use calquera versión do NVDA. (#12672)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and later, NVDA will announce the suggestion count when entering search terms in apps such as Settings and Microsoft Store. (#7330, #12758, #12790)
segment.target: En Windows 10 e posterior, o NVDA anunciará o reconto de suxerencias ao introducir termos de busca en aplicacións como a configuración e a Tenda de Microsoft. (#7330, #12758, #12790)

segment.source: Table navigation is now supported in grid controls created using the Out-GridView cmdlet in PowerShell. (#12928)
segment.target: A navegación por táboas é agora compatible cos controis de grella creados mediante o cmdlet Out-GridView en PowerShell. (#12928)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `74068b91bcd578bd7030a7a6cde2085114b79b44`. (#12665)
segment.target: Espeak-ng actualizouse a 1.51-dev commit `74068b91bcd578bd7030a7a6cde2085114b79b44`. (#12665)

segment.source: NVDA will default to eSpeak if no installed OneCore voices support the NVDA preferred language. (#10451)
segment.target: o NVDA usará por defecto eSpeak se non hai voces OneCore instaladas que admitan a lingua preferida en NVDA. (#10451)

segment.source: If OneCore voices consistently fail to speak, revert to eSpeak as a synthesizer. (#11544)
segment.target: Se as voces OneCore non falan con consistencia vóltase a usar a eSpeak coma sintetizador. (#11544)

segment.source: When reading status bar with `NVDA+end`, the review cursor is no longer moved to its location.
segment.target: Ao ler a barra de estado con `NVDA+fin`, o cursor de revisión xa non se move á súa localización.

segment.source: If you need this functionality please assign a gesture to the appropriate script in the Object Navigation category in the Input Gestures dialog. (#8600)
segment.target: Se necesitas esta funcionalidade por favor asigna un xesto ao script apropriado na categoría Navegador de obxectos no diálogo xestos de Entrada. (#8600)

segment.source: When opening a settings dialog which is already open, NVDA sets focus on the existing dialog rather than raise an error. (#5383)
segment.target: Ao abrir unha caixa de diálogo de opcións que xa estea aberta, o NVDA pon o foco na caixa de diálogo existente en lugar de xerar un erro. (#5383)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.19.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.19.0). (#12810)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille liblouis a [3.19.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.19.0). (#12810)

segment.source: New braille tables: Russian grade 1, Tshivenda grade 1, Tshivenda grade 2
segment.target: Novas tablas braille: Ruso grao 1, Tshivenda grao 1, Tshivenda grao 2

segment.source: Instead of "marked content" or "mrkd", "highlight" or "hlght" will be announced for speech and braille respectively. (#12892)
segment.target: En lugar de "contenido marcado" ou "mar", anunciarase "resaltado" ou "rstd" para a voz e o braille respectivamente. (#12892)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer attempt to exit when dialogs are awaiting a required action (eg Confirm/Cancel). (#12984)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non tentará saír cando os diálogos estean a esperar unha acción requerida (ex.: Confirmar/Cancelar). (#12984)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Fallos

segment.source: Tracking keyboard modifiers (such as Control, or Insert) is more robust when watchdog is recovering. (#12609)
segment.target: O seguemento das teclas modificadoras (coma Control, ou Insertar) é máis robusto cando watchdog se estea recuperando. (#12609)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#12729)
segment.target: Volta a seren posible comprobar as actualizacións do NVDA en certos sistemas; por exemplo, instalacións limpas de Windows. (#12729)

segment.source: NVDA correctly announces blank table cells in Microsoft Word when using UI automation. (#11043)
segment.target: O NVDA anuncia correctamente as celdas da táboa en branco en Microsoft Word cando se usa UI automation. (#11043)

segment.source: In ARIA data grid cells on the web, the Escape key will now be passed through to the grid and no longer turn off focus mode unconditionally. (#12413)
segment.target: Nas celdas da grella de datos ARIA na web, a tecla Escape agora pasará á grella e xa non desactivará o modo foco incondicionalmente. (#12413)

segment.source: When reading a header cell of a table in Chrome, fix the column name being announced twice. (#10840)
segment.target: Ao ler unha celda de cabeceira dunha táboa en Chrome, arránxase que o nome da columna se anuncie dúas veces. (#10840)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports a numerical value for UIA sliders that have a textual representation of their value defined. (UIA ValuePattern is now preferred over RangeValuePattern). (#12724)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non informa dun valor numérico para os deslizadores UIA que teñan definida unha representación textual do seu valor. (Agora prefírese UIA ValuePattern a RangeValuePattern). (#12724)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats the value of UIA sliders as always percentage based.
segment.target: O NVDA xa non trata o valor dos deslizadores de UIA coma se fora sempre porcentual.

segment.source: Reporting the location of a cell in Microsoft Excel when accessed via UI Automation again works correctly on Windows 11. (#12782)
segment.target: A notificación da ubicación dunha celda en Microsoft Excel cando se acesa a través de UI Automation volta a funcionar correctamente en Windows 11. (#12782)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sets invalid Python locales. (#12753)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non estabrece configuracións rexionais de Python non válidas. (#12753)

segment.source: If a disabled addon is uninstalled and then re-installed it is re-enabled. (#12792)
segment.target: Se se desinstala un compremento deshabilitado e se volta a instalar, vóltase a habilitar. (#12792)

segment.source: Fixed bugs around updating and removing addons where the addon folder has been renamed or has files opened. (#12792, #12629)
segment.target: Arranxáronse os erros relacionados coa actualización e borrado de comprementos cando o cartafol de comprementos se renomeara ou teña arquivos abertos. (#12792, #12629)

segment.source: When using UI Automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls, NVDA no longer redundantly announces when a single cell is selected. (#12530)
segment.target: Cando se usa UI automation para acesar aos controis das follas de cálculo de Microsoft Excel, o NVDA xa non anuncia de xeito redundante cando se seleciona unha soa celda. (#12530)

segment.source: More dialog text is automatically read in LibreOffice Writer, such as in confirmation dialogs. (#11687)
segment.target: Lese automáticamente máis texto de diálogo en LibreOffice Writer, coma nos diálogos de confirmación. (#11687)

segment.source: Reading / navigating with browse mode in Microsoft Word via UI automation now ensures the document is always scrolled so that the current browse mode position is visible, and that the caret position in focus mode correctly reflects the browse mode position. (#9611)
segment.target: A lectura e navegación co modo exploración en Microsoft Word a través de UI automation agora garante que o documento sempre se desprace para que a posición actual do modo exploración sexa visible, e que a posición do cursor no modo foco reflicta correctamente a posición do modo exploración. (#9611)

segment.source: When performing Say all in Microsoft Word via UI automation, the document is now automatically scrolled, and the caret position is correctly updated. (#9611)
segment.target: Cando se realiza a función "Falar todo" en Microsoft Word mediante UI automation, o documento desprázase automáticamente e a posición do cursor actualízase correctamente. (#9611)

segment.source: When reading emails in Outlook and NVDA is accessing the message with UI Automation, certain tables are now marked as layout tables, which means they will no longer be reported by default. (#11430)
segment.target: Cando se len correos electrónicos en Outlook e o NVDA está acesando aá mensaxe con UI automation, certas táboas están agora marcadas coma táboas de deseño, o que significa que xa non serán anunciadas por defecto. (#11430)

segment.source: A rare error when changing audio devices has been fixed. (#12620)
segment.target: Arranxouse un erro pouco frecuente ao cambiar os dispositivos de audio. (#12620)

segment.source: Input with literary braille tables should behave more reliably when in edit fields. (#12667)
segment.target: A entrada con táboas braille literarias debería comportarse de xeito máis fiable cando se trata de campos de edición. (#12667)

segment.source: When navigating the Windows system tray calendar, NVDA now reports the day of the week in full. (#12757)
segment.target: Ao navegar polo calendario da bandexa do sistema de Windows, o NVDA anuncia agora o día da semán na súa totalidade. (#12757)

segment.source: When using a Chinese input method such as Taiwan - Microsoft Quick in Microsoft Word, scrolling the braille display forward and backward no longer incorrectly keeps jumping back to the original caret position. (#12855)
segment.target: Cando se usa un método de entrada en chino como Taiwán - Microsoft Quick en Microsoft Word, o desprazamento da pantalla braille cara adiante e cara atrás xa non salta incorrectamente á posición orixinal do cursor. (#12855)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Word documents via UIA, navigating by sentence (alt+downArrow / alt+upArrow) is again possible. (#9254)
segment.target: Ao acesar a documentos de Microsoft Word a través de UIA, a navegación por frases (alt+flecha abajo / alt+flecha arriba) volta a seren posible. (#9254)

segment.source: When accessing MS Word with UIA, paragraph indenting is now reported. (#12899)
segment.target: Ao acesar a MS Word con UIA, agora anúnciase a sangría dos parágrafos. (#12899)

segment.source: When accessing MS Word with UIA, change tracking command and some other localized commands are now reported in Word . (#12904)
segment.target: Ao aceder a MS Word con UIA, agora anúnciase a orde de seguemento de cambios e algunhas outras ordes localizadas en Word. (#12904)

segment.source: Fixed duplicate braille and speech when 'description' matches 'content' or 'name'. (#12888)
segment.target: Arranxados os duplicados en braille e voz cando a 'descripción' coincida co 'contido' ou co 'nome'. (#12888)

segment.source: In MS Word with UIA enabled, more accurate playing of spelling error sounds as you type. (#12161)
segment.target: En MS Word con UIA activado, hai unha reprodución máis precisa dos sons de erros ortográficos mentres se escribe. (#12161)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer announce "pane" when pressing Alt+Tab to switch between programs. (#12648)
segment.target: En Windows 11, o NVDA xa non anunciará "panel" ao premer Alt+Tab para cambiar de programa. (#12648)

segment.source: The new Modern Comments side track pane is now supported in MS Word when not accessing the document via UIA. Press alt+f12 to move between the side track pane and the document. (#12982)
segment.target: O novo panel lateral de seguemento de Comentarios Modernos agora é compatible co MS Word cando non se acceda ao documento a través de UIA. Preme alt+f12 para moverte entre o panel lateral de seguemento e o documento. (#12982)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2019 16.10.4 or later.
segment.target: Compilar NVDA agora require Visual Studio 2019 16.10.4 ou posterior.

segment.source: To match the production build environment, update Visual Studio to keep in sync with the [current version AppVeyor is using](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/windows-images-software/#visual-studio-2019). (#12728)
segment.target: Para que coincida co entorno de compilación de producción, actualiza Visual Studio para que estea sincronizado coa [versión actual que AppVeyor está usando](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/windows-images-software/#visual-studio-2019). (#12728)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been deprecated for removal in 2022.1. (#12660)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` foi marcado coma obsoleto para eliminar en 2022.1. (#12660)

segment.source: Instead use `apiLevel` (see the comments at `_UIAConstants.WinConsoleAPILevel` for details).
segment.target: No seu lugar usa `apiLevel` (consulta os comentarios en `_UIAConstants.WinConsoleAPILevel` para máis detalles).

segment.source: Transparency of text background color sourced from GDI applications (via the display model), is now exposed for add-ons or appModules. (#12658)
segment.target: A transparencia da cor de fondo do texto procedente das aplicacións GDI (a través do modelo de visualización), está agora exposta para os complementos ou appModules. (#12658)

segment.source: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are moved to the `LOCALE` enum in languageHandler.
segment.target: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` e `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` movéronse ao enum de `LOCALE` en languageHandler.

segment.source: They are still available at the module level but are deprecated and to be removed in NVDA 2022.1. (#12753)
segment.target: Aínda están dispoñibles a nivel de módulo, pero están obsoletos e eliminaranse en NVDA 2022.1. (#12753)

segment.source: The usage of functions `addonHandler.loadState` and `addonHandler.saveState` should be replaced with their equivalents `addonHandler.state.save` and `addonHandler.state.load` before 2022.1. (#12792)
segment.target: O uso das funcións `addonHandler.loadState` e `addonHandler.saveState` debe sustituirse polas súas equivalentes `addonHandler.state.save` e `addonHandler.state.load` antes de 2022.1. (#12792)

segment.source: Braille output can now be checked in system tests. (#12917)
segment.target: A saída braille agora pódese comprobar en probas do sistema. (#12917)

segment.source: This release introduces preliminary Windows 11 support.
segment.target: Esta versión introduce o soporte preliminar para Windows 11.

segment.source: While Windows 11 is yet to be released, this release has been tested on preview versions of Windows 11.
segment.target: Aínda que Windows 11 non se lanzou, esta versión provouse en versións preliminares de Windows 11.

segment.source: This includes an important fix for Screen Curtain (see important notes).
segment.target: Inclúese un arranxo importante para a Cortina de Pantalla (consulta Notas importantes).

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool can now resolve more problems when running NVDA.
segment.target: A ferramenta COM Registration Fixing agora pode resolver máis problemas cando se executa o NVDA.

segment.source: There are updates to the synthesizer eSpeak and braille translator LibLouis.
segment.target: Hai actualizacións para o sintetizador eSpeak e para o transcriptor braille LibLouis.

segment.source: There are also various bug fixes and improvements, notably for braille support and Windows terminals, calculator, emoji panel and clipboard history.
segment.target: Tamén hai varios arranxos de fallos e melloras, en particular para o soporte de braille e para as terminais de Windows, para a calculadora, o panel de emoji e para o historial do portapapeis.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Notas importantes

segment.source: Due to a change in the Windows Magnification API, Screen Curtain had to be updated to support the newest versions of Windows.
segment.target: Debido a un cambio na API Windows Magnification, a Cortina de Pantalla tivo que seren actualizada para admitir as versións máis novas de Windows.

segment.source: Use NVDA 2021.2 to activate Screen Curtain with Windows 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) or later.
segment.target: Usa o NVDA 2021.2 para activar a Cortina de Pantalla con Windows 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) ou posteriores.

segment.source: This includes Windows 10 Insiders and Windows 11.
segment.target: Esto inclúe Windows 10 Insiders e Windows 11.

segment.source: For security purposes, when using a new version of Windows, get visual confirmation that the Screen Curtain makes the screen entirely black.
segment.target: Por razóns de seguridade, ao usar unha versión nova de Windows, obtén unha confirmación visual de que a Cortina de Pantalla faga que esta estea totalmente negra.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas características

segment.source: Experimental support for ARIA annotations:
segment.target: Soporte experimental para anotacións ARIA:

segment.source: adds a command to read a summary of details of an object with aria-details. (#12364)
segment.target: engade unha orde para ler un resumo de detalles dun obxecto con aria-details. (#12364)

segment.source: adds an option in advanced preferences to report if an object has details in browse mode. (#12439)
segment.target: engade unha opción en preferencias avanzadas para anunciar se un obxecto ten detalles en modo Exploración. (#12439)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Version 1909 and later (including Windows 11), NVDA will announce suggestion count when performing searches in File Explorer. (#10341, #12628)
segment.target: En Windows 10 Versión 1909 e posteriores (incluindo Windows 11), o NVDA anunciará o reconto de suxerencias ao se realizar buscas no Explorador de Arquivos. (#10341, #12628)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the result of indent and hanging indent shortcuts when executed. (#6269)
segment.target: En Microsoft Word, o NVDA agora anuncia o resultado dos atallos de sangría e sangría francesa cando se executen. (#6269)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `ab11439b18238b7a08b965d1d5a6ef31cbb05cbb`. (#12449, #12202, #12280, #12568)
segment.target: Espeak-ng actualizouse a 1.51-dev commit `ab11439b18238b7a08b965d1d5a6ef31cbb05cbb`. (#12449, #12202, #12280, #12568)

segment.source: If article is enabled in the user preferences for document formatting, NVDA announces "article" after the content. (#11103)
segment.target: Se se activa artigo nas preferencias de usuario para formateado de documentos, o NVDA anuncia "artigo" despois do contido. (#11103)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.18.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.18.0). (#12526)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille liblouis a [3.18.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.18.0). (#12526)

segment.source: New braille tables: Bulgarian grade 1, Burmese grade 1, Burmese grade 2, Kazakh grade 1, Khmer grade 1, Northern Kurdish grade 0, Sepedi grade 1, Sepedi grade 2, Sesotho grade 1, Sesotho grade 2, Setswana grade 1, Setswana grade 2, Tatar grade 1, Vietnamese grade 0, Vietnamese grade 2, Southern Vietnamese grade 1, Xhosa grade 1, Xhosa grade 2, Yakut grade 1, Zulu grade 1, Zulu grade 2
segment.target: Novas táboas braille: Búlgaro grao 1, Birmano grao 1, Birmano grao 2, Kazaxo grao 1, Xemer grao 1, Kurdo do norte grao 0, Sepedi grao 1, Sepedi grao 2, Sesotho grao 1, Sesotho grao 2, Setswana grao 1, Setswana grao 2, Tártaro grao 1, Vietnamés grao 0, Vietnamés grao 2, Vietnamés do sul grao 1, Xhosa grao 1, Xhosa grao 2, Yakut grao 1, Zulú grao 1, Zulú grao 2

segment.source: Windows 10 OCR was renamed to Windows OCR. (#12690)
segment.target: O OCR de Windows 10 pasou a chamarse OCR de Windows. (#12690)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Corrección de Erros

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will announce calculator expressions on a braille display. (#12268)
segment.target: Na Calculadora de Windows 10, o NVDA anunciará as expresións da calculadora sobre a pantalla braille. (#12268)

segment.source: In terminal programs on Windows 10 version 1607 and later, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters to the right of the caret are no longer read out. (#3200)
segment.target: Nos programas de terminal en Windows 10 versión 1607 e posterior, ao se insertar ou se eliminar caracteres no medio dunha liña, xa non se len os caracteres á dereita do cursor. (#3200)

segment.source: Diff Match Patch now enabled by default. (#12485)
segment.target: Agora Diff Match Patch actívase por defecto. (#12485)

segment.source: The braille input works properly with the following contracted tables: Arabic grade 2, Spanish grade 2, Urdu grade 2, Chinese (China, Mandarin) grade 2. (#12541)
segment.target: A entrada braille funciona correctamente coas seguintes táboas contraídas: Árabe grao 2, Español grao 2, Urdu grao 2, Chino (China, Mandarín) grao 2. (#12541)

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool now resolves more issues, especially on 64 bit Windows. (#12560)
segment.target: A ferramenta COM Registration Fixing agora resolve máis problemas, especialmente en Windows de 64 bit. (#12560)

segment.source: Improvements to button handling for the Seika Notetaker braille device from Nippon Telesoft. (#12598)
segment.target: Melloras ao manexo de botóns para o dispositivo braille Seika Notetaker de Nippon Telesoft. (#12598)

segment.source: Improvements to announcing the Windows emoji panel and clipboard history. (#11485)
segment.target: Melloras para anunciar o panel de emoji de Windows e o historial do portapapeis. (#11485)

segment.source: Updated the Bengali alphabet character descriptions. (#12502)
segment.target: Actualizáronse as descripcións dos caracteres do alfabeto Bengalí. (#12502)

segment.source: NVDA exits safely when a new process is started. (#12605)
segment.target: O NVDA sae de xeito seguro cando se inicie un novo proceso. (#12605)

segment.source: Reselecting the Handy Tech braille display driver from the Select Braille Display dialog no longer causes errors. (#12618)
segment.target: Voltar a selecionar o controlador da pantalla braille Handy Tech dende o diálogo Selecionar Pantalla Braille xa non provoca erros. (#12618)

segment.source: Windows version 10.0.22000 or later is recognized as Windows 11, not Windows 10. (#12626)
segment.target: A versión de Windows 10.0.22000 ou posterior recoñécese como Windows 11, non coma Windows 10. (#12626)

segment.source: Screen curtain support has been fixed and tested for Windows versions up until 10.0.22000. (#12684)
segment.target: Arranxouse e probouse a compatibilidade da cortina de pantalla para versións de Windows hasta a 10.0.22000. (#12684)

segment.source: If no results are shown when filtering input gestures, the input gesture configuration dialog continues to work as expected. (#12673)
segment.target: Se non se amosan resultados ao filtrar os xestos de entrada, o diálogo de configuración de xestos de entrada segue funcionando coma se esperaba. (#12673)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where the first menu item of a submenu is not announced in some contexts. (#12624)
segment.target: Arranxouse un fallo onde o primeiro elemento de menú dun submenú non se anuncia nalgúns contextos. (#12624)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants should be replaced using their equivalent `SymbolLevel.*` before 2022.1. (#11856, #12636)
segment.target: A constante `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` debería substituirse usando a súa equivalente `SymbolLevel.*` antes de 2022.1. (#11856, #12636)

segment.source: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules, symbols marked for deprecation must be replaced before 2022.1. (#12510)
segment.target: `controlTypes` dibidiuse en varios submódulos, os símbolos marcados como obsoletos deben reemprazarse antes de 2022.1. (#12510)

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` constants should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*` and `State.*`.
segment.target: As constantes `ROLE_*` e `STATE_*` deberían reemprazarse polas súas equivalentes `Role.*` e `State.*`.

segment.source: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels` have been deprecated, usages such as `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.
segment.target: As constantes `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` e `negativeStateLabels` quedaron obsoletas, os usos como `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` deberían reemprazarse polas súas equivalentes `Role.*.displayString` ou `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.

segment.source: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` have been deprecated for removal.
segment.target: As etiquetas `processPositiveStates` e `processNegativeStates` quedaron obsoletas para a súa eliminación.

segment.source: On Windows 10 Version 1511 and later (including Insider Preview builds), the current Windows feature update release name is obtained from Windows Registry. (#12509)
segment.target: En Windows 10 Versión 1511 e posterior (incluindo compilaciones Insider Preview), o nome actual da versión da característica de actualización de Windows obtense do Rexistro de Windows. (#12509)

segment.source: Deprecated: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` will be removed in 2022.1, there is no direct replacement. (#12544)
segment.target: Obsoleto: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` eliminarase en 2022.1, non hai un reemprazo directo. (#12544)

segment.source: This release includes optional experimental support for UIA in Excel and Chromium browsers.
segment.target: Esta versión inclúe soporte experimental opcional para UIA en Excel e navegadores Chromium.

segment.source: There are fixes for several languages, and for accessing links in Braille.
segment.target: Hai correcións para varias linguas e para aceso ás ligas en braille.

segment.source: There are updates to Unicode CLDR, mathematical symbols, and LibLouis.
segment.target: Hai actualizacións para Unicode CLDR, para símbolos matemáticos e para LibLouis.

segment.source: As well as many bug fixes and improvements, including in Office, Visual Studio, and several languages.
segment.target: Así coma moitas outras correcións e melloras incluindo Office, Visual Studio e varias linguas.

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Nota:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Esta versión rompe a compatibilidade cos complementos existentes.

segment.source: This release also drops support for Adobe Flash.
segment.target: Esta versión tamén deixa de seren compatible co Adobe Flash.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Early support for UIA with Chromium based browsers (such as Edge). (#12025)
segment.target: Soporte preliminar para UIA con navegadores baseados en Chromium (como Edge). (#12025)

segment.source: Optional experimental support for Microsoft Excel via UI Automation. Only recommended for Microsoft Excel build 16.0.13522.10000 or higher. (#12210)
segment.target: Soporte experimental opcional para Microsoft Excel a través de UI Automation. Só se recomenda para Microsoft Excel compilación 16.0.13522.10000 ou superior. (#12210)

segment.source: Easier navigation of output in NVDA Python Console. (#9784)
segment.target: Navegación máis sinxela da saída na Consola Python do NVDA. (#9784)

segment.source: alt+up/down jumps to the previous/next output result (add shift for selecting).
segment.target: alt+arriba/abaixo salta ao resultado anterior/seguinte (engade shift para selecionar).

segment.source: control+l clears the output pane.
segment.target: control+l borra o panel de saída.

segment.source: NVDA now reports the categories assigned to an appointment in Microsoft Outlook, if any. (#11598)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anuncia as categorías asignadas a unha cita en Microsoft Outlook se a hai. (#11598)

segment.source: Support for the Seika Notetaker braille display from Nippon Telesoft. (#11514)
segment.target: Soporte para a pantalla braille do Anotador Electrónico Seika de Nippon Telesoft. (#11514)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: In browse mode, controls can now be activated with braille cursor routing on their descriptor (ie. "lnk" for a link). This is especially useful for activating eg. check-boxes with no labels. (#7447)
segment.target: En modo Exploración, os controis agora poden activarse cos sensores de seguemento braille sobre o seu descriptor (Ex.: "lig" para unha liga). esto é especialmente útil para activar, por exemplo, caixas de verificación sen etiquetas. (#7447)

segment.source: NVDA now prevents the user from performing Windows 10 OCR if screen curtain is enabled. (#11911)
segment.target: O NVDA agora evita que o usuario faga o OCR de Windows 10 se a cortina de pantalla está habilitada. (#11911)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) to 39.0. (#11943, #12314)
segment.target: Actualizado o repositorio Unicode Common Locale Data (CLDR) a 39.0. (#11943), #12314)

segment.source: Added more mathematical symbols to the symbols dictionary. (#11467)
segment.target: Engadidos máis signos matemáticos ao diccionario de símbolos. (#11467)

segment.source: The user guide, changes file, and key commands listing now have a refreshed appearance. (#12027)
segment.target: A guía do usuario, o ficheiro de cambios e a listaxe de teclas de ordes agora teñen un aspecto remozado. (#12027)

segment.source: "Unsupported" now reported when attempting to toggle screen layout in applications that do not support it, such as Microsoft Word. (#7297)
segment.target: Agora anúnciase "non soportado" cando se tente cambiar o deseño de pantalla en aplicacións que non o admitan como Microsoft Word. (#7297)

segment.source: 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel now enabled by default. (#10885)
segment.target: A opción 'Tentar cancelar a voz para eventos de foco caducados' no panel de opcións avanzadas agora está activada por defecto. (#10885)

segment.source: This behaviour can be disabled by setting this option to "No".
segment.target: Este comportamento pódese desactivar configurando esta opción como "Non".

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly.
segment.target: As aplicacións web (Ex.: Gmail) xa non falan información obsoleta cando se mova o foco rápidamente.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.17.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.17.0). (#12137)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille liblouis a [3.17.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.17.0). (#12137)

segment.source: New braille tables: Belarusian literary braille, Belarusian computer braille, Urdu grade 1, Urdu grade 2.
segment.target: Novas táboas braille: braille literario bielorruso, braille computerizado bielorruso, Urdu grao 1, Urdu grao 2.

segment.source: Support for Adobe Flash content has been removed from NVDA due to the use of Flash being actively discouraged by Adobe. (#11131)
segment.target: O soporte para contido Adobe Flash eliminouse do NVDA debido a que Adobe desaconsella activamente o uso de Flash. (#11131)

segment.source: NVDA will exit even with windows still open, the exit process now closes all NVDA windows and dialogs. (#1740)
segment.target: O NVDA sairá incluso con xanelas aínda abertas, o proceso de saída agora pecha todas as xanelas e diálogos do NVDA. (#1740)

segment.source: The Speech Viewer can now be closed with `alt+F4` and has a standard close button for easier interaction with users of pointing devices. (#12330)
segment.target: O Visualizador de Voz agora pode pecharse con `alt+F4` e ten un botón pechar estándar para unha interación máis sinxela cos usuarios de dispositivos sinaladores. (#12330)

segment.source: The Braille Viewer now has a standard close button for easier interaction with users of pointing devices. (#12328)
segment.target: O Visualizador Braille agora ten un botón pechar estándar para unha interación máis sinxela con usuarios de dispositivos sinaladores. (#12328)

segment.source: In the Elements List dialog, the accelerator key on the "Activate" button has been removed in some locales to avoid collision with an element type radio button label. When available, the button is still the default of the dialog and as such can still be invoked by simply pressing enter from the elements list itself. (#6167)
segment.target: Na caixa de diálogo listaxe de elementos, eliminouse a tecla rápida do botón "Activar" en algunhas localizacións para evitar a colisión coa etiqueta do botón de opción do tipo de elemento. Cando estea dispoñible, o botón segue a ser o predeterminado do diálogo e, como tal, pode seguer sendo chamado simplemente premendo intro dende a propria listaxe de elementos. (#6167)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Fallos

segment.source: The list of messages in Outlook 2010 is once again readable. (#12241)
segment.target: A listaxe de mensaxes en Outlook 2010 volta a ser lexible. (#12241)

segment.source: In terminal programs on Windows 10 version 1607 and later, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters to the right of the caret are no longer read out. (#3200)
segment.target: En programas de terminal en Windows 10 versión 1607 e posteriores, ao se insertar ou eliminar caracteres en medio dunha liña, xa non se len os caracteres á dereita do cursor. (#3200)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled in NVDA's advanced settings panel by changing the diff algorithm to Diff Match Patch.
segment.target: Esta correción experimental debe habilitarse manualmente no panel de opcións avanzadas do NVDA cambiando o algoritmo diff a Diff Match Patch.

segment.source: In MS Outlook, inappropriate distance reporting when shift+tabbing from the message body to the subject field should not occur anymore. (#10254)
segment.target: En MS Outlook, xa non debería producirse un anunciado de distancia inapropriada cando se faga shift+tabulador dende o corpo da mensaxe ao campo de asunto. (#10254)

segment.source: In the Python Console, inserting a tab for indentation at the beginning of a non-empty input line and performing tab-completion in the middle of an input line are now supported. (#11532)
segment.target: Na consola de Python, agora admítese a inserción dun tabulador para a sangría ao comenzo dunha liña de entrada non valdeira e a realización dun tabulador en medio dunha liña de entrada. (#11532)

segment.source: Formatting information and other browseable messages no longer present unexpected blank lines when screen layout is turned off. (#12004)
segment.target: A información de formato e outras mensaxes navegables xa non presentan liñas en branco inesperadas cando o deseño de pantalla estea desactivado. (#12004)

segment.source: It is now possible to read comments in MS Word with UIA enabled. (#9285)
segment.target: Agora é posible ler comentarios en MS Word co UIA activado. (#9285)

segment.source: Performance when interacting with Visual Studio has been improved. (#12171)
segment.target: Mellorouse o rendemento ao interactuar con Visual Studio. (#12171)

segment.source: Fix graphical bugs such as missing elements when using NVDA with a right-to-left layout. (#8859)
segment.target: Arranxáronse erros gráficos como a falla de elementos cando se utiliza NVDA con un deseño de dereita a esquerda. (#8859)

segment.source: Respect the GUI layout direction based on the NVDA language, not the system locale. (#638)
segment.target: Respétase a direción da disposición da GUI baseada na lingua do NVDA, non na configuración rexional do sistema. (#638)

segment.source: known issue for right-to-left languages: the right border of groupings clips with labels/controls. (#12181)
segment.target: Problema coñecido para linguas de dereita a esquerda: O borde dereito dos grupos recórtase coas etiquetas e controis. (#12181)

segment.source: The python locale is set to match the language selected in preferences consistently, and will occur when using the default language. (#12214)
segment.target: A configuración rexional de Python establécese para que coincida coa lingua selecionada nas preferencias de forma consistente, e ocorrerá cando se use a lingua por defecto. (#12214)

segment.source: TextInfo.getTextInChunks no longer freezes when called on Rich Edit controls such as the NVDA log viewer. (#11613)
segment.target: TextInfo.getTextInChunks xa non se conxela cando se chame a controis de edición enriquecida como o visor de rexistro do NVDA. (#11613)

segment.source: It is once again possible to use NVDA in languages containing underscores in the locale name such as de_CH on Windows 10 1803 and 1809. (#12250)
segment.target: Volta a ser posible usar o NVDA en linguas que conteñan guions baixos no nome da configuración rexional, como de_CH, en Windows 10 1803 e 1809. (#12250)

segment.source: In WordPad, configuration of superscript/subscript reporting works as expected. (#12262)
segment.target: En WordPad, a configuración do anunciado de superíndice e subíndice funciona coma se esperaba. (#12262)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce the newly focused content on a web page if the old focus disappears and is replaced by the new focus in the same position. (#12147)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non falla ao anunciar o contido recén enfocado nunha páxina web se o antigo foco desaparece e é reemplazado polo novo foco na mesma posición. (#12147)

segment.source: Strikethrough, superscript and subscript formatting for entire Excel cells are now reported if the corresponding option is enabled. (#12264)
segment.target: O tachado, o superíndice e o subíndice das celdas enteiras de Excel agora anúncianse se a opción correspondente está activada. (#12264)

segment.source: Fixed copying config during installation from a portable copy when default destination config directory is empty. (#12071, #12205)
segment.target: Arranxouse a copia da configuración durante a instalación dende unha copia portátil cando o directorio de configuración de destiño por defecto está valdeiro. (#12071, #12205)

segment.source: Fixed incorrect announcement of some letters with accents or diacritic when 'Say cap before capitals' option is checked. (#11948)
segment.target: Arranxado o anunciado incorrecto dalgunhas letras con acentos ou diacríticos cando a opción 'Dicir maiús antes de maiúsculas' está marcada. (#11948)

segment.source: Fixed the pitch change failure in SAPI4 speech synthesizer. (#12311)
segment.target: Arranxouse o fallo de cambio de ton no sintetizador de voz SAPI4. (#12311)

segment.source: The NVDA installer now also honors the `--minimal` command line parameter and does not play the start-up sound, following the same documented behavior as an installed or portable copy NVDA executable. (#12289)
segment.target: O instalador do NVDA agora tamén respeta o parámetro de liña de ordes `--minimal` e non reproduce o son de inicio, seguindo o mesmo comportamento documentado que un executable do NVDA instalado ou con copia portátil. (#12289)

segment.source: In MS Word or Outlook, the table quick navigation key can now jump to layout table if "Include layout tables" option is enabled in Browse mode settings. (#11899)
segment.target: En MS Word ou Outlook, a tecla rápida de navegación da táboa agora pode saltar á táboa de deseño se a opción "Incluir tablas de deseño" está activada na configuración do modo de navegación. (#11899)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "↑↑↑" for emojis in particular languages. (#11963)
segment.target: NVDA xa non anunciará "↑↑↑" para emojis en linguas en particular. (#11963)

segment.source: Espeak now supports Cantonese and Mandarin again. (#10418)
segment.target: Espeak agora admite de novo o Cantonés e o Mandarín. (#10418)

segment.source: In the new Chromium based Microsoft Edge, text fields such as the address bar are now announced when empty. (#12474)
segment.target: No novo Microsoft Edge baseado en Chromium os campos de texto como a barra de enderezos agora anúncianse cando estean valdeiros. (#12474)

segment.source: Fix Seika Braille driver. (#10787)
segment.target: Arranxado o controlador braille de Seika. (#10787)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Nota: esta é unha versión que rompe a compatibilidade coa API dos complementos. Os complementos terán que voltar a se probar e actualizar o seu manifesto.

segment.source: NVDA's build system now fetches all Python dependencies with pip and stores them in a Python virtual environment. This is all done transparently.
segment.target: O sistema de compilación do NVDA agora obtén todas as dependencias de Python con pip e almacénaas nun entorno virtual de Python. Todo esto faise de forma transparente.

segment.source: To build NVDA, SCons should continue to be used in the usual way. E.g. executing scons.bat in the root of the repository. Running `py -m SCons` is no longer supported, and `scons.py` has also been removed.
segment.target: Para compilar o NVDA, débese seguir utilizando SCons da forma habitual. Por exemplo, executando scons.bat na raíz do repositorio. Executar `py -m SCons` xa non se admite, e `scons.py` tamén foi eliminado.

segment.source: To run NVDA from source, rather than executing `source/nvda.pyw` directly, the developer should now use `runnvda.bat` in the root of the repository. If you do try to execute `source/nvda.pyw`, a message box will alert you this is no longer supported.
segment.target: Para executar o NVDA dende o código fonte, en lugar de executar `source/nvda.pyw` directamente, o desenvolvedor debe agora utilizar `runnvda.bat` na raíz do repositorio. Se tentas executar `source/nvda.pyw`, unha caixa de mensaxe avisarache de que esto xa non se admite.

segment.source: To perform unit tests, execute `rununittests.bat [<extra unittest discover options>]`
segment.target: Para realizar probas unitarias, executa `rununittests.bat [<extra unittest discover options>]>]`.

segment.source: To perform system tests: execute `runsystemtests.bat [<extra robot options>]`
segment.target: Para realizar probas do sistema: executa `runsystemtests.bat extra robot options>]`

segment.source: To perform linting, execute `runlint.bat <base branch>`
segment.target: Para realizar linting, executa `runlint.bat <base branch>`.

segment.source: Please refer to readme.md for more details.
segment.target: Por favor, consulta o ficheiro readme.md para máis detalles.

segment.source: The following Python dependencies have also been upgraded:
segment.target: Tamén se actualizaron as seguintes dependencias de Python:

segment.source: comtypes updated to 1.1.8.
segment.target: comtypes actualizado a 1.1.8.

segment.source: pySerial updated to 3.5.
segment.target: pySerial actualizado a 3.5.

segment.source: wxPython updated to 4.1.1.
segment.target: wxPython actualizado a 4.1.1.

segment.source: Py2exe updated to 0.10.1.0.
segment.target: Py2exe actualizado a 0.10.1.0.

segment.source: `LiveText._getTextLines` has been removed. (#11639)
segment.target: Eliminouse `LiveText._getTextLines`. (#11639)

segment.source: Instead, override `_getText` which returns a string of all text in the object.
segment.target: No seu lugar, sobreescribe `_getText` que devolve unha cadea de todo o texto do obxecto.

segment.source: `LiveText` objects can now calculate diffs by character. (#11639)
segment.target: Os obxectos `LiveText` agora poden calcular as diferencias por carácter. (#11639)

segment.source: To alter the diff behaviour for some object, override the `diffAlgo` property (see the docstring for details).
segment.target: Para alterar o comportamento das diferencias para algún obxecto, sobreescribe a propiedade `diffAlgo` (consulta o docstring para máis detalles).

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the 'allowInSleepMode' boolean argument can be specified to control if a script is available in sleep mode or not. (#11979)
segment.target: Ao definir un script co decorador de script, pódese especificar o argumento booleano 'allowInSleepMode' para controlar se un script está dispoñible en modo de suspensión ou non. (#11979)

segment.source: The following functions are removed from the config module. (#11935)
segment.target: Elimináronse as seguintes funcións do módulo de configuración. (#11935)

segment.source: canStartOnSecureScreens - use config.isInstalledCopy instead.
segment.target: canStartOnSecureScreens - usa config.isInstalledCopy no seu lugar.

segment.source: hasUiAccess and execElevated - use them from the systemUtils module.
segment.target: hasUiAccess e execElevated - úsaas dende o módulo systemUtils.

segment.source: getConfigDirs - use globalVars.appArgs.configPath instead.
segment.target: getConfigDirs - usa globalVars.appArgs.configPath no seu lugar.

segment.source: Module level REASON_* constants are removed from controlTypes - please use controlTypes.OutputReason instead. (#11969)
segment.target: As constantes Module level REASON_* elimináronse de controlTypes - usa no seu lugar controlTypes.OutputReason. (#11969)

segment.source: REASON_QUICKNAV has been removed from browseMode - use controlTypes.OutputReason.QUICKNAV instead. (#11969)
segment.target: Eliminouse REASON_QUICKNAV de browseMode - usa controlTypes.OutputReason.QUICKNAV no seu lugar. (#11969)

segment.source: `NVDAObject` (and derivatives) property `isCurrent` now strictly returns Enum class `controlTypes.IsCurrent`. (#11782)
segment.target: A propiedade `NVDAObject` (y derivados) `isCurrent` ahora devolve estrictamente a crase Enum `controlTypes.IsCurrent`. (#11782)

segment.source: `isCurrent` is no longer Optional, and thus will not return None.
segment.target: A propiedade `isCurrent` xa non é Opcional, e polo tanto non devolverá Ningún.

segment.source: When an object is not current `controlTypes.IsCurrent.NO` is returned.
segment.target: Cando un obxecto non é actual, devólvese `controlTypes.IsCurrent.NO`.

segment.source: The `controlTypes.isCurrentLabels` mapping has been removed. (#11782)
segment.target: O mapeado `controlTypes.isCurrentLabels` eliminouse. (#11782)

segment.source: Instead use the `displayString` property on a `controlTypes.IsCurrent` enum value.
segment.target: A cambio us a propiedade `displayString` en un valor enum `controlTypes.IsCurrent`.

segment.source: For example: `controlTypes.IsCurrent.YES.displayString`.
segment.target: Por exemplo: `controlTypes.IsCurrent.YES.displayString`

segment.source: `winKernel.GetTimeFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetTimeFormatEx` instead. (#12139)
segment.target: Eliminouse `winKernel.GetTimeFormat` - débese usar `winKernel.GetTimeFormatEx`.

segment.source: `winKernel.GetDateFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetDateFormatEx` instead. (#12139)
segment.target: Eliminouse `winKernel.GetDateFormat` - úsase `winKernel.GetDateFormatEx` no seu lugar. (#12139)

segment.source: `gui.DriverSettingsMixin` has been removed - use `gui.AutoSettingsMixin`. (#12144)
segment.target: Eliminouse `gui.DriverSettingsMixin` - usa `gui.AutoSettingsMixin`. (#12144)

segment.source: `speech.getSpeechForSpelling` has been removed - use `speech.getSpellingSpeech`. (#12145)
segment.target: Eliminouse `speech.getSpeechForSpelling` - usa `speech.getSpellingSpeech`. (#12145)

segment.source: Commands cannot be directly imported from speech as `import speech; speech.ExampleCommand()` or `import speech.manager; speech.manager.ExampleCommand()` - use `from speech.commands import ExampleCommand` instead. (#12126)
segment.target: Os comandos non se poden importar directamente dende speech como `import speech; speech.ExampleCommand()` ou `import speech.manager; speech.manager.ExampleCommand()` - usa `from speech.commands import ExampleCommand` no seu lugar. (#12126)

segment.source: `speakTextInfo` will no longer send speech through `speakWithoutPauses` if reason is `SAYALL`, as `SayAllHandler` does this manually now. (#12150)
segment.target: `speakTextInfo` xa non enviará a voz a través de `speakWithoutPauses` se o motivo é `SAYALL`, xa que `SayAllHandler` faino agora manualmente. (#12150)

segment.source: The `synthDriverHandler` module is no longer star imported into `globalCommands` and `gui.settingsDialogs` - use `from synthDriverHandler import synthFunctionExample` instead. (#12172)
segment.target: O módulo `synthDriverHandler` xa non se importa por defecto en `globalCommands` e `gui.settingsDialogs` - usa `from synthDriverHandler import synthFunctionExample` no seu lugar. (#12172)

segment.source: `ROLE_EQUATION` has been removed from controlTypes - use `ROLE_MATH` instead. (#12164)
segment.target: Eliminouse `ROLE_EQUATION` de controlTypes - usa `ROLE_MATH` no seu lugar. (#12164)

segment.source: `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting`. (#12168)
segment.target: Elimináronse as crases `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting` de `driverHandler` - úsaas dende `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting`. (#12168)

segment.source: `autoSettingsUtils.utils` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.utils`. (#12168)
segment.target: Elimináronse las crases `autoSettingsUtils.utils` de `driverHandler` - por favor, úsaas dende `autoSettingsUtils.utils`. (#12168)

segment.source: Support of `TextInfo`s that do not inherit from `contentRecog.BaseContentRecogTextInfo` is removed. (#12157)
segment.target: Eliminouse o soporte dos `TextInfo` que non herdan de `contentRecog.BaseContentRecogTextInfo`. (#12157)

segment.source: `speech.speakWithoutPauses` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses(speakFunc=speech.speak).speakWithoutPauses` instead. (#12195, #12251)
segment.target: Eliminouse `speech.speakWithoutPauses` - por favor, usa `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses(speakFunc=speech.speak).speakWithoutPauses` no seu lugar. (#12195, #12251)

segment.source: `speech.re_last_pause` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses.re_last_pause` instead. (#12195, #12251)
segment.target: Eliminouse `speech.re_last_pause` - por favor, usa `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses.re_last_pause` no seu lugar. (#12195, #12251)

segment.source: `WelcomeDialog`, `LauncherDialog` and `AskAllowUsageStatsDialog` are moved to the `gui.startupDialogs`. (#12105)
segment.target: Os diálogos `WelcomeDialog`, `LauncherDialog` e `AskAllowUsageStatsDialog` trasladáronse a `gui.startupDialogs`. (#12105)

segment.source: `getDocFilePath` has been moved from `gui` to the `documentationUtils` module. (#12105)
segment.target: Moviuse `getDocFilePath` de `gui` ao módulo `documentationUtils`. (#12105)

segment.source: The gui.accPropServer module as well as the AccPropertyOverride and ListCtrlAccPropServer classes from the gui.nvdaControls module have been removed in favor of WX native support for overriding accessibility properties. When enhancing accessibility of WX controls, implement wx.Accessible instead. (#12215)
segment.target: O módulo gui.accPropServer, así como as crases AccPropertyOverride e ListCtrlAccPropServer do módulo gui.nvdaControls elimináronse en pro do soporte nativo de WX para anular as propiedades de accesibilidade. Ao se mellorar a accesibilidade dos controis WX, implementa wx.Accessible no seu lugar. (#12215)

segment.source: Files in `source/comInterfaces/` are now more easily consumable by developer tools such as IDEs. (#12201)
segment.target: Os ficheiros en `source/comInterfaces/` son agora máis fácilmente consumibles polas ferramentas de desenvolvemento, coma os IDE. (#12201)

segment.source: Convenience methods and types have been added to the winVersion module for getting and comparing Windows versions. (#11909)
segment.target: Engadíronse métodos e tipos convenientes ao módulo winVersion para obter e comparar versións de Windows. (#11909)

segment.source: isWin10 function found in winVersion module has been removed.
segment.target: Eliminouse a función isWin10 que se atopaba no módulo winVersion.

segment.source: class winVersion.WinVersion is a comparable and order-able type encapsulating Windows version information.
segment.target: A crase winVersion.WinVersion é un tipo comparable e ordeable que encapsula a información da versión de Windows.

segment.source: Function winVersion.getWinVer has been added to get a winVersion.WinVersion representing the currently running OS.
segment.target: Engadiuse a función winVersion.getWinVer para obter unha winVersion.WinVersion que represente o sistema operativo que se está executando actualmente.

segment.source: Convenience constants have been added for known Windows releases, see winVersion.WIN* constants.
segment.target: Engadíronse constantes de conveniencia para as versións conocidas de Windows, véase winVersion.WIN* constants.

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler no longer star imports everything from IAccessible and IA2 COM interfaces - please use them directly. (#12232)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler xa non importa de forma estelar todo o de as interfaces IAccessible e IA2 COM - por favor, úsaas directamente. (#12232)

segment.source: TextInfo objects now have start and end properties which can be compared mathematically with operators such as < <= == != >= >. (#11613)
segment.target: Os obxectos TextInfo teñen agora propiedades de inicio y fin que poden compararse matemáticamente con operadores como < <= == != >= >. (#11613)

segment.source: E.g. ti1.start <= ti2.end
segment.target: Por exemplo, ti1.start <= ti2.end

segment.source: This usage is now prefered instead of ti1.compareEndPoints(ti2,"startToEnd") <= 0
segment.target: Agora prefírese este uso en lugar de ti1.compareEndPoints(ti2, "startToEnd") <= 0

segment.source: TextInfo start and end properties can also be set to each other. (#11613)
segment.target: As propiedades de inicio e fin de TextInfo tamén poden establecerse entre sí. (#11613)

segment.source: E.g. ti1.start = ti2.end
segment.target: Por exemplo, ti1.start = ti2.end

segment.source: This usage is prefered instead of ti1.SetEndPoint(ti2,"startToEnd")
segment.target: Prefírese este uso en lugar de ti1.SetEndPoint(ti2, "startToEnd")

segment.source: `wx.CENTRE_ON_SCREEN` and `wx.CENTER_ON_SCREEN` are removed, use `self.CentreOnScreen()` instead. (#12309)
segment.target: Elimínanse `wx.CENTRE_ON_SCREEN` e `wx.CENTER_ON_SCREEN`, no seu lugar se usa `self.CentreOnScreen()`. (#12309)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.isSupported` has been removed, NVDA only supports versions of Windows where this evaluates to `True`. (#12222)
segment.target: Eliminouse `easeOfAccess.isSupported`, NVDA só admite versións de Windows nas que se evalúa como `True`. (#12222)

segment.source: `sayAllHandler` has been moved to `speech.sayAll`. (#12251)
segment.target: Moviuse `sayAllHandler` a `speech.sayAll`. (#12251)

segment.source: `speech.sayAll.SayAllHandler` exposes the functions `stop`, `isRunning`, `readObjects`, `readText`, `lastSayAllMode`.
segment.target: `speech.sayAll.SayAllHandler` expón as funcións `stop`, `isRunning`, `readObjects`, `readText`, `lastSayAllMode`.

segment.source: `SayAllHandler.stop` also resets the `SayAllHandler` `SpeechWithoutPauses` instance.
segment.target: O comando `SayAllHandler.stop` tamén reinicia a instancia `SayAllHandler` `SpeechWithoutPauses`.

segment.source: `CURSOR_REVIEW` and `CURSOR_CARET` has been replaced with `CURSOR.REVIEW` and `CURSOR.CARET`.
segment.target: Substituiuse `CURSOR_REVIEW` e `CURSOR_CARET` por `CURSOR.REVIEW` e `CURSOR.CARET`.

segment.source: `speech.SpeechWithoutPauses` has been moved to `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses`. (#12251)
segment.target: Moviuse `speech.SpeechWithoutPauses` a `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses`. (#12251)

segment.source: `speech.curWordChars` has been renamed `speech._curWordChars`. (#12395)
segment.target: Cambiouse o nome de `speech.curWordChars` a `speech._curWordChars`. (#12395)

segment.source: the following have been removed from `speech` and can be accessed through `speech.getState()`. These are readonly values now. (#12395)
segment.target: Elimináronse de `speech` e pódese acesar a eles a través de `speech.getState()`. Agora son valores de só lectura. (#12395)

segment.source: speechMode
segment.target: speechMode

segment.source: speechMode_beeps_ms
segment.target: speechMode_beeps_ms

segment.source: beenCanceled
segment.target: beenCanceled

segment.source: isPaused
segment.target: isPaused

segment.source: to update `speech.speechMode` use `speech.setSpeechMode`. (#12395)
segment.target: para actualizar `speech.speechMode` usa `speech.setSpeechMode`. (#12395)

segment.source: the following have been moved to `speech.SpeechMode`. (#12395)
segment.target: Moviuse o seguinte a `speech.SpeechMode`. (#12395)

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_off` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.off`
segment.target: `speech.speechMode_off` convírtese en `speech.SpeechMode.off`.

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_beeps` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.beeps`
segment.target: `speech.speechMode_beeps` pasa a ser `speech.SpeechMode.beeps`

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_talk` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.talk`
segment.target: `speechMode_talk` pasa a ser `speech.Speech.SpeechMode.talk`.

segment.source: `IAccessibleHandler.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType` is now `IAccessibleHandler.types.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType`. (#12367)
segment.target: `IAccessibleHandler.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType` é agora `IAccessibleHandler.types.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType`. (#12367)

segment.source: The following in `NVDAObjects.UIA.WinConsoleUIA` have been changed (#12094)
segment.target: Cambiaron `NVDAObjects.UIA.WinConsoleUIA` (#12094)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.is21H1Plus` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable`.
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.is21H1Plus` renomeado a `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable`.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfo` renamed to start class name with upper case.
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfo` renomeado ao nome da crase de inicio en maiúsculas.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfoPre21H1` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.ConsoleUIATextInfoWorkaroundEndInclusive`
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfoPre21H1` renomeado a `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.ConsoleUIATextInfoWorkaroundEndInclusive`

segment.source: The implementation works around both end points being inclusive (in text ranges) before [microsoft/terminal PR 4018](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/4018)
segment.target: A implementación funciona en ambos sendo incluidos os puntos finais (en rangos de texto) antes de [microsoft/terminal PR 4018](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/4018)

segment.source: Workarounds for `expand`, `collapse`, `compareEndPoints`, `setEndPoint`, etc
segment.target: Solucións para `expand`, `collapse`, `compareEndPoints`, `setEndPoint`, etc

segment.source: This release includes new Chinese Input methods, an update to Liblouis and the elements list (NVDA+f7) now works in focus mode.
segment.target: Esta versión inclúe métodos novos de entrada de chinés, unha actualización de Liblouis e a Listaxe de Elementos (NVDA+f7) agora funciona en modo foco.

segment.source: Context sensitive help is now available when pressing F1 in NVDA dialogs.
segment.target: A axuda sensible ao contexto agora está dispoñible ao se premer F1 en diálogos de NVDA.

segment.source: Improvements to symbol pronunciation rules, speech dictionary, Braille message and skim reading.
segment.target: Melloras para as regras de pronunciación de símbolos, diccionarios da fala, mensaxes braille e lectura superficial.

segment.source: Bug fixes and improvements to Mail, Outlook, Teams, Visual Studio, Azure Data Studio, Foobar2000.
segment.target: Correción de erros e melloras para Mail, Outlook, Teams, Visual Studio, Azure Data Studio, Foobar2000.

segment.source: On the web, there are improvements to Google Docs, and greater support for ARIA.
segment.target: Na web, hai melloras para Google Docs e moito mellor soporte para ARIA.

segment.source: Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: Máis moitas outras importantes correcións de erros e melloras.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Pressing F1 inside NVDA dialogs will now open the help file to most relevant section. (#7757)
segment.target: Ao se premer F1 dentro dos diálogos do NVDA agora abrirase o ficheiro de axuda para a seción máis relevante. (#7757)

segment.source: Support for auto complete suggestions (IntelliSense) in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio plus Visual Studio 2017 and higher. (#7504)
segment.target: Soporte para autocompletado de suxerencias (IntelliSense) en Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio máis Visual Studio 2017 e superior. (#7504)

segment.source: Symbol pronunciation: Support for grouping in a complex symbol definition and support group references in a replacement rule making them simpler and more powerful. (#11107)
segment.target: Pronunciación de símbolos: soporte para agrupacións nunha definición de símbolos comprexa e soporte de referencias de grupo nunha regra de substitución que fainos máis sinxelos e máis poderosos. (#11107)

segment.source: Users are now notified when attempting to create Speech Dictionary entries with invalid regular expression substitutions. (#11407)
segment.target: Agora notifícase aos usuarios cando tenten crear entradas de dicionarios da fala con sustitucións inválidas de expresións regulares. (#11407)

segment.source: Specifically grouping errors are now detected.
segment.target: Específicamente agora detéctanse erros de agrupación.

segment.source: Added support for the new chinese Traditional Quick and Pinyin Input methods in Windows 10. (#11562)
segment.target: Engaiduse o soporte para os novos métodos de entrada para chinés tradicional rápido e para Pinyin en Windows 10. (#11562)

segment.source: Tab headers are now considered form fields with quick navigation f key. (#10432)
segment.target: As cabeceiras de pestana agora considéranse campos de formulario coa tecla de navegación rápida f. (#10432)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of marked (highlighted) text; There is no default associated gesture. (#11807)
segment.target: Engadida unha orde para conmutar o anunciado de texto marcado (resaltado); Non hai ningún xesto asociado por omisión. (#11807)

segment.source: Added the --copy-portable-config command line parameter that allows you to automatically copy the provided configuration to the user account when silently installing NVDA. (#9676)
segment.target: Engadido o parámetro de liña de comandos --copy-portable-config que che permite copiar automáticamente a configuración proporcionada á conta de usuario cando se instala o NVDA en silencio. (#9676)

segment.source: Braille routing is now supported with the Braille Viewer for mouse users, hover to route to a braille cell. (#11804)
segment.target: Agora admítese o enrutamento Braille co Visualizador Braille para usuarios de rato, desprazándose para enrutar a unha celda braille. (#11804)

segment.source: NVDA will now automatically detect the Humanware Brailliant BI 40X and 20X devices via both USB and Bluetooth. (#11819)
segment.target: O NVDA agora detectará automáticamente os dispositivos Humanware Brailliant BI 40X e 20X a través do USB e do Bluetooth. (#11819)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.16.1:
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille liblouis á versión 3.16.1

segment.source: Addresses multiple crashes
segment.target: Abórdánse múltiples colgues

segment.source: Adds Bashkir grade 1 Braille table
segment.target: Engádese a táboa Braille grao 1 de Baskir

segment.source: Adds Coptic 8 dot computer braille table
segment.target: Engádese unha táboa braille de ordenador copto de 8 puntos

segment.source: Adds Russian literary braille and Russian literary braille (detailed) tables
segment.target: Engádense táboas de braille literario ruso e braille literario ruso (detallado).

segment.source: Adds Added Afrikaans grade 2 braille table
segment.target: Engádese a táboa braille para Afrikaans grao 2

segment.source: Removes the Russian grade 1 Braille table
segment.target: Bórrase a táboa braille rusa de grao 1.

segment.source: When reading with say all in browse mode, the find next and find previous commands do not stop reading anymore if Allow skim reading option is enabled; say all rather resumes from after the next or previous found term. (#11563)
segment.target: Cando se le con ler todo no modo exploración, as ordes buscar seguinte e anterior non deteñen a lectura se a opción permitir lectura superficial está activada; ler todo reanuda a partir de despois do término seguinte ou anterior atopado. (#11563)

segment.source: For HIMS braille displays F3 has been remapped to Space + dots 148. (#11710)
segment.target: Para as pantallas braille HIMS remapeouse F3 a Espazo + puntos 148. (#11710)

segment.source: Improvements to the UX of the "braille message timeout" and "Show messages indefinitely" options. (#11602)
segment.target: Melloras para o UX das opcións "Tempo de espera da mensaxe braille" e "Amosar mensaxes indefinidamente". (#11602)

segment.source: In web browsers and other applications that support browse mode, the Elements List dialog (NVDA+F7) can now be invoked when in focus mode. (#10453)
segment.target: En navegadores web e outras aplicacións que soporten o modo exploración, o diálogo Listaxe de Elementos (NVDA+F7) agora pode chamarse ao estar en modo foco. (#10453)

segment.source: Updates to ARIA live regions are now suppressed when reporting of dynamic content changes is disabled. (#9077)
segment.target: As actualizacións de rexións ARIA live agora suprímense cando se desactive o anunciado de cambios de contido dinámico. (#9077)

segment.source: NVDA will now report "Copied to clipboard" before the copied text. (#6757)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciará "Copiado ao portapapeis" antes do texto copiado. (#6757)

segment.source: Presentation of graphical view table in disk management has been improved. (#10048)
segment.target: Mellorouse a presentación da táboa de vistas gráficas no xestor de discos. (#10048)

segment.source: Labels for controls are now disabled (greyed out) when the control is disabled. (#11809)
segment.target: As etiquetas dos controis agora están desactivadas (en gris) cando o control está desactivado. (#11809)

segment.source: Updated CLDR emoji annotation to version 38. (#11817)
segment.target: Actualizada a anotación emoji de CLDR á versión 38. (#11817)

segment.source: The inbuilt "Focus Highlight" feature has been renamed "Vision Highlight". (#11700)
segment.target: A funcionalidade incorporada "Resaltado do Foco" renomeouse a "Resaltado Visual". (#11700)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Corrección de Erros

segment.source: NVDA once again works correctly with edit fields when using the Fast Log Entry application. (#8996)
