segment.target: o NVDA volta a funcionar correctamente cos campos de edición ao se usar a aplicación Fast Log Entry. (#8996)

segment.source: Report elapsed time in Foobar2000 if no total time is available (e.g. when playing a live stream). (#11337)
segment.target: Anúnciase o tempo transcorrido en Foobar2000 se non se dispón dun tempo total (por exemplo, cando se reproduce unha transmisión en directo). (#11337)

segment.source: NVDA now honors the aria-roledescription attribute on elements in editable content in web pages. (#11607)
segment.target: O NVDA agora respeta o atributo aria-roledescription en elementos en contido editable en páxinas web. (#11607)

segment.source: 'list' is no longer announced on every line of a list in Google Docs or other editable content in Google Chrome. (#7562)
segment.target: Xa non se anuncia 'listaxe' en cada línea de unha listaxe en Google Docs ou outro contido editable en Google Chrome. (#7562)

segment.source: When arrowing by character or word from one list item to another in editable content on the web, entering the new list item is now announced. (#11569)
segment.target: Cando se navega coas frechas por caracteres ou palabras dende un elemento de listaxe a outro en contido editable na web, agora anúnciase a entrada no novo elemento de listaxe. (#11569)

segment.source: NVDA now reads the correct line when the caret is placed at the end of a link on the end of a list item in Google Docs or other editable content on the web. (#11606)
segment.target: O NVDA agora le a liña correcta cando o cursor se coloca no remate dunha liga no fin dun elemento de listaxe en Google Docs ou outro contido editable na web. (#11606)

segment.source: On Windows 7, opening and closing the start menu from the desktop now sets focus correctly. (#10567)
segment.target: En Windows 7, ao abrir ou pechar o menú Inicio dende o escritorio agora ponse o foco correctamente. (#10567)

segment.source: When "attempt to cancel expired focus events" is enabled, the title of the tab is now announced again when switching tabs in Firefox. (#11397)
segment.target: Cando se activa "Tentar cancelar eventos do foco esperados", o título da pestaña agora anúnciase de novo ao cambiar pestañas en Firefox. (#11397)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce a list item after typing a character in a list when speaking with the SAPI5 Ivona voices. (#11651)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non falla ao anunciar un elemento de listaxe despois de escrebir un carácter nunha listaxe cando se fala coas voces Ivona SAPI5 . (#11651)

segment.source: It is again possible to use browse mode when reading emails in Windows 10 Mail 16005.13110 and later. (#11439)
segment.target: É posible de novo usar o modo exploración ao ler correos electrónicos en Windows 10 Mail 16005.13110 e posteriores. (#11439)

segment.source: When using the SAPI5 Ivona voices from harposoftware.com, NVDA is now able to save configuration, switch synthesizers, and no longer will stay silent after restarting. (#11650)
segment.target: Cando se usen as voces Ivona SAPI5 dende harposoftware.com, o NVDA agora é capaz de gardar a configuración, cambiar de sintetizador e xa non se quedará en silenzo despois de reiniciar. (#11650)

segment.source: It is now possible to enter number 6 in computer braille from a braille keyboard on HIMS displays. (#11710)
segment.target: Agora é posible introducir o número 6 en braille computerizado dende un teclado braille en pantallas HIMS. (#11710)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Azure Data Studio. (#11533, #11715)
segment.target: Melloras importantes no rendemento en Azure Data Studio. (#11533, #11715)

segment.source: With "Attempt to Cancel speech for expired focus events" enabled the title of the NVDA Find dialog is announced again. (#11632)
segment.target: Con "Tentar Cancelar a voz para eventos de foco expirados" activado o título do diálogo buscar do NVDA anúnciase de novo. (#11632)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer freeze when waking the computer and focus lands in a Microsoft Edge document. (#11576)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non debería conxelarse cando se desperta o computador e o foco aterriza nun documento de Microsoft Edge. (#11576)

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to press tab or move focus after closing a context menu in MS Edge for browse mode to be functional again. (#11202)
segment.target: Xa non é necesario premer tab ou mover o foco despois de pechar un menú de contexto en MS Edge para que o modo Exploración volte a ser funcional de novo. (#11202)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read items in list views within a 64-bit application such as Tortoise SVN. (#8175)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non falla ao ler elementos en vistas de listaxe dentro dunha aplicación de 64 bits tal como Tortoise SVN. (#8175)

segment.source: ARIA treegrids are now exposed as normal tables in browse mode in both Firefox and Chrome. (#9715)
segment.target: Os ARIA treegrids agora expóñense como táboas normais en modo Exploración tanto en Firefox coma en Chrome. (#9715)

segment.source: A reverse search can now be initiated with 'find previous' via NVDA+shift+F3 (#11770)
segment.target: Agora pódese iniciar unha procura inversa con 'buscar anterior' a través de NVDA+shift+F3 (#11770)

segment.source: An NVDA script is no longer treated as being repeated if an unrelated key press happens in between the two executions of the script. (#11388)
segment.target: Un script de NVDA xa non se considera repetido se ocorre unha pulsación de tecla non relacionada entre as dúas execucións do script. (#11388)

segment.source: Strong and emphasis tags in Internet Explorer can again be suppressed from being reported by turning off Report Emphasis in NVDA's Document Formatting settings. (#11808)
segment.target: Pode suprimirse de novo o anunciado das etiquetas strong e emphasis en Internet Explorer desactivando Anunciar Énfasis nas opcións de Formato de Documentos do NVDA. (#11808)

segment.source: A freeze of several seconds experienced by a small amount of users when arrowing between cells in Excel should no longer occur. (#11818)
segment.target: Xa non debería producirse un conxelado de varios segundos experimentado por unha pequena cantidade de usuarios ao pasar entre as celdas de Excel. (#11818)

segment.source: In Microsoft Teams builds with version numbers like 1.3.00.28xxx, NVDA no longer fails reading messages in chats or Teams channels due to an incorrectly focused menu. (#11821)
segment.target: Nas compilacións de Microsoft Teams con números de versión como 1.3.00.28xxx, o NVDA xa non falla ao ler mensaxes en chats ou en canles de Teams debido a un menú incorrectamente enfocado. (#11821)

segment.source: Text marked both as being a spelling and grammar error at the same time in Google Chrome will be appropriately announced as both a spelling and grammar error by NVDA. (#11787)
segment.target: O texto marcado coma erro ortográfico e gramatical ao mesmo tempo en Google Chrome anunciarase apropriadamente coma erro ortográfico e gramatical polo NVDA. (#11787)

segment.source: When using Outlook (French locale), the shortcut for 'Reply all' (control+shift+R) works again. (#11196)
segment.target: Ao usar Outlook (localización ao francés), o atallo para "Respostar a todos" (control+shift+R) funciona de novo. (#11196)

segment.source: In Visual Studio, IntelliSense tool tips that provide additional details about the currently selected IntelliSense item are now only reported once. (#11611)
segment.target: No Visual Studio, os consellos da ferramenta IntelliSense que proporcionan detalles adicionais sobre o elemento IntelliSense selecionado actualmente só se anuncian unha vez. (#11611)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will not announce progress of calculations if speak typed characters is disabled. (#9428)
segment.target: Na calculadora de Windows 10, o NVDA non anunciará o progreso dos cálculos se se desactiva falar caracteres ao se escreber. (#9428)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when using English US grade 2 and expand to computer Braille at the cursor is on, when displaying certain content such as a URL in Braille. (#11754)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non se bloquea cando se use o inglés grao 2 de Estados unidos e expándese a braille computerizado cando estea sobre el cursor ao amosar certo contido coma unha URL en braille. (#11754)

segment.source: It is again possible to report formatting information for the focused Excel cell using NVDA+F. (#11914)
segment.target: É posible de novo anunciar información de formato para a celda de Excel enfocada usando NVDA+F. (#11914)

segment.source: QWERTY input on Papenmeier braille displays that support it again works and no longer causes NVDA to randomly freeze. (#11944)
segment.target: A entrada QWERTY en pantallas braille Papenmeier que o admitan funciona de novo e xa non causa que o NVDA se conxele aleatoriamente. (#11944)

segment.source: In Chromium based browsers, several cases were solved where table navigation didn't work and NVDA didn't report the number of rows/columns of the table. (#12359)
segment.target: En navegadores basados en Chromium, resolvéronse varios casos onde a navegación de táboas non funcionaba e o NVDA non anunciaba o número de filas e columnas da táboa. (#12359)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: System tests can now send keys using spy.emulateKeyPress, which takes a key identifier that conforms to NVDA's own key names, and by default also blocks until the action is executed. (#11581)
segment.target: As probas de sistema agora poden enviar teclas usando spy.emulateKeyPress, que toma un identificador de tecla que se axusta aos proprios nomes de tecla do NVDA e por defecto tamén a bloquea hasta que se execute a acción. (#11581)

segment.source: NVDA no longer requires the current directory to be the NVDA application directory in order to function. (#6491)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non require que o directorio actual sexa o directorio da aplicación NVDA para funcionar. (#6491)

segment.source: The aria live politeness setting for live regions can now be found on NVDA Objects using the liveRegionPoliteness property. (#11596)
segment.target: A opción aria live politeness para live regions agora pode atoparse en obxectos do NVDA que usen a propiedade liveRegionPoliteness. (#11596)

segment.source: It is now possible to define separate gestures for Outlook and Word document. (#11196)
segment.target: Agora é posible definir xestos separados para documentos de Outlook e Word. (#11196)

segment.source: This release includes several large improvements to stability and performance particularly in Microsoft Office applications. There are new settings to toggle touchscreen support and graphics reporting.
segment.target: Esta versión inclúe varias grandes melloras para a estabilidade e o rendemento, especialmente nas aplicacións de Microsoft Office. Hai novas opcións para conmutar o soporte das pantallas táctiles e do anunciado de gráficos.

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content can be reported in browsers, and there are new German braille tables.
segment.target: A existencia de contido marcado (resaltado) pode anunciarse nos navegadores, e hai novas táboas braille alemanas.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: You can now toggle reporting of graphics from NVDA's document formatting settings. Note that disabling this option will still read the alternative texts of graphics. (#4837)
segment.target: Agora podes conbmutar o anunciado de gráficos dende as opcións de Formateado de Documentos do NVDA. Ten en conta que deshabilitando esta opción aínda lerá o texto alternativo dos gráficos. (#4837)

segment.source: You can now toggle NVDA's touchscreen support. An option has been added to the Touch Interaction panel of NVDA's settings. The default gesture is NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)
segment.target: Agora podes conmutar o soporte de pantallas táctiles do NVDA. Engadiuse unha opción ao panel de interacción táctil das opcións do NVDA. O xesto predeterminado é NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)

segment.source: Added new German braille tables. (#11268)
segment.target: Engadidas novas táboas braille para o Alemán. (#11268)

segment.source: NVDA now detects read-only text UIA controls. (#10494)
segment.target: O NVDA agora detecta controis de texto de só lectura de UIA. (#10494)

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content is reported in both speech and braille in all web browsers. (#11436)
segment.target: A existentcia de contido marcado (resaltado) infórmase tanto en voz coma en braille en todos os navegadores web. (#11436)

segment.source: This can be toggled on and off by a new NVDA Document Formatting option for Highlighting.
segment.target: Esto pode activarse e desactivarse cunha nova opción de Formateado de Documento do NVDA para Resaltado.

segment.source: New emulated system keyboard keys can be added from NVDA's Input gestures dialog. (#6060)
segment.target: Poden engadirse novas teclas ao sistema de teclado emulado dende o diálogo Xextos de Entrada do NVDA. (#6060)

segment.source: To do this, press the add button after you selected the Emulated system keyboard keys category.
segment.target: Para facelo, pulsa o botón Engadir despois de que seleciones a categoría Teclas de sistema de teclado emulado.

segment.source: Handy Tech Active Braille with joystick is now supported. (#11655)
segment.target: Agora admítese Handy Tech Active Braille con joystick. (#11655)

segment.source: "Automatic focus mode for caret movement" setting is now compatible with disabling "Automatically set focus to focusable elements". (#11663)
segment.target: A opción "Modo foco automático para movementos do cursor" agora é compatible con deshabilitar "Poñer automáticamente o foco en elementos enfocables". (#11663)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: The Report formatting script (NVDA+f) has now been changed to report the formatting at the system caret rather than at the review cursor position. To report formatting at the review cursor position now use NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)
segment.target: O script anunciar formato (NVDA+f) agora cambiouse para anunciar o formato no cursor do sistema en lugar de na posición do cursor de revisión. Para anunciar o formato na posición do Cursor de Revisión agora usa NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)

segment.source: NVDA no longer automatically sets the system focus to focusable elements by default in browse mode, improving performance and stability. (#11190)
segment.target: NVDA xa non pon automáticamente o foco do sistema nos elementos enfocables por defecto en modo Exploración, mellorando o rendemento e a estabilidade. (#11190)

segment.source: CLDR updated from version 36.1 to version 37. (#11303)
segment.target: Actualizado CLDR dende a versión 36.1 á versión 37. (#11303)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4
segment.target: Actualizado o eSpeak-NG a 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4

segment.source: You can now utilize table navigation in list boxes with checkable list items when the particular list has multiple columns. (#8857)
segment.target: Agora podes usar a navegación de táboas en caixas de listaxe con elementos de listaxe marcables cando unha listaxe en particular teña varias columnas. (#8857)

segment.source: In the Add-ons manager, when prompted to confirm removal of an add-on, "No" is now the default. (#10015)
segment.target: No Administrador de complementos, cando se che pregunte para confirmar o borrado dun complemento, agora "Non", é a predeterminada. (#10015)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the Elements List dialog now presents formulas in their localized form. (#9144)
segment.target: En Microsoft Excel, o diálogo de listaxe de elementos agora presenta fórmulas na súa forma localizada. (#9144)

segment.source: NVDA now reports the correct terminology for notes in MS Excel. (#11311)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anuncia a terminoloxía correcta para notas en MS Excel. (#11311)

segment.source: When using the "move review cursor to focus" command in browse mode, the review cursor is now set at the position of the virtual caret. (#9622)
segment.target: Ao se usar a orde "mover cursor de revisión ao foco" en modo Exploración, o cursor de revisión agora ponse na posición do cursor virtual. (#9622)

segment.source: Information reported in browse mode, such as the formatting info with NVDA+F, are now displayed in a slightly bigger window centered on screen. (#9910)
segment.target: A información anunciada no modo exploración, como a información de formato con NVDA+F, amósase agora nunha xanela lixeiramente máis grande centrada na pantalla. (#9910)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Erros

segment.source: NVDA now always speaks when navigating by word and landing on any single symbol followed by white space, whatever the verbosity settings. (#5133)
segment.target: O NVDA agora fala sempre ao navegar por palabras e aterriza en calquera símbolo seguido por un espazo en branco, calquera que sexan as opcións de verbosidade. (#5133)

segment.source: In applications using QT 5.11 or newer, object descriptions are again reported. (#8604)
segment.target: En aplicacións que usen QT 5.11 ou máis novas, as descripcións dos obxectos anúncianse de novo. (#8604)

segment.source: When deleting a word with control+delete, NVDA no longer remains silent. (#3298, #11029)
segment.target: Ao borrar unha palabra con control+suprimir, o NVDA xa non permanece en silenzo. (#3298, #11029)

segment.source: Now the word to the right of the deleted word is announced.
segment.target: Agora anúnciase a palabra á dereita da eliminada.

segment.source: In general settings panel, the language list is now sorted correctly. (#10348)
segment.target: No panel Opcións Xerais, a listaxe de linguas agora ordéase correctamente. (#10348)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, significantly improved performance while filtering. (#10307)
segment.target: No diálogo Xestos de Entrada, mellorouse significativamente o rendemento mentres se filtra. (#10307)(

segment.source: You can now send Unicode characters beyond U+FFFF from a braille display. (#10796)
segment.target: Agora podes enviar caracteres Unicode máis aló de U+FFFF dende unha pantalla braille. (#10796)

segment.source: NVDA will announce Open With dialog content in Windows 10 May 2020 Update. (#11335)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciará diálogo Aberto Con contido en Windows 10 May 2020 Update. (#11335)

segment.source: A new experimental option in Advanced settings (Enable selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes) can provide major performance improvements in Microsoft Visual Studio and other UIAutomation based applications if enabled. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: Unha opción nova experimental en Opcións Avanzadas (Habilitar o rexistro selectivo para eventos e cambios de propiedade de UI Automation) pode proporcionar maiores melloras de rendemento en Microsoft Visual Studio e outras aplicacións baseadas en UIAutomation se se habilita. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: For checkable list items, the selected state is no longer announced redundantly, and if applicable, the unselected state is announced instead. (#8554)
segment.target: Para elementos de listaxe marcables, o estado selecionado xa non se anuncia redundantemente, e se é aplicable, anúnciase o estado deseleccionado no seu lugar. (#8554)

segment.source: On Windows 10 May 2020 Update, NVDA now shows the Microsoft Sound Mapper when viewing output devices from synthesizer dialog. (#11349)
segment.target: En Windows 10 May 2020 Update, O NVDA agora amosa o Mapeador de Son de Microsoft ao revisar os dispositivos de saída dende o diálogo Sintetizador. (#11349)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, numbers are now announced correctly for ordered lists if the list does not start with 1. (#8438)
segment.target: En Internet Explorer, os números agora anúncianse correctamente para listaxes ordeadas se a listaxe non comeza con 1. (#8438)

segment.source: In Google chrome, NVDA will now report not checked for all checkable controls (not just check boxes) that are currently not checked. (#11377)
segment.target: En Google chrome, o NVDA agora anunciará non marcado para todos os controis marcables (non só caixas de verificación) que actualmente non estean marcados. (#11377)

segment.source: It is once again possible to navigate in various controls when NVDA's language is set to Aragonese. (#11384)
segment.target: Unha vez máis é posible de novo navegar por varios controis cando a lingua de NVDA estea posta en Aragonés. (#11384)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer sometimes freeze in Microsoft Word when rapidly arrowing up and down or typing characters with Braille enabled. (#11431, #11425, #11414)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non debería conxelarse ás veces en Microsoft Word ao mover rápidamente as frechas arriba e abaixo ou ao escreber caracteres co Braille habilitado. (#11431, #11425, #11414)

segment.source: NVDA no longer appends nonexistent trailing space when copying the current navigator object to the clipboard. (#11438)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non engade un espazo non existente no arrastre ao copiar o navegador de obxectos actual ao portapapeis. (#11438)

segment.source: NVDA no longer activates the Say All profile if there is nothing to read. (#10899, #9947)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non activa o perfil Ler todo se non hai nada que ler. (#10899, #9947)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unable to read the features list in Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager. (#11468)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non é incapaz de ler a listaxe de características en el administrador Internet Information Services (IIS). (#11468)

segment.source: NVDA now keeps the audio device open improving performance on some sound cards (#5172, #10721)
segment.target: O NVDA agora mantén o dispositivo de audio aberto mellorando o rendemento nalgunhas tarxetas de son (#5172, #10721)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer freeze or exit when holding down control+shift+downArrow in Microsoft Word. (#9463)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non se conxelará nin se apagará cando manteñas premido control+shift+flecha abaixo en Microsoft Word. (#9463)

segment.source: The expanded / collapsed state of directories in the navigation treeview on drive.google.com is now always reported by NVDA. (#11520)
segment.target: O estado expandido/contraído dos directorios na árbore de navegación de drive.google.com agora sempre se anuncia polo NVDA. (#11520)

segment.source: NVDA will auto detect the NLS eReader Humanware braille display via Bluetooth as its Bluetooth name is now "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)
segment.target: O NVDA detectará automáticamente a pantalla braille NLS eReader Humanware a través do Bluetooth, xa que o seu nome Bluethooth é agora "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Visual Studio Code. (#11533)
segment.target: Grandes melloras no rendemento de Visual Studio Code. (#11533)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: The GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons supports a new "separated" keyword argument, for adding a standard horizontal separator to dialogs (other than messages and single input dialogs). (#6468)
segment.target: O GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons soporta unha nova palabra cchave de argumento "separated", para engadir un separador horizontal estándar aos diálogos (que non sexan mensaxes e diálogos de entrada sinxelos). (#6468)

segment.source: Additional properties were added to app modules, including path for the executable (appPath), is a Windows Store app (isWindowsStoreApp), and machine architecture for the app (appArchitecture). (#7894)
segment.target: Engadíronse propiedades adicionais aos app modules, incluindo a ruta para o executable (appPath), é unha app de almacenamento de Windows (isWindowsStoreApp), e arquitectura de máquina para a app (appArchitecture). (#7894)

segment.source: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosted inside wwahost.exe on Windows 8 and later. (#4569)
segment.target: Agora é posible crear app modules para apps hospedadas dentro de wwahost.exe en Windows 8 e posteriores. (#4569)

segment.source: A fragment of the log can now be delimited and then copied to clipboard using NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)
segment.target: Agora pódese delimitar un fragmento do rexistro e logo copialo ao portapapeis usando NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)

segment.source: NVDA-specific objects that are found by Python's cyclic garbage collector are now logged when being deleted by the collector to aide in removing reference cycles from NVDA. (#11499)
segment.target: Os obxectos específicos de NVDA que se atopan polo recolector de basura cíclica de Python agora rexístranse cando se borran polo recolector para axudar na eliminación dos ciclos de referencia de NVDA. (#11499)

segment.source: The majority of NVDA's classes are tracked including NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers, and TreeInterceptors.
segment.target: A maioría das crases de NVDA rastréanse incluindo NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers e TreeInterceptors.

segment.source: A class that needs to be tracked should inherit from garbageHandler.TrackedObject.
segment.target: Unha crase que se necesita rastrear debe herdar de garbageHandler.TrackedObject.

segment.source: Significant debug logging for MSAA events can be now enabled in NVDA's Advanced settings. (#11521)
segment.target: O rexistro de depuración significativo para os eventos de MSAA agora pode habilitarse na configuración avanzada de NVDA. (#11521)

segment.source: MSAA winEvents for the currently focused object are no longer filtered out along with other events if the event count for a given thread is exceeded. (#11520)
segment.target: Os eventos de MSAA para o obxecto enfocado actualmente xa non se filtran xunto con outros eventos se se excede a conta de eventos para un fío determinado. (#11520)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for a new braille display from Nattiq, better support for ESET antivirus GUI and Windows Terminal, performance improvements in 1Password, and with Windows OneCore synthesizer. Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: O subliñable desta versión inclúe o soporte dunha nova pantalla braille de Nattiq, un soporte mellor para a interfaz gráfica de usuario do antivirus ESET e a Terminal de Windows, melloras de rendemento de 1Password e co sintetizador Windows OneCore. Ademáiss de moitas outras importantes melloras e correccións de fallos.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Support for new braille displays:
segment.target: Admisión de novas pantallas braille:

segment.source: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)
segment.target: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)

segment.source: Added script to open NVDA configuration directory (no default gesture). (#2214)
segment.target: Engadido un script para abrir o directorio de configuración do NVDA (sen xesto predeterminado). (#2214)

segment.source: Better support for ESET antivirus GUI. (#10894)
segment.target: Mellor soporte para a interface gráfica de usuario do antivirus ESET. (#10894)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Terminal. (#10305)
segment.target: Engadido o soporte para a Terminal de Windows. (#10305)

segment.source: Added a command to report the active configuration profile (no default gesture). (#9325)
segment.target: Engadida unha orde para anunciar o perfil de configuración activo (non hai xesto predeterminado). (#9325)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of subscripts and superscripts (no default gesture). (#10985)
segment.target: Engadida unha orde para conmutar o anunciado de subíndices e superíndices (non hai xesto predeterminado). (#10985)

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly. (#10885)
segment.target: As aplicacións web (Ex. Gmail) xa non falan información incorrecta cando se mova o foco rápidamente. (#10885)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled via the 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Esta solución experimental debe activarse manualmente a través da opción 'tentar cancelar a voz para eventos de enfoque caducados' no panel de opcións avanzadas.

segment.source: Many more symbols have been added to the default symbols dictionary. (#11105)
segment.target: Engadíronse máis símbolos ao diccionario de símbolos predeterminado. (#11105)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator from 3.12 to [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille liblouis de 3.12 a [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0) (from 3.12.0). (#10832, #11221)

segment.source: The reporting of superscripts and subscripts is now controlled separately to the reporting of font attributes. (#10919)
segment.target: O anunciado de superíndices e subíndices agora contrólase por separado ao anunciado de atributos de fonte. (#10919)

segment.source: Due to changes made in VS Code, NVDA no longer disables browse mode in Code by default. (#10888)
segment.target: Debido a cambios feitos en VS Code, o NVDA xa non desactiva o modo Exploración en Code por defecto. (#10888)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "top" and "bottom" messages when moving the review cursor directly to the first or last line of the current navigator object with the move to top and move to bottom review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non anuncia as mensaxes "superior" e "inferior" ao se mover o cursor de revisión directamente á primeira ou última liña do actual navegador de obxectos cos scripts mover cursor de revisión arriba ou abaixo respectivamente. (#9551)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "left" and "right" messages when directly moving the review cursor to the first or last character of the line for the current navigator object with the move to beginning of line and move to end of line review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non anuncia as mensaxes "esquerda" e "dereita" ao se mover o cursor de revisión directamente ao primeiro ou último carácter do actual navegador de obxectos cos scripts mover cursor de revisión á esquerda ou á dereita respectivamente. (#9551)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Corección de Erros

segment.source: NVDA now starts correctly when the log file cannot be created. (#6330)
segment.target: O NVDA agora arranca correctamente cando o ficheiro de rexistro non se poda crear. (#6330)

segment.source: In recent releases of Microsoft Word 365, NVDA will no longer announce "delete back word" when Control+Backspace is pressed while editing a document. (#10851)
segment.target: En versións recentes de Microsoft Word 365, o NVDA xa non anunciará "borrar palabra atrás" cando se prema Control+Retroceso mentres se edita un documento. (#10851)

segment.source: In Winamp, NVDA will once again announce toggle status of shuffle and repeat. (#10945)
segment.target: En Winamp, o NVDA anunciará de novo o estado de conmutación de aleatorio ou de repetir. (#10945)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer extremely sluggish when moving within the list of items in 1Password. (#10508)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non é extremadamente lento ao te mover dentro da listaxe de elementos en 1Password. (#10508)

segment.source: The Windows OneCore speech synthesizer no longer lags between utterances. (#10721)
segment.target: O sintetizador de voz Windows OneCore xa non ten retraso entre as frases. (#10721)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when you open the context menu for 1Password in the system notification area. (#11017)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non se conxela cando abres o menú de contexto para 1Password na área de notificacións do sistema. (#11017)

segment.source: In Office 2013 and older:
segment.target: En Office 2013 e anteriores:

segment.source: Ribbons are announced when focus moves to them for the first time. (#4207)
segment.target: As cintas anúncianse cando o foco se mova cara elas por primeira vez. (#4207)

segment.source: Context menu items are once again reported properly. (#9252)
segment.target: Os elementos do menú de contexto anúncianse de novo apropriadamente. (#9252)

segment.source: Ribbon sections are consistently announced when navigating with Control+arrows. (#7067)
segment.target: As secións das cintas anúncianse consistentemente ao navegar con Control+frechas. (#7067)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, text no longer incorrectly appears on a separate line when web content uses CSS display: inline-flex. (#11075)
segment.target: En modo Exploración en Mozilla Firefox e Google Chrome, o texto xa non aparece incorectamente nunha liña separada cando o contido web usa no CSS display: inline-flex. (#11075)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements that aren't focusable.
segment.target: En modo Exploración co foco automático do sistema configurado a elementos enfocables desactivado, agora é posible activar elementos que non sexan enfocables.

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements reached by pressing the tab key. (#8528)
segment.target: En modo Exploración co foco automático do sistema configurado a elementos enfocables desactivado, agora é posible activar elementos alcanzables premendo a tecla tab. (#8528)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, activating certain elements no longer clicks in an incorrect location. (#9886)
segment.target: En modo Exploración co foco automático do sistema configurado a elementos enfocables desactivado, activar certos elementos xa non fai clic nun lugar incorrecto. (#9886)

segment.source: NVDA error sounds are no longer heard when accessing DevExpress text controls. (#10918)
segment.target: Os sons de erro do NVDA xa non se escoitan cando se aceda a controis de texto de DevExpress. (#10918)

segment.source: The tool-tips of the icons in the system tray are no longer reported upon keyboard navigation if their text is equal to the name of the icons, to avoid double announcing. (#6656)
segment.target: Os consellos das iconass na bandexa do sistema xa non se anuncian ao navegar co teclado se o seu texto é igual ao seu nome, para evitar un anunciado duplicado. (#6656)

segment.source: In browse mode with 'Automatically set system focus to focusable elements' disabled, switching to focus mode with NVDA+space now focuses the element under the caret. (#11206)
segment.target: En modo Exploración co foco automático do sistema configurado a elementos enfocables desactivado, cambiar a modo Foco con NVDA+espazo agora enfoca o elemento baixo o cursor. (#11206)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#11253)
segment.target: De novo é posible procurar actualizacións do NVDA en certos sistemas; ex.: instalacións limpas de Windows. (#11253)

segment.source: Focus is not moved in Java application when the selection is changed in an unfocused tree, table or list. (#5989)
segment.target: O foco non se move nunha aplicación Java cando a seleción se cambie nunha árbore, táboa ou listaxe non enfocable. (#5989)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenroladores

segment.source: execElevated and hasUiAccess have moved from config module to systemUtils module. Usage via config module is deprecated. (#10493)
segment.target: execElevated y hasUiAccess movéronse do módulo config ao módulo systemUtils. O uso a través do módulo config é obsoleta. (#10493)

segment.source: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)
segment.target: Actualizado configobj a 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)

segment.source: Automated testing of NVDA with Chrome and a HTML sample is now possible. (#10553)
segment.target: Agora é posible a comprobación automatizada do NVDA con Chrome e un exemplo HTML. (#10553)

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler has been converted into a package, OrderedWinEventLimiter has been extracted to a module and unit tests added (#10934)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler convertééuse nun paquete, OrderedWinEventLimiter extraíuse a un módulo e engadíronse probas de unidade (#10934)

segment.source: Updated BrlApi to version 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)
segment.target: Actualizado BrlApi á versión 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)

segment.source: Status bar retrieval may now be customized by an AppModule. (#2125, #4640)
segment.target: A recuperación da barra de estado agora pode seren persoalizada por un AppModule. (#2125, #4640)

segment.source: NVDA no longer listens for IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non escoita ao IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)

segment.source: A broken ScriptableObject (such as a GlobalPlugin missing a call to its base class' init method) no longer breaks NVDA's script handling. (#5446)
segment.target: Un ScriptableObject rompido (coma un GlobalPlugin que perda unha chamada á súa crase base ' método init ) xa non rompe o manexo dos scripts do NVDA. (#5446)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for several new braille displays from HumanWare and APH, plus many other important bug fixes such as the ability to again read math in Microsoft Word using MathPlayer / MathType.
segment.target: O subliñable desta versión inclúe o soporte de varias novas pantallas braille de HumanWare e de APH, máis moitos outros arranxos importantes de fallos como a capacidade de ler de novo matemáticas en Microsoft Word usando MathPlayer e MathType.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: The currently selected item in listboxes is again presented in browse mode in Chrome, similar to NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)
segment.target: O elemento actualmente selecionado en caixas de listaxe preséntase de novo en modo exploración en Chrome, semellante a o NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)

segment.source: You can now perform right mouse clicks on touch devices by doing a one finger tap and hold. (#3886)
segment.target: Agora podes realizar clics co botón dereito do rato en dispositivos táctiles facendo un tap cun dedo e manténdoo. (#3886)

segment.source: Support for New braille displays: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2, and NLS eReader. (#10830)
segment.target: Soporte para pantallas braille novas: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2, e NLS eReader. (#10830)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from locking or going to sleep when in say all. (#10643)
segment.target: o NVDA evitará que o sistema se bloquee ou se suspenda cando estea a ler todo. (#10643)

segment.source: Support for out-of-process iframes in Mozilla Firefox. (#10707)
segment.target: Soporte para iframes fora de proceso en Mozilla Firefox. (#10707)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.12. (#10161)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille liblouis á versión 3.12. (#10161)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de Fallos

segment.source: Fixed NVDA not announcing Unicode minus symbol (U+2212). (#10633)
segment.target: Arranxado o non anunciado do símbolo menos Unicode (U+2212) (#10633)

segment.source: When installing add-on from add-ons manager, names of files and folders in the browse window are no longer reported twice. (#10620, #2395)
segment.target: Ao se instalar complementos dende o administrador de complementos os nomes dos ficheiros e cartafols na xanela de exploración xa non se anuncian dúas veces. (#10620, #2395)

segment.source: In Firefox, when loading Mastodon with the advanced web interface enabled, all timelines now render correctly in browse mode. (#10776)
segment.target: En Firefox, ao se cargar Mastodon coa interface de web avanzada activada, agora todas as cronoloxías procésanse correctamente en modo exploración. (#10776)

segment.source: In browse mode, NVDA now reports "not checked" for unchecked check boxes where it sometimes didn't previously. (#10781)
segment.target: En modo exploración, o NVDA agora anuncia "non marcado" para caixas de verificación non marcadas onde non o facía en ocasións anteriormente. (#10781)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls no longer report confusing information such as "not pressed checked" or "pressed checked". (#9187)
segment.target: Os controis ARIA switch xa non anuncian información confusa como "non premedo marcado" ou "premedo marcado". (#9187)

segment.source: SAPI4 voices should no longer refuse to speak certain text. (#10792)
segment.target: As voces SAPI4 xa non deberían rexeitar falar certo texto. (#10792)

segment.source: NVDA can again read and interact with math equations in Microsoft Word. (#10803)
segment.target: O NVDA pode ler e interactuar de novo con ecuacións matemáticas en Microsoft Word. (#10803)

segment.source: NVDA will again announce text being unselected in browse mode if pressing an arrow key while text is selected. (#10731).
segment.target: O NVDA anunciará de novo o texto que se deselecione en modo exploración se se preme unha frecha mentres o texto se seleciona. (#10731).

segment.source: NVDA no longer exits if there is an error initializing eSpeak. (#10607)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non sae se hai un erro inicializando o eSpeak. (#10607)

segment.source: Errors caused by unicode in translations for shortcuts no longer stop the installer, mitigated by falling back to the English text. (#5166, #6326)
segment.target: Os erros causados polo unicode en traduccións para atallos xa non deteñen o instalador, mitigados pola volta ao texto en inglés. (#5166, #6326)

segment.source: Arrowing out and away from lists and tables in sayAll with skim reading enabled no longer continuously announces exiting the list or table. (#10706)
segment.target: O feito de saír das listaxes e táboas en Ler todo coa lectura superficial activada xa non anuncia continuamente a saída da listaxe ou táboa. (#10706)

segment.source: Fix mouse tracking for some MSHTML elements in Internet Explorer. (#10736)
segment.target: Arranxado o seguemento do rato para algúns elementos MSHTML en Internet Explorer. (#10736)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Developer documentation is now build using sphinx. (#9840)
segment.target: Agora compílase a documentación para o desenvolvedor usando sphinx. (#9840)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been split into two. (#10593)
segment.target: Dividíronse en dous varias funcións da fala. (#10593)

segment.source: The speakX version remains, but now depends on a getXSpeech function which returns a speech sequence.
segment.target: A versión speakX permanece, pero agora depende dunha función getXSpeech a que devolve unha secuencia de fala.

segment.source: speakObjectProperties now relies on getObjectPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: speakObjectProperties agora baséase en getObjectPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: speakObject now relies on getObjectSpeech
segment.target: speakObject agora baséase en getObjectSpeech

segment.source: speakTextInfo now relies on getTextInfoSpeech
segment.target: speakTextInfo agora baséase en getTextInfoSpeech

segment.source: speakWithoutPauses has been converted into a class, and refactored, but should not break compatibility.
segment.target: speakWithoutPauses convertiuse nunha clase, e refactorizouse, pero non debería romper a retrocompatibilidade.

segment.source: getSpeechForSpelling is deprecated (though still available) use getSpellingSpeech instead.
segment.target: getSpeechForSpelling está obsoleta (aíndaque todavía dispoñible) usa getSpellingSpeech no seu lugar.

segment.source: Private changes that should not affect addon developers:
segment.target: Cambios privados que non deberían afectar aos desenvolvedores de complementos:

segment.source: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty is now _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty
segment.target: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty agora é _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty

segment.source: _speakTextInfo_addMath is now _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo
segment.target: _speakTextInfo_addMath agora é _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo

segment.source: Speech 'reason' has been converted to an Enum, see controlTypes.OutputReason class. (#10703)
segment.target: Speech 'reason' convertiuse a un Enum, Consulta a clase controlTypes.OutputReason. (#10703)

segment.source: Module level 'REASON_*' constants are deprecated.
segment.target: As constantes Module level 'REASON_*' están obsoletas.

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies now requires Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 or newer). (#10169)
segment.target: As dependencias de compilación do NVDA agora requiren Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 ou máis recente). (#10169)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 3.1.1. (#10169)
segment.target: Actualizado SCons á versión 3.1.1. (#10169)

segment.source: Again allow behaviors._FakeTableCell to have no location defined (#10864)
segment.target: Novamente permíteselle a behaviors._FakeTableCell non teren unha localización definida (#10864)

segment.source: NVDA 2019.3 is a very significant release containing many under-the-hood changes including the upgrade of Python 2 to Python 3, and a major re-write of NVDA's speech subsystem.
segment.target: O NVDA 2019.3 é unha versión moi importante que contén moitos cambios baixo o capó, incluíndo a actualización de Python 2 a Python 3, e unha importante reescritura do sistema da fala do NVDA.

segment.source: Although these changes do break compatibility with older NVDA add-ons, the upgrade to Python 3 is necessary for security, and the changes to speech allow for some exciting innovations in the near future.
segment.target: Aíndaque estos cambios rompan a compatibilidade cos antigos complemenhtos do NVDA, a actualización a Python 3 é necesaria por motivos de seguridade, e os cambios na fala permiten algunhas innovacións interesantes nun futuro cercano.

segment.source: Other highlights in this release include 64 bit support for Java VMs, Screen Curtain and Focus Highlight functionality, support for more braille displays and a new Braille viewer, and many many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Outros aspectos destacados nesta versión inclúen o soporte para 64 bits para Java VMs, as funcionalidades Cortina de Pantalla e Resaltado do Foco, admisión de máis pantallas braille e un novo visor braille, e moitos outros arranxos de erros.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: The accuracy of the move mouse to navigator object command has been improved in text fields in Java applications. (#10157)
segment.target: A precisión da orde mover o rato ao navegador de obxectos melloruose en campos de texto en aplicacións Java. (#10157)

segment.source: Added support for the following Handy Tech Braille displays (#8955):
segment.target: Engadido o soporte para as seguintes pantallas braille Handy Tech (#8955):

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 40
segment.target: Basic Braille Plus 40

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 32
segment.target: Basic Braille Plus 32

segment.source: Connect Braille
segment.target: Connect Braille

segment.source: All user-defined gestures can now be removed via a new "Reset to factory defaults" button in the Input Gestures dialog. (#10293)
segment.target: Todos os xestos definidos polo usuario poden agora borrarse mediante un novo botón "Restablecer os valores predeterminados de fábrica" na caixa de diálogo Xestos de entrada. (#10293)

segment.source: Font reporting in Microsoft Word now includes if text is marked as hidden. (#8713)
segment.target: O anunciado de fonte en Microsoft Word agora inclúe se o texto se marca como agochado. (#8713)

segment.source: Added a command to move the review cursor to the position previously set as start marker for selection or copy: NVDA+shift+F9. (#1969)
segment.target: Engadida unha orde para mover o cursor de revisión á posición anteriormente axustada como marca de comezo de seleción ou copia: NVDA+shift+F9. (#1969)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge and recent versions of Firefox and Chrome, landmarks are now reported in focus mode and object navigation. (#10101)
segment.target: En Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge e versións recentes de Firefox e Chrome, as rexións agora anúncianse en modo foco e no navegador de obxectos. (#10101)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, You can now navigate by article and grouping using quick navigation scripts. These scripts are unbound by default and can be assigned in the Input Gestures dialog when the dialog is opened from a browse mode document. (#9485, #9227)
segment.target: En Internet Explorer, Google Chrome e Mozilla Firefox, agora podes navegar por artigos e grupos usando os scripts de navegación rápida. Estos scripts non están vinculados por omisión e poden asignarse no diálogo Xestos de Entrada cando o diálogo se abra dende un documento en modo exploración. (#9227)

segment.source: Figures are also reported. They are considered objects and therefore navigable with the o quick navigation key.
segment.target: Agora anúncianse as figuras. Considéranse obxectos e, polo tanto, navegables coa tecla de navegación rápida o.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, article elements are now reported with object navigation, and optionally in browse mode if turned on in Document Formatting settings. (#10424)
segment.target: En Internet Explorer, Google Chrome e Mozilla Firefox, agora anúncianse os elementos artigo co navegador de obxecto, e opcionalmente, en modo Exploración se se activou nas opcións de Formateado de Documentos. (#10424)

segment.source: Added screen curtain, which when enabled, makes the whole screen black on Windows 8 and later. (#7857)
segment.target: Engadiuse unha Cortina de Pantalla que, ao se activar, fai que toda a pantalla se torne negra en Windows 8 e posteriores. (#7857)

segment.source: Added a script to enable screen curtain (until next restart with one press, or always while NVDA is running with two presses), no default gesture is assigned.
segment.target: Engadiuse un script para activar a cortina de pantalla (ate o seguinte reinicio cunha soa pulsación, ou sempre mentres o NVDA estea en execución con dúas pulsacións), non se asigna ningún xesto predeterminado.

segment.source: Can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Pode activarse e configurarse a través da categoría 'visión' no diálogo opcións do NVDA.

segment.source: Added screen highlight functionality to NVDA. (#971, #9064)
segment.target: Engadida a funcionalidade Resaltado de pantalla ao NVDA. (#971, #9064)

segment.source: Highlighting of the focus, navigator object, and browse mode caret position can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: O resaltado do foco, do navegador de obxectos e da posición do cursor do modo Exploración poden activarse e configurarse a través da categoría 'visión' no diálogo Opcións do NVDA.

segment.source: Note: This feature is incompatible with the focus highlight add-on, however, the add-on can still be used while the built-in highlighter is disabled.
segment.target: Nota: esta característica é incompatible co complemento focus highlight, sen embargo, o complemento aínda pode usarse mentres o resaltador incorporado estea desactivado.

segment.source: Added Braille Viewer tool, allows viewing braille output via an on-screen window. (#7788)
segment.target: Engadida a ferramenta Visualizador de Braille, que permite ver a saída braille a través dunha xanela sobre a pantalla. (#7788)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: The user guide now describes how to use NVDA in the Windows Console. (#9957)
segment.target: A Guía do Usuario agora describe cómo usar o NVDA na consola de Windows. (#9957)

segment.source: Running nvda.exe now defaults to replacing an already running copy of NVDA. The -r|--replace command line parameter is still accepted, but ignored. (#8320)
segment.target: A execución do nvda.exe agora está predeterminada para reemplazar unha copia xa en execución do NVDA. O parámetro de liña de ordes -r|--replace aínda se acepta, pero ignórase. (#8320)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will now report product name and version information for hosted apps such as apps downloaded from Microsoft Store using information provided by the app. (#4259, #10108)
segment.target: En Windows 8 e posterior, o NVDA agora anunciará a información de nome do producto e da versión para aplicacións nativas como as aplicacións descargadas da Tenda de Microsoft usando información proporcionada pola aplicación. (#4259, #10108)

segment.source: When toggling track changes on and off with the keyboard in Microsoft Word, NVDA will announce the state of the setting. (#942)
segment.target: Ao activar e desactivar os cambios de seguemento co teclado de Microsoft Word, o NVDA anunciará o estado da configuración. (#942)

segment.source: The NVDA version number is now logged as the first message in the log. This occurs even if logging has been disabled from the GUI. (#9803)
segment.target: O número de versión do NVDA agora rexístrase como a primeira mensaxe no rexistro. Esto ocurre incluso se se desactivou o rexistro dende a Interfaz Gráfica de Usuario. (#9803)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer allows for changing the configured log level if it has been overridden from the command line. (#10209)
segment.target: O diálogo de opcións xa non permite cambiar o nivel do rexistro configurado se se substituíu dende a liña de ordes. (#10209)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the display state of non printable characters when pressing the toggle shortcut Ctrl+Shift+8 . (#10241)
segment.target: En Microsoft Word, o NVDA agora anuncia o estado de visualización dos caracteres non imprimibles ao premer o atallo conmutable Ctrl+Shift+8. (#10241)

segment.source: Updated Liblouis braille translator to commit 58d67e63. (#10094)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille Liblouis a commit 58d67e63. (#10094)

segment.source: When CLDR characters (including emojis) reporting is enabled, they are announced at all punctuation levels. (#8826)
segment.target: Cando o anunciado de caracteres CLDR (incluindo emojis) está activado, anúncianse nos niveis de toda a puntoación. (#8826)

segment.source: Third party python packages included in NVDA, such as comtypes, now log their warnings and errors to the NVDA log. (#10393)
segment.target: Os paquetes python de terceiros incluídos no NVDA como comtypes, agora rexistran as súas advertencias e erros no rexistro do NVDA. (#10393)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations to version 36.0. (#10426)
segment.target: Actualizado Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations á versión 36.0. (#10426)

segment.source: When focussing a grouping in browse mode, the description is now also read. (#10095)
segment.target: Ao enfocar un grupo no modo Exploración, agora tamén se le a descripción. (#10095)

segment.source: The Java Access Bridge is now included with NVDA to enable access to Java applications, including for 64 bit Java VMs. (#7724)
segment.target: Agora inclúese o Java Access Bridge co NVDA para permitir o acceso a aplicacións Java, incluso para máquinas Java de 64 bits. (#7724)

segment.source: If the Java Access Bridge is not enabled for the user, NVDA automatically enables it at NVDA startup. (#7952)
segment.target: Se o Java Access Bridge non está habilitado para o usuario, o NVDA actívao actomáticamente ao arrancar. (#7952)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)
segment.target: Actualizado eSpeak-NG á 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Arranxo de fallos

segment.source: Emoji and other 32 bit unicode characters now take less space on a braille display when they are shown as hexadecimal values. (#6695)
segment.target: Os Emoji e outros caracteres unicode de 32 bits agora ocupan menos espazo nas pantallas braille cando se amosan como valores hexadecimais. (#6695)

segment.source: In Windows 10, NVDA will announce tooltips from universal apps if NVDA is configured to report tooltips in object presentation dialog. (#8118)
segment.target: En Windows 10, o NVDA anunciará os consellos das aplicacións universais se o NVDA se configurou para anunciar consellos no diálogo Presentación de Obxectos. (#8118)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, typed text is now reported in Mintty. (#1348)
segment.target: En Windows 10 versión 1607 e posterior, agora anúnciase o texto escrebido en Mintty. (#1348)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, output in the Windows Console that appears close to the caret is no longer spelled out. (#513)
segment.target: En Windows 10 versión 1607 e posterior, a saída na consola de Windows que apareza preto do cursor xa non se deletrea. (#513)

segment.source: Controls in Audacitys compressor dialog are now announced when navigating the dialog. (#10103)
segment.target: Os controis no diálogo compresor de Audacity agora anúncianse ao se navegar por el. (#10103)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats spaces as words in object review in Scintilla based editors such as Notepad++. (#8295)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non trata os espazos coma palabras en revisión de obxectos en editores baseados en Scintilla como Notepad++. (#8295)

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from entering sleep mode when scrolling through text with braille display gestures. (#9175)
segment.target: O NVDA evitará que o sistema entre no modo durminte ao se desprazar polo texto con xestos da pantalla braille. (#9175)

segment.source: On Windows 10, braille will now follow when editing cell contents in Microsoft Excel and in other UIA text controls where it was lagging behind. (#9749)
segment.target: En Windows 10, o braille agora seguerá ao editar contido de celdas en Microsoft Excel e noutros controis de texto UIA onde se quedaba atrás. (#9749)

segment.source: NVDA will once again report suggestions in the Microsoft Edge address bar. (#7554)
segment.target: O NVDA voltará a anunciar as suxerencias na barra de dirección de Microsoft Edge. (#7554)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer silent when focusing an HTML tab control header in Internet Explorer. (#8898)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non se silencia cando se enfoque un control de cabeceira de pestana HTML en Internet Explorer. (#8898)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge based on EdgeHTML, NVDA will no longer play search suggestion sound when the window becomes maximized. (#9110, #10002)
segment.target: En Microsoft Edge baseado en EdgeHTML, o NVDA xa non reproducirá o son de suxerencia de buxca ao maximizar a xanela. (#9110, #10002)

segment.source: ARIA 1.1 combo boxes are now supported in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. (#9616)
segment.target: As caixas combinadas de ARIA 1.1 agora admítense en Mozilla Firefox e en Google Chrome. (#9616)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer report content of visually hidden columns for list items in SysListView32 controls. (#8268)
segment.target: O NVDA xa non anunciará o contido das columnas visualmente agochado para os elementos de listaxe en controis SysListView32. (#8268)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer shows "info" as the current log level when in secure mode. (#10209)
segment.target: O diálogo Opcións xa non amosa "info" coma o nivel de rexistro actual cando se estea en modo seguro. (#10209)

segment.source: In Start menu for Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, NVDA will announce details of search results. (#10340)
segment.target: No menú Inicio de Windows 10 Anniversary Update e posterior, o NVDA anunciará detalles dos resultados da busca. (#10232)

segment.source: In browse mode, if moving the cursor or using quick navigation causes the document to change, NVDA no longer speaks incorrect content in some cases. (#8831, #10343)
segment.target: En modo Exploración, se ao mover o cursor ou ao usar a navegación rápida prodúcese un cambio no documento, o NVDA xa non fala contido incorrecto nalgúns casos. (#8831, #10343)

segment.source: Some bullet names in Microsoft Word have been corrected. (#10399)
segment.target: Arranxáronse algúns nomes de viñetas en Microsoft Word. (#10399)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA will once again announce first selected emoji or clipboard item when emoji panel and clipboard history opens, respectively. (#9204)
segment.target: En Windows 10 May 2019 Update e posteriores, o NVDA anunciará outra vez o primeiro emoji ou elemento do portapapeis selecionado cando se abra o panel de emojis e o historial do portapapeis respectivamente. (#9204)

segment.source: In Poedit, it is once again possible to view some translations for right to left languages. (#9931)
segment.target: En Poedit, unha vez máis é posible ver algunhas traducións para as linguas de dereita a esquerda. (#9931)

segment.source: In the Settings app in Windows 10 April 2018 Update and later, NVDA will no longer announce progress bar information for volume meters found in the System/Sound page. (#10412)
segment.target: Na aplicación de configuración de Windows 10 April 2018 Update e posteriores, o NVDA xa non anunciará a información das barras de progreso dos medidores de volume que se atopan na páxina sistema/Son. (#10284)

segment.source: Invalid regular expressions in speech dictionaries no longer completely break speech in NVDA. (#10334)
segment.target: As expresións regulares inválidas nos diccionarios da fala xa non interrumpen compretamente a voz no NVDA. (#10334)

segment.source: When reading bulleted items in Microsoft Word with UIA enabled, the bullet from the next list item is no longer inappropriately announced. (#9613)
segment.target: Cando se len elementos con viñetas en Microsoft Word co UIA activado, a viñeta do seguinte elemento da listaxe xa non se anuncia de xeito inapropiado. (#9613)

segment.source: Some rare braille translation issues and errors with liblouis have been resolved. (#9982)
segment.target: Resolvéronse algúns problemas raros de transcripción braille e erros con liblouis. (#9982)

segment.source: Java applications started before NVDA are now accessible without the need to restart the Java app. (#10296)
segment.target: As aplicacións Java comezadas antes do NVDA agora son accesibles sen a necesidade de comezar a aplicación Java. (#10296)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, when the focused element becomes marked as current (aria-current), this change is no longer spoken multiple times. (#8960)
segment.target: En Mozilla Firefox, cando o elemento enfocado se marca como actual (aria-current), este cambio xa non se fala varias veces. (#8960)

segment.source: NVDA will now treat certain composit unicode characters such as e-acute as one single character when moving through text. (#10550)
segment.target: O NVDA agora tratará certos caracteres de composición unicode como e-acute como un so carácter ao se mover polo texto. (#10550)

segment.source: Spring Tool Suite Version 4 is now supported. (#10001)
segment.target: Agora admítese Spring Tool Suite Versión 4. (#10001)

segment.source: Don't double speak name when aria-labelledby relation target is an inner element. (#10552)
segment.target: Non se pronuncia o nome por duplicado cuando aria-labelledby relation target é un elemento interior. (#10552)

segment.source: On Windows 10 version 1607 and later, typed characters from Braille keyboards are spoken in more situations. (#10569)
segment.target: En Windows 10 version 1607 e posterior, os caracteres escrebidos dende teclados Braille fálanse en máis situacións. (#10569)

segment.source: When changing the audio output device, tones played by NVDA will now play through the newly selected device. (#2167)
segment.target: Ao se cambiar o dispositivo de saída de audio, os tons reproducidos polo NVDA agora reproduciranse polo dispositivo recentemente selecionado. (#2167)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving focus in browse mode is faster. This makes moving the cursor in browse mode more responsive in many cases. (#10584)
segment.target: En Mozilla Firefox, mover o foco en modo Exploración é máis rápido. Esto fai que mover o cursor en modo Exploración sexa máis áxil en moitos casos. (#10584)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Updated Python to 3.7. (#7105)
segment.target: Actualizado Python a 3.7. (#7105)

segment.source: Updated pySerial to version 3.4. (#8815)
segment.target: Actualizado pySerial á versión 3.4. (#8815)

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3 to support Python 3.5 and later. (#9630)
segment.target: Actualizado wxPython a 4.0.3 para soportar Python 3.5+ (#9630)

segment.source: Updated six to version 1.12.0. (#9630)
segment.target: Actualizado six á versión 1.12.0 (#9630)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.9.3.2 (in development, commit b372a8e from albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)
segment.target: Actualizado py2exe á versión 0.9.3.2 (en desenvolvemento, commit b372a8e from albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)

segment.source: Updated UIAutomationCore.dll comtypes module to version 10.0.18362. (#9829)
segment.target: Actualizado UIAutomationCore.dll módulo comtypes á versión 10.0.18362. (#9829)

segment.source: The tab-completion in the Python console only suggests attributes starting with an underscore if the underscore is first typed. (#9918)
segment.target: O compretado con tab na consola de Python só suxire atributos que comecen cun guión baixo se o guión baixo se escrebe primeiro. (#9918)

segment.source: Flake8 linting tool has been integrated with SCons reflecting code requirements for Pull Requests. (#5918)
segment.target: A ferramenta Flake8 integrouse con SCons para reflectir os requisitos do código para Pull Requests. (#5918)

segment.source: As NVDA no longer depends on pyWin32, modules such as win32api and win32con are no longer available to add-ons. (#9639)
segment.target: Como o NVDA xa non depende de pyWin32, módulos como win32api e win32con xa non están dispoñibles para os complementos. (#9639)

segment.source: win32api calls can be replaced with direct calls to win32 dll functions via ctypes.
segment.target: As chamadas a win32api poden reemprazarse con chamadas directas a funcións win32 dll a través de ctypes.

segment.source: win32con constants should be defined in your files.
segment.target: As constantes win32con deberían definirse nos teus ficheiros.

segment.source: The "async" argument in nvwave.playWaveFile has been renamed to "asynchronous". (#8607)
segment.target: O argumento "async" en nvwave.playWaveFile renomeouse a "asynchronous". (#8607)

segment.source: speakText and speakCharacter methods on synthDriver objects are no longer supported.
segment.target: Os métodos speakText e speakCharacter en obxectos synthDriver xa non se admiten.

segment.source: This functionality is handled by SynthDriver.speak.
segment.target: Esta funcionalidade manéxase con SynthDriver.speak.

segment.source: SynthSetting classes in synthDriverHandler have been removed. Now use driverHandler.DriverSetting classes instead.
segment.target: As clases SynthSetting en synthDriverHandler boráronse. Agora usa as clases driverHandler.DriverSetting en cambio.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes should no longer expose index via the lastIndex property.
segment.target: As clases SynthDriver xa non deberían expoñer índices a través da propiedade lastIndex.

segment.source: Instead, they should notify the synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached action with the index, once all previous audio has finished playing before that index.
segment.target: En cambio, deberían notificar a acción synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached co índice, unha vez que todo o audio anterior finalizara de reproducirse antes dese índice.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must now notify the synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking action, once all audio from a SynthDriver.speak call has completed playing.
segment.target: As clases SynthDriver agora deben notificar a acción synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking, unha vez todo o audio de unha chamada a SynthDriver.speak terminara de reproducirse.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must support the speech.PitchCommand in their speak method, as changes in pitch for speak spelling now depends on this functionality.
segment.target: As clases SynthDriver deben admitir speech.PitchCommand no seu método speak, xa que os cambios no ton da fala do deletreo agora dependen desta funcionalidade.

segment.source: The speech function getSpeechTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)
segment.target: A función de fala getSpeechTextForProperties renomeouse a getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)

segment.source: The braille function getBrailleTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)
segment.target: A función de braille getBrailleTextForProperties renomeouse a getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been changed to return speech sequences. (#10098)
segment.target: Cambiáronse varias funcións da fala para devolver as secuencias de fala. (#10098)

segment.source: getControlFieldSpeech
segment.target: getControlFieldSpeech

segment.source: getFormatFieldSpeech
segment.target: getFormatFieldSpeech

segment.source: getSpeechTextForProperties now called getPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: getSpeechTextForProperties chamada agora getPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: getIndentationSpeech
segment.target: getIndentationSpeech

segment.source: getTableInfoSpeech
segment.target: getTableInfoSpeech

segment.source: Added a textUtils module to simplify string differences between Python 3 strings and Windows unicode strings. (#9545)
segment.target: Engadido un módulo textUtils para simplificar as diferencias de cadea entre as cadeas de Python 3 e as cadeas de Windows unicode. (#9545)

segment.source: See the module documentation and textInfos.offsets module for example implementations.
segment.target: Consulta a documentación do módulo e o módulo textInfos.offsets para exemplos de implementacións.

segment.source: Deprecated functionality now removed. (#9548)
segment.target: Agora borrouse funcionalidade obsoleta. (#9548)

segment.source: AppModules removed:
segment.target: AppModules eliminados:

segment.source: Windows XP sound recorder.
segment.target: Windows XP sound recorder.

segment.source: Klango Player, which is abandoned software.
segment.target: Klango Player, que é un software abandoado.

segment.source: configobj.validate wrapper removed.
segment.target: configobj.validate wrapper eliminado.

segment.source: New code should use from configobj import validate instead of import validate
segment.target: Debería usarse o código novo configobj import validate en lugar de import validate

segment.source: textInfos.Point and textInfos.Rect replaced by locationHelper.Point and locationHelper.RectLTRB respectively.
segment.target: textInfos.Point e textInfos.Rect reemplazados por locationHelper.Point e locationHelper.RectLTRB respectivamente.

segment.source: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether and braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether have been removed.
segment.target: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether e braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether elimináronse.

segment.source: config.getConfigDirs has been removed.
segment.target: config.getConfigDirs borrouse.

segment.source: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter has been replaced by getConfigValidation
segment.target: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter reemprazouse por getConfigValidation

segment.source: inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier property has been removed.
segment.target: A propiedade inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier eliminouse.

segment.source: Use _get_identifiers in inputCore.InputGesture instead.
segment.target: Usa _get_identifiers in inputCore.InputGesture en cambio.

segment.source: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter have been removed.
segment.target: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter, eliminouse.

segment.source: Removed several synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting classes.
segment.target: Eliminadas varias clases synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting

segment.source: Previously kept for backwards compatibility (#8214), now considered obsolete.
segment.target: Conservadas anteriormente para conpatibilidade con versións anteriores (#8214), agora considéranse obsoletas.

segment.source: Drivers that used the SynthSetting classes should be updated to use the DriverSetting classes.
segment.target: Os controladores que usen as clases SynthSetting deberían actualizarse para usar as clases DriverSetting.

segment.source: Some legacy code has been removed, particularly:
segment.target: Eliminouse algún código herdado, en particular:

segment.source: Support for the Outlook pre 2003 message list.
segment.target: Soporte para a listaxe de mensaxes de Outlook pre 2003.

segment.source: An overlay class for the classic start menu, only found in Windows Vista and earlier.
segment.target: Unha clase de superposición para o menú de Inicio clásico, que só se atopa en Windows Vista e anteriores.

segment.source: Dropped support for Skype 7, as it is definitely not working any more.
segment.target: Quitada a compatibilidade para Skype 7, xa que definitivamente non funciona máis.

segment.source: Added a framework to create vision enhancement providers; modules that can change screen contents, optionally based on input from NVDA about object locations. (#9064)
segment.target: Un framework que permite aos desenvolvedores crear proveedores de melloras visuais; módulos que poden cambiar o contido da pantalla, opcionalmente baseados na entrada do NVDA acerca de localizacións dos obxectos. (#9064)

segment.source: Add-ons can bundle their own providers in a visionEnhancementProviders folder.
segment.target: Os complementos poden abrupar os seus proprios proveedores nun cartafol visionEnhancementProviders.

segment.source: See the vision and visionEnhancementProviders modules for the implementation of the framework and examples, respectively.
segment.target: Consulta os módulos vision e visionEnhancementProviders para a implementación do framework e exempros, respectivamente.

segment.source: Vision enhancement providers are enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Os proporcionadores de melloras de visión están habilitados e configurados a través da categoría 'visión' no diálogo opcións de NVDA.

segment.source: Abstract class properties are now supported on objects that inherit from baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (e.g. NVDAObjects and TextInfos). (#10102)
segment.target: As propiedades da clase Abstract agora sopórtanse en obxectos que herdan de baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (ex.:. NVDAObjects e TextInfos). (#10102)

segment.source: Introduced displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK as a textInfos unit constant specific to DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)
segment.target: Introduciuse displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK coma unha constante de unidade textInfos específica para DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)

segment.source: This new constant allows walking over the text in a DisplayModelTextInfo in a way that more closely resembles how the text chunks are saved in the underlying model.
segment.target: Esta nova constante permite andar sobre o texto nun DisplayModelTextInfo de xeito que semella máis a cómo se gardan os cachos de texto no modelo subxacente.

segment.source: displayModel.getCaretRect now returns an instance of locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)
segment.target: displayModel.getCaretRect agora devolve unha instancia de locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)

segment.source: The UNIT_CONTROLFIELD and UNIT_FORMATFIELD constants have been moved from virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo to the textInfos package. (#10396)
segment.target: As constantes UNIT_CONTROLFIELD e UNIT_FORMATFIELD movéronse dende virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo ao paquete textInfos. (#10396)

segment.source: For every entry in the NVDA log, information about the originating thread is now included. (#10259)
segment.target: Para cada entrada no rexistro do NVDA, agora inclúese información sobre o fío orixinal. (#10259)

segment.source: UIA TextInfo objects can now be moved/expanded by the page, story and formatField text units. (#10396)
segment.target: Os obxectos UIA TextInfo agora poden moverse/expandirse pola páxina, histórico e unidades de texto formatField. (#10396)

segment.source: External modules (appModules and globalPlugins) are now less likely to be able to break the creation of NVDAObjects.
segment.target: Os módulos externos (appModules e globalPlugins) agora é menos probable que podan romper a creación de NVDAObjects.

segment.source: Exceptions caused by the "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" and "event_NVDAObject_init" methods are now properly caught and logged.
segment.target: As excepcións causadas polos métodos "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" e "event_NVDAObject_init" agora son correctamente capturadas e rexistradas.

segment.source: The aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles dictionary has been renamed to aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. It now also contains roles that aren't landmarks.
segment.target: O diccionario aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles renomeouse agora como aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. Tamén contén roles que non son rexións.

segment.source: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript has been removed due to lack of use. There is no replacement. (#8677)
segment.target: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript eliminouse debido á falta de uso. Non hai reemprazo. (#8677)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several crashes present in 2019.2. Fixes include:
segment.target: Esta é unha versión menor para arranxar varios bloqueos presentes en 2019.2. As correcións inclúen:

segment.source: Addressed several crashes in Gmail seen in both Firefox and Chrome when interacting with particular popup menus such as when creating filters or changing certain Gmail settings. (#10175, #9402, #8924)
segment.target: Solucionáronse varios problemas en Gmail que se viron tanto en Firefox coma en Chrome ao se interactuar con determinados menús emerxentes como ao se crear filtros ou ao se cambiar certas opcións de Gmail. (#10175, #9402, #8924)

segment.source: In Windows 7, NVDA no longer causes Windows Explorer to crash when the mouse is used in the start menu. (#9435)
segment.target: En Windows 7, o NVDA xa non fai que o explorador de arquivos de Windows se bloquee cando se use o rato no menú Inicio. (#9435)
