segment.source: In languages which use a space as a digit group/thousands separator such as French and German, numbers from separate chunks of text are no longer pronounced as a single number. This was particularly problematic for table cells containing numbers. (#555)
segment.target: Nas linguas que utilizan un espazo como separador de grupo de milleiro como francés e alemán, os números de grupos separados de texto xa non se pronuncian como un só número. Esto era particularmente problemático para celdas de táboas que conteñan números. (#555)

segment.source: nodes with an ARIA role of description in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls now are classed as static text, not edit fields.
segment.target: Os nodos cun rol de descripción de ARIA no Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML agora clasifícanse como texto estático, non como campos de edición.

segment.source: Fixed various issues when pressing tab while focus is on a document in browse mode (e.g. tab inappropriately moving to the address bar in Internet Explorer). (#720, #1367)
segment.target: Correxidos varios problemas cando se preme tab mentres o foco está nun documento en modo navegación (ex.: tab móvese inapropriadamente á barra de enderezos no Internet Explorer). (#720, #1367)

segment.source: When entering lists while reading text, NVDA now says, for example, "list with 5 items" instead of "listwith 5 items". (#1515)
segment.target: Cando se entra en listas mentres se le texto, NVDA agora di, por exemplo, "lista con 5 elementos" en lugar de "listacon 5 elementos". (#1515)

segment.source: In input help mode, gestures are logged even if their scripts bypass input help such as the scroll braille display forward and back commands.
segment.target: No modo de axuda de entrada, os xestos están no sistema aínda se os seus scripts deixan pasar a axuda de entrada como as ordes de desprazamento da líña braille cara adiante e atrás.

segment.source: In input help mode, when a modifier is held down on the keyboard, NVDA no longer reports the modifier as if it is modifying itself; e.g. NVDA+NVDA.
segment.target: No modo de axuda de entrada, cando unha modificadora se mantén pulsada no teclado, NVDA xa non anuncia a modificadora como se se modificase a sí mesma; ex.: NVDA+NVDA.

segment.source: In Adobe Reader documents, pressing c or shift+c to navigate to a combo box now works.
segment.target: Nos documentos do Adobe Reader, a pulsación da c ou shift+c para navegar a unha caixa combinada agora funciona.

segment.source: The selected state of selectable table rows is now reported the same way it is for list and tree view items.
segment.target: O estado seleccionado de filas de táboa seleccionables agora anúnciase do mesmo modo que para os elementos de lista e árbore.

segment.source: Controls in Firefox and other Gecko applications can now be activated while in browse mode even if their content has been floated off-screen. (#801)
segment.target: Os controis no Firefox e outras aplicacións Gecko agora poden activarse mentres se está no modo navegación aínda se o seu contido estivo flotando fora da pantalla. (#801)

segment.source: You can no longer show an NVDA settings dialog while a message dialog is being shown, as the settings dialog was frozen in this case. (#1451)
segment.target: Xa non se pode amosar un diálogo de opcións de NVDA mentres se está amosando unha mensaxe de diálogo, xa que o diálogo de opcións colgábase neste caso. (#1451)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, there is no longer a lag when holding down or rapidly pressing keys to move between or select cells.
segment.target: No Microsoft Excel, xa non hai un retraso cando se mantiñan pulsadas ou se pulsaban teclas rápidamente para moverse entre celdas ou seleccionalas.

segment.source: Fixed intermittent crashes of the NVDA service which meant that NVDA stopped running on secure Windows screens.
segment.target: Correxidas rupturas do servicio NVDA que significaban que NVDA paraba de executarse en xanelas seguras de Windows.

segment.source: Fixed problems that sometimes occurred with braille displays when a change caused text that was being displayed to disappear. (#1377)
segment.target: Correxidos problemas que ocurrían ás veces con liñas braille cando un cambio causaba que o texto que estaba amosándose desaparecera.

segment.source: The downloads window in Internet Explorer 9 can now be navigated and read with NVDA. (#1280)
segment.target: A xanela de descargas no Internet Explorer 9 agora pode navegarse e lerse co NVDA. (#1280)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to accidentally start multiple copies of NVDA at the same time. (#507)
segment.target: Xa non é posible iniciar accidentalmente múltiples copias do NVDA ó mesmo tempo. (#507)

segment.source: On slow systems, NVDA no longer inappropriately causes its main window to be shown all the time while running. (#726)
segment.target: En sistemas lentos, NVDA xa non causa que a súa xanela principal se amose inapropriadamente todo o tempo mentres se executa. (#726)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes on Windows xP when starting a WPF application. (#1437)
segment.target: NVDA xa non se rompe en Windows xP cando se inicia unha aplicación WPF. (#1437)

segment.source: Say all and say all with review are now able to work in UI automation text controls that support all required functionality. For example, you can now use say all with review on XPS Viewer documents.
segment.target: Ler todo e ler todo co cursor de revisión agora poderá funcionar en algúns controis de texto UI automation que soporten todos os métodos necesarios. (ex.: agora podes utilizar dicir toda a revisión en documentos de XPS Viewer).

segment.source: NVDA no longer inappropriately classes some list items in the Outlook Express / Windows Live Mail message rules Apply Now dialog as being checkboxes. (#576)
segment.target: NVDA xa non clasifica inapropriadamente algúns elementos de lista no aplique de regras de mensaxes no Outlook Express / Windows Live Mail agora o diálogo é como caixas de verificación. (#576)

segment.source: Combo boxes are no longer reported as having a sub-menu.
segment.target: As caixas combinadas xa non se anuncian como tendo un submenú.

segment.source: NVDA is now able to read the recipiants in the To, CC and BCC fields in Microsoft Outlook. (#421)
segment.target: NVDA agora poderá ler o recipiente nos campos para, CC e CCO no Microsoft Outlook. (#421)

segment.source: Fixed the issue in NVDA's Voice Settings dialog where the value of sliders was sometimes not reported when changed. (#1411)
segment.target: Correxido o fallo no diálogo de Opcións de Voz de NVDA onde o valor das barras de desprazamento ás veces non se anunciaba cando cambiaban. (#1411)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce the new cell when moving in an Excel spreadsheet after cutting and pasting. (#1567)
segment.target: NVDA xa non falla ó anunciar a celda nova cando se move nunha folla Excel despóis de cortar e pegar. (#1567)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes worse at guessing color names the more colors it announces.
segment.target: NVDA xa non o fai tan mal adiviñando os nomes das cores anunciando a maioría das mesmas.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, fixed the inability to read parts of rare pages which contain iframes marked with an ARIA role of presentation. (#1569)
segment.target: No Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, correxiuse a incapacidade para ler partes de páxinas extranas que conteñen iframes marcados cun rol ARIA de presentación. (#1569)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, fixed a rare problem where the focus kept bouncing infinitely between the document and a multi-line editable text field in focus mode. (#1566)
segment.target: No Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, correxiuse un problema extrano onde o foco permanecía rebotando infinitamente entre o documento e un campo editable de texto multilínea en modo foco. (#1566)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word 2010 NVDA will now automatically read confirmation dialogs. (#1538)
segment.target: No Microsoft Word 2010 NVDA agora lerá automáticamente os diálogos de confirmación. (#1538)

segment.source: In multi-line editable text fields in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, selection on lines after the first is now reported correctly. (#1590)
segment.target: Nos campos editables multilínea de texto en Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, a selección en liñas despóis do primeiro agora anúnciase correctamente. (#1590)

segment.source: Improved moving by word in many cases, including browse mode and Windows Edit controls. (#1580)
segment.target: Mellorado o movemento por palabras en moitos casos, incluíndo modo navegación e controis de edición de Windows. (#1580)

segment.source: The NVDA installer no longer shows garbled text for Hong Kong versions of Windows Vista and Windows 7. (#1596)
segment.target: O instalador do NVDA xa non amosa texto confuso para versións para Hong Kong de Windows Vista e Windows 7. (#1596)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to load the Microsoft Speech API version 5 synthesizer if the configuration contains settings for that synthesizer but is missing the voice setting. (#1599)
segment.target: NVDA xa non falla ó cargar o sintetizador de Microsoft Speech API versión 5 se a configuración contén opcións para ese sintetizador pero falta a opción da voz. (#1599)

segment.source: In editable text fields in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, NVDA no longer lags or freezes when braille is enabled.
segment.target: En campos de texto editable en Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, o NVDA xa non se retrasa ou se conxela cando o braille estea activado.

segment.source: In firefox brows mode, NVDA no longer refuses to include content that is inside a focusable node with an ARIA role of presentation.
segment.target: No modo navegación de firefox, NVDA xa non se nega a incluir contido que estea dentro dun nodo enfocable con un rol ARIA de presentación.

segment.source: In Microsoft Word with braille enabled, lines on pages after the first page are now reported correctly. (#1603)
segment.target: No Microsoft Word co braille activado, as liñas en páxinas despóis da primeira páxina agora anúncianse correctamente. (#1603)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word 2003, lines of right-to-left text can once again be read with braille enabled. (#627)
segment.target: No Microsoft Word 2003, as liñas de texto de dereita a esquerda poden lerse unha vez de novo co braille activado. (#627)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, say all now works correctly when the document does not end with a sentence ending.
segment.target: No Microsoft Word, ler todo agora funciona correctamente cando o documento non remata cun final de frase.

segment.source: When opening a plain text message in Windows Live Mail 2011, NVDA will correctly focus on the message document allowing it to be read.
segment.target: Cando se abre unha mensaxe de texto chan no Windows Live Mail 2011, NVDA enfocará correctamente o documento de mensaxe permitindo que se lea.

segment.source: NVDA no longer temporarily freezes or refuses to speak when in the Move to / Copy to dialogs in Windows Live Mail. (#574)
segment.target: NVDA xa non se colga ou se nega a falar temporalmente cando está nos diálogos Mover a / Copiar a no Windows Live Mail. (#574)

segment.source: In Outlook 2010, NVDA will now correctly track the focus in the message list. (#1285)
segment.target: No Outlook 2010, NVDA agora seguirá correctamente o foco na lista de mensaxes. (#1285)

segment.source: Some USB connection issues have been resolved with the MDV Lilli braille display. (#241)
segment.target: Resolvéronse algúns problemas de conexión de USB ca liña braille MDV Lilli. (#241)

segment.source: In Internet explorer and other MSHTML controls, spaces are no longer ignored in browse mode in certain cases (e.g. after a link).
segment.target: En Internet explorer e outros controis MSHTML, os espazos xa non se ignoran en modo navegación en certos casos (é dicir despois dunha liga).

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, some extraneous line breaks have been eliminated in browse mode. specifically, HTML elements with a display style of None no longer force a line break. (#1685)
segment.target: En Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, foron eliminados algúns extranos cambios de liña en modo navegación. Específicamente, elementos HTML cun estilo de pantalla None xa non forza un salto de liña. (#1685)

segment.source: If NVDA is unable to start, failure to play the Windows critical stop sound no longer clobbers the critical error message in the log file.
segment.target: Se NVDA non é capaz de iniciarse, o fracaso para reproducir o son de parada crítica de Windows xa non anula a mensaxe de erro crítico no ficheiro do rexistro.

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenroladores

segment.source: Developer documentation can now be generated using SCons. See readme.txt at the root of the source distribution for details, including associated dependencies.
segment.target: A documentación de desenvolvedores agora pode xerarse utilizando SCons. mira readme.txt na raíz da distribución fonte para detalles, incluíndo dependencias asociadas.

segment.source: Locales can now provide descriptions for characters. See the Character Descriptions section of the Developer Guide for details. (#55)
segment.target: As Localizacións agora poden proporcionar descripcións para carácteres. Mira a sección Character Descriptions da Developer Guide para detalles. (#55)

segment.source: Locales can now provide information about the pronunciation of specific punctuation and other symbols. See the Symbol Pronunciation section of the Developer Guide for details. (#332)
segment.target: As Localizacións agora poden proporcionar información acerca da pronunciación de puntuación específica e outros símbolos. Mira a sección Symbol Pronunciation da Developer Guide para detalles. (#332)

segment.source: You can now build NVDAHelper with several debugging options using the nvdaHelperDebugFlags SCons variable. See readme.txt at the root of the source distribution for details. (#1390)
segment.target: Agora podes compilar NVDAHelper con varias opcións de depuración utilizando a variable nvdaHelperDebugFlags SCons. Mira readme.txt na raíz da distribución de fontes para detalles. (#1390)

segment.source: Synth drivers are now passed a sequence of text and speech commands to speak, instead of just text and an index.
segment.target: Os controladores de síntesis agora pásanse como unha secuencia de texto e ordes de voz a se falar, en lugar de só texto e un índice.

segment.source: This allows for embedded indexes, parameter changes, etc.
segment.target: Esto permite índices integrados, cambios de parámetros, etc.

segment.source: Drivers should implement SynthDriver.speak() instead of SynthDriver.speakText() and SynthDriver.speakCharacter().
segment.target: Os controladores deberían implementar SynthDriver.speak() en lugar de SynthDriver.speakText() e SynthDriver.speakCharacter().

segment.source: The old methods will be used if SynthDriver.speak() is not implemented, but they are deprecated and will be removed in a future release.
segment.target: Os métodos antigos utilizaranse se SynthDriver.speak() non se implementou, pero quedaron en desuso e eliminaranse nunha versión futura.

segment.source: gui.execute() has been removed. wx.CallAfter() should be used instead.
segment.target: Eliminouse gui.execute(). Debería utilizarse wx.CallAfter() no seu lugar.

segment.source: gui.scriptUI has been removed.
segment.target: Eliminouse gui.scriptUI .

segment.source: For message dialogs, use wx.CallAfter(gui.messageBox, ...).
segment.target: Para diálogos de mensaxe, utiliza wx.CallAfter(gui.messageBox, ...).

segment.source: For all other dialogs, real wx dialogs should be used instead.
segment.target: Para todos os demáis diálogos, deberían utilizarse os diálogos proprios de wx no seu lugar.

segment.source: A new gui.runScriptModalDialog() function simplifies using modal dialogs from scripts.
segment.target: Unha nova función gui.runScriptModalDialog() simplifica a utilización de diálogos modais de scripts.

segment.source: Synth drivers can now support boolean settings. See SynthDriverHandler.BooleanSynthSetting.
segment.target: Agora os controladores de sintetizador poden soportar opcións booleanas. Mira SynthDriverHandler.BooleanSynthSetting.

segment.source: SCons now accepts a certTimestampServer variable specifying the URL of a timestamping server to use to timestamp authenticode signatures. (#1644)
segment.target: SCons agora accepta unha variable certTimestampServer especifycando a URL dun servidor timestamping para utilizar unhas marcas timestamp authenticode. (#1644)

segment.source: This release fixes several security and other important issues found in NVDA 2011.1.
segment.target: Esta versión corrixe varios problemas de seguridade e outros importantes atopados en NVDA 2011.1.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Corrección de Erros

segment.source: The Donate item in the NVDA menu is now disabled when running on the logon, lock, UAC and other secure Windows screens, as this is a security risk. (#1419)
segment.target: O elemento Doar no menú NVDA agora desactívase cando se executa na autentificación, bloqueo, UAC e outras xanelas de pantallas seguras, xa que esto é un risco de seguridade. (#1419)

segment.source: It is now impossible to copy or paste within NVDA's user interface while on secure desktops (lock screen, UAC screen and windows logon) as this is a security risk. (#1421)
segment.target: Agora é imposible copiar ou pegar dentro da xanela de interface do usuario do NVDA mentres se está en escritorios seguros (Pantalla bloqueada, pantalla do UAC e autentificación de windows) xa que esto é un risco de seguridade. (#1421)

segment.source: In Firefox 4, the move to containing virtual buffer command (NVDA+control+space) now works as it should to escape embedded objects such as Flash content. (#1429)
segment.target: En Firefox 4, a orde mover ó contido do modo virtual (NVDA+control+espazo) agora funciona como debería escapar de obxectos integrados como contido Flash. (#1429)

segment.source: When speaking of command keys is enabled, shifted characters are no longer incorrectly spoken as command keys. (#1422)
segment.target: Cando falar teclas de ordes estea activado, os caracteres maiusculados xa non se falan incorrectamente como teclas de ordes. (#1422)

segment.source: When speaking of command keys is enabled, pressing space with modifiers other than shift (such as control and alt) is now reported as a command key. (#1424)
segment.target: Cando falar teclas de ordes estea activado,, premendo espazo con outros modificadores que shift (como control e alt) agora anúncianse como unha tecla de ordes. (#1424)

segment.source: Logging is now completely disabled when running on the logon, lock, UAC and other secure Windows screens, as this is a security risk. (#1435)
segment.target: O Logging agora desactívase completamente cando se execute dende a autentificación, bloqueo, UAC e outras xanelas seguras, xa que esto é un risco de seguridade. (#1435)

segment.source: In input help mode, Gestures are now logged even if they are not bound to a script (in accordance with the user guide). (#1425)
segment.target: No modo de axuda de entrada, os xestos agora conéctanse aínda se non están vencellados a un script (de acordo ca guía do usuario. (#1425)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include automatic reporting of new text output in mIRC, PuTTY, Tera Term and SecureCRT; support for global plugins; announcement of bullets and numbering in Microsoft Word; additional key bindings for braille displays, including keys to move to the next and previous line; support for several Baum, HumanWare and APH braille displays; and reporting of colors for some controls, including IBM Lotus Symphony text controls.
segment.target: O subliñable nesta versión inclúe o anunciado de cores para algúns controis; anunciado automático da saída de texto novo en mIRC, PuTTY, Tera Term e SecureCRT; soporte para plugins globais; anunciado de viñetas e numeración en Microsoft Word; combinacións de teclas adicionais para liñas braille, incluíndo teclas para moverse á liña seguinte e anterior; e soporte para varias liñas braille Baum, HumanWare e APH.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Colors can now be reported for some controls. Automatic announcement can be configured in the Document Formatting preferences dialog. It can also be reported on demand using the report text formatting command (NVDA+f).
segment.target: Agora pódense anunciar as cores para algúns controis. O anunciado automático pódese configurar no diálogo de preferencias de formateado de documentos. Tamén se poden anunciar baixo demanda utilizando a orde de anunciado de formato de texto (NVDA+f).

segment.source: Initially, this is supported in standard IAccessible2 editable text controls (such as in Mozilla applications), RichEdit controls (such as in Wordpad) and IBM Lotus Symphony text controls.
segment.target: Inicialmente, esto sopórtase en controis de texto estándar IAccessible2 (como en aplicacións de Mozilla), controis RichEdit (como en Wordpad) e controis de texto de IBM Lotus Symphony.

segment.source: In virtual buffers, you can now select by page (using shift+pageDown and shift+pageUp) and paragraph (using shift+control+downArrow and shift+control+upArrow). (#639)
segment.target: Nos modos virtuais, agora podes seleccionar por páxina (utilizando shift+AvPáx e shift+RePáx) e por parágrafos (utilizando shift+control+Flecha Abaixo e shift+control+Flecha Arriba). (#639)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports new text output in mIRC, PuTTY, Tera Term and SecureCRT. (#936)
segment.target: NVDA agora anuncia a saída do texto novo en mIRC, PuTTY, Tera Term e SecureCRT. (#936)

segment.source: Users can now add new key bindings or override existing ones for any script in NVDA by providing a single user input gesture map. (#194)
segment.target: Os usuarios agora poden engadir novas combinacións de teclas ou sobreescribir as existentes para calquer script no NVDA proporcionando un sinxelo mapa de movementos de entrada do usuario. (#194)

segment.source: Support for global plugins. Global plugins can add new functionality to NVDA which works across all applications. (#281)
segment.target: Soporte para plugins globais. Os plugins globais poden engadir nova funcionalidade ó NVDA que funcione en todas as aplicacións. (#281)

segment.source: A small beep is now heard when typing characters with the shift key while capslock is on. This can be turned off by unchecking the related new option in the Keyboard settings dialog. (#663)
segment.target: Agora escóitase un pequeño pitido cando se teclean caracteres ca tecla shift mentres o BloqMaius estea activado. Esto pódese desactivar desmarcando a nova opción relacionada no diálogo de Opcións de Teclado . (#663)

segment.source: hard page breaks are now announced when moving by line in Microsoft Word. (#758)
segment.target: Agora anúncianse os saltos de páxina cando nos movemos por liñas en Microsoft Word. (#758)

segment.source: Bullets and numbering are now spoken in Microsoft Word when moving by line. (#208)
segment.target: As viñetas e a numeración fálanse agora en Microsoft Word cando nos movemos por liñas. (#208)

segment.source: A command to toggle Sleep mode for the current application (NVDA+shift+s) is now available. Sleep mode (previously known as self voicing mode) disables all screen reading functionality in NVDA for a particular application. Very useful for applications that provide their own speech and or screen reading features. Press this command again to disable Sleep mode.
segment.target: Agora está dispoñible unha orde para activar ou desactivar o modo Durminte para a aplicación actual (NVDA+shift+s). O Modo Durminte (anteriormente coñecido como modo de voz propia) desactiva toda a funcionalidade de lectura da pantalla no NVDA para unha aplicación en particular. Moi útil para aplicacións que proporcionan a súa propria voz e ou características de lectura de pantalla. Preme esta orde de novo para desactivar o Modo Durminte.

segment.source: Some additional braille display key bindings have been added. See the Supported Braille Displays section of the User Guide for details. (#209)
segment.target: Engadíronse algunhas combinacións de teclas adicionais para liñas braille. Mira a sección Liñas braille Soportadas da Guía do Usuario para detalles. (#209)

segment.source: For the convenience of third party developers, app modules as well as global plugins can now be reloaded without restarting NVDA. Use tools -> Reload plugins in the NVDA menu or NVDA+control+f3. (#544)
segment.target: Para conveniencia de desenroladores de terceiras partes, os app modules así como os plugins globais agora pódense recargar sen reinicializar ó NVDA. Utiliza Herramientas -> Recargar plugins en el menú de NVDA o NVDA+control+f3. (#544)

segment.source: NVDA now remembers the position you were at when returning to a previously visited web page. This applies until either the browser or NVDA is exited. (#132)
segment.target: NVDA agora lembra a posición onde estabas cando voltas a unha páxina anteriormente visitada. Esto aplícase ata que ou o navegador ou NVDA sexan pechados. (#132)

segment.source: Handy Tech braille displays can now be used without installing the Handy Tech universal driver. (#854)
segment.target: As liñas braille Handy Tech agora poden utilizarse sen instalar o controlador universal de Handy Tech. (#854)

segment.source: Support for several Baum, HumanWare and APH braille displays. (#937)
segment.target: Soporte para varias liñas braille Baum, HumanWare e APH. (#937)

segment.source: The status bar in Media Player Classic Home Cinema is now recognised.
segment.target: Agora recoñécese a barra de estado en Media Player Classic Home Cinema.

segment.source: The Freedom Scientific Focus 40 Blue braille display can now be used when connected via bluetooth. (#1345)
segment.target: Agora a liña braille Freedom Scientific Focus 40 Blue pode utilizarse cando se conecte a través do bluetooth. (#1345)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios

segment.source: Position information is no longer reported by default in some cases where it was usually incorrect; e.g. most menus, the Running Applications bar, the Notification Area, etc. However, this can be turned on again by an added option in the Object Presentation settings dialog.
segment.target: A información de posición xa non se anuncia de maneira predeterminada nalgúns casos ónde era normalmente incorrecto; ex.: a maioría dos menús, a barra de aplicacións en execución, a área de notificacións, etc. Nemvargantes, esto pode activarse de novo cunha opción engadida no diálogo de Opcións de presentación de obxectos.

segment.source: Keyboard help has been renamed to input help to reflect that it handles input from sources other than the keyboard.
segment.target: Axuda de Teclado renomeouse a Axuda de entrada para refrexar que se manexa entrada dende outras fontes que o teclado.

segment.source: Input Help no longer reports a script's code location via speech and braille as it is cryptic and irrelevant to the user. However, it is now logged for developers and advanced users.
segment.target: A localización dun script no código xa non se anuncia na axuda de entrada posto que é irrelevante e críptica para o usuario.

segment.source: When NVDA detects that it has frozen, it continues to intercept NVDA modifier keys, even though it passes all other keys through to the system. This prevents the user from unintentionally toggling caps lock, etc. if they press an NVDA modifier key without realising NVDA has frozen. (#939)
segment.target: Cando NVDA detecta que se colgou, continúa interceptando as teclas modificadoras de NVDA, aíndaque deixa pasar todas as demáis teclas do sistema. Esto prevén ó usuario de conmutar inintencionalmente o BlogMaius, etc. Se premen unha tecla modificadora de NVDA sen realising NVDA has frozen. (#939)

segment.source: If keys are held down after using the pass next key through command, all keys (including key repeats) are now passed through until the last key is released.
segment.target: Se as teclas se manteñen pulsadas despóis de utilizar a orden de deixar pasar, todas as teclas (incluindo repeticións de teclas) agora pásanse ata que a última tecla sexa soltada.

segment.source: If an NVDA modifier key is pressed twice in quick succession to pass it through and the second press is held down, all key repeats will now be passed through as well.
segment.target: Se unha tecla modificadora de NVDA se preme dúas veces en sucesión rápida para pasala e a segunda presionada está pulsada, todas as teclas repetidas agora pasaránse tamén.

segment.source: The volume up, down and mute keys are now reported in input help. This could be helpful if the user is uncertain as to what these keys are.
segment.target: As teclas subir, baixar volume e silenciar agora anúncianse na Axuda de Entrada. Esto podería ser de utilidade se o usuario non sabe que fan esas teclas.

segment.source: The hotkey for the Review Cursor item in the NVDA Preferences menu has been changed from r to c to eliminate the conflict with the Braille Settings item.
segment.target: A tecla rápida para o elemento Cursor de Revisión no menú de Preferencias do NVDA foi cambiado de r a c para eliminar o conflicto co elemento de Opcións de Braille.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Corrección de Erros

segment.source: When adding a new speech dictionary entry, the title of the dialog is now "Add dictionary entry" instead of "Edit dictionary entry". (#924)
segment.target: Cando se engade unha nova entrada do diccionario da fala, o título do diálogo agora é "Engadir Entrada de Diccionario" en lugar de "Editar entrada de diccionario". (#924)

segment.source: In speech dictionary dialogs, the content of the Regular expression and Case sensitive columns of the Dictionary entries list is now presented in the configured NVDA language instead of always in English.
segment.target: Nos diálogos do diccionario da fala, o contido das columnas da Expresión Regular e sensible ás maiúsculas da lista de entradas de diccionario preséntase agora na lingua configurada no NVDA en lugar de sempre en Inglés.

segment.source: In AIM, position information is now announced in tree views.
segment.target: En AIM, a información de posición agora anúnciase en árbores.

segment.source: On sliders in the Voice Settings dialog, up arrow/page up/home now increase the setting and down arrow/page down/end decrease it. Previously, the opposite occurred, which is not logical and is inconsistent with the synth settings ring. (#221)
segment.target: Nas barras de deslizamiento no diálogo Opcións de Voz, flecha arriba/rePáx/inicio agora incrementan a opción e flecha abaixo/AvPáx/fin decreméntana. Anteriormente, ocurría o oposto, o cal non é lóxico e é inconsistente cas opcións do grupo synth. (#221)

segment.source: In virtual buffers with screen layout disabled, some extraneous blank lines no longer appear.
segment.target: Nos modos virtuais ca distribución de pantalla deshabilitada, xa non aparecen algunhas extranas liñas en branco.

segment.source: If an NVDA modifier key is pressed twice quickly but there is an intervening key press, the NVDA modifier key is no longer passed through on the second press.
segment.target: Se unha tecla modificadora de NVDA se preme dúas veces rápidamente pero hai unha tecla premeda intervindo, a tecla modificadora de NVDA xa non pasa na segunda presión.

segment.source: Punctuation keys are now spoken in input help even when speaking of punctuation is disabled. (#977)
segment.target: As teclas de puntuación agora fálanse na axuda de entrada cando a fala da puntuación estea desactivada. (#977)

segment.source: In the Keyboard Settings dialog, the keyboard layout names are now presented in the configured NVDA language instead of always in English. (#558)
segment.target: No diálogo Opcións de Teclado, os nomes de distribución de teclado agora preséntanse na lingua configurada para o NVDA en lugar de sempre en Inglés. (#558)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where some items were rendered as empty in Adobe Reader documents; e.g. the links in the table of contents of the Apple iPhone IOS 4.1 User Guide.
segment.target: Correxido un problema onde algúns elementos se renderizaban como valdeiros en documentos de Adobe Reader; ex.: as ligas na táboa de contido da Guía do usuario do Apple iPhone IOS 4.1.

segment.source: The "Use currently saved settings on the logon and other secure screens" button in NVDA's General Settings dialog now works if used immediately after NVDA is newly installed but before a secure screen has appeared. Previously, NVDA reported that copying was successful, but it actually had no effect. (#1194)
segment.target: O botón "Utilizar opcións actuais gardadas no logon e outras pantallas seguras" no diálogo de Opcións Xerais de NVDA, funciona se se utilizou inmediatamente despois de que NVDA sexa instalado novamente pero antes de que unha pantalla segura aparecera. Anteriormente, NVDA anunciaba que o copiado tivo éxito, pero actualmente non tiña efecto. (#1194)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to have two NVDA settings dialogs open simultaneously. This fixes issues where one open dialog depends on another open dialog; e.g. changing the synthesiser while the Voice Settings dialog is open. (#603)
segment.target: Xa non é posible ter dous diálogos de opcións do NVDA abertos simultáneamente. Esto corrixe erros onde un diálogo aberto depende doutro diálogo aberto; é dicir, cambiar o sintetizador mentres o diálogo Opcións de Voz está aberto. (#603)

segment.source: On systems with UAC enabled, the "Use currently saved settings on the logon and other secure screens" button in NVDA's General Settings dialog no longer fails after the UAC prompt if the user's account name contains a space. (#918)
segment.target: En sistemas co UAC activado, o botón "Utilizar opcións actualmente gardadas no logon e pantallas seguras" no diálogo de Opcións Xerais do NVDA, xa non falla despois do UAC se o nome da conta do usuario contén un espazo. (#918)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, NVDA now uses the URL as a last resort to determine the name of a link, rather than presenting empty links. (#633)
segment.target: En Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, NVDA utiliza agora a URL como un derradeiro resorte para determinar o nome dunha liga, máis que presentar ligas valdeiras. (#633)

segment.source: NVDA no longer ignores the focus in AOL Instant Messenger 7 menus. (#655)
segment.target: NVDA xa non ignora o foco nos menús de AOL Instant Messenger 7. (#655)

segment.source: Announce the correct label for errors in the Microsoft Word Spell Check dialog (e.g. Not in dictionary, Grammar error, punctuation). Previously they were all announced as grammar error. (#883)
segment.target: Anunciar a etiqueta correcta para erros no diálogo do corrector de ortografía de Microsoft Word (ex.: Non en diccionario, erro gramatical, pontuación). Anteriormente todos se anunciaban como erro gramatical. (#883)

segment.source: Typing in Microsoft Word while using a braille display should no longer cause garbled text to be typed, and a rare freeze when pressing a braille routing key in Word documents has been fixed. (#1212) However a limitation is that Arabic text can no longer be read in Word 2003 and below, while using a braille display. (#627)
segment.target: Tecleando no Microsoft Word mentres se utiliza unha liña braille xa non debería causar que sexa tecleado texto ilexible, e un extrano colgue cando se preme un sensor de seguemento braille en documentos de Word foi correxido. (#1212) Non obsstante unha limitación é que o texto en árabe pode non lerse xa en Word 2003 e superior, mentres se utiliza unha liña braille. (#627)

segment.source: When pressing the delete key in an edit field, the text/cursor on a braille display should now always be updated appropriately to reflect the change. (#947)
segment.target: Cando se preme a tecla supr nun campo de edición, o texto/cursor nunha liña braille agora debería actualizarse sempre apropriadamente para reflexar o cambio. (#947)

segment.source: Changes on dynamic pages in Gecko2 documents (E.g. Firefox 4) while multiple tabs are open are now properly reflected by NVDA. Previously only changes in the first tab were reflected. (Mozilla bug 610985)
segment.target: Os cambios en páxinas en documentos Gecko2 (Ex.: Firefox 4) mentres se abren múltiples pestanas agora refléxase adecuadamente por NVDA. Anteriormente só os cambios na primeira pestana se reflexaban. (Mozilla bug 610985)

segment.source: NVDA can now properly announce the suggestions for grammar and punctuation errors in Microsoft Word spell check dialog. (#704)
segment.target: NVDA agora pode anunciar apropriadamente as suxerencias para erros gramaticais e de puntuación no diálogo do corrector de ortografía de Microsoft Word. (#704)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, NVDA no longer presents destination anchors as empty links in its virtual buffer. Instead, these anchors are hidden as they should be. (#1326)
segment.target: En Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, NVDA xa non presenta áncoras de destiño como ligas valdeiras no seu modo virtual. No seu lugar, estas áncoras agáchanse segundo debería ser. (#1326)

segment.source: Object navigation around and within standard groupbox windows is no longer broken and asymmetrical.
segment.target: A navegación de obxectos sobre e dentro de brupos estándar de windows xa non rompe e é asimétrico.

segment.source: In Firefox and other Gecko-based controls, NVDA will no longer get stuck in a subframe if it finishes loading before the outer document.
segment.target: En Firefox e outros controis baseados en Gecko, NVDA xa non se queda pegado nun submarco se remata cargando antes de outro documento.

segment.source: NVDA now appropriately announces the next character when deleting a character with numpadDelete. (#286)
segment.target: NVDA agora anuncia apropriadamente o seguinte caracter cando se elimina un caracter co suprimir do teclado numérico. (#286)

segment.source: On the Windows XP logon screen, the user name is once again reported when the selected user is changed.
segment.target: Na pantalla de autentificación de Windows XP, O nome de usuario anúnciase unha vez de novo cando o usuario seleccionado se cambiou.

segment.source: Fixed problems when reading text in Windows command consoles with reporting of line numbers enabled.
segment.target: Correxidos problemas cando ó ler texto en consolas de ordes de Windows o anunciado de números de liña está activado.

segment.source: The Elements List dialog for virtual buffers is now usable by sighted users. All controls are visible on screen. (#1321)
segment.target: O diálogo de lista de elementos para modos virtuais agora é utilizable por usuarios videntes. Todos os controis son visibles en pantalla. (#1321)

segment.source: The list of entries in the Speech Dictionary dialog is now more readable by sighted users. The list is now large enough to show all of its columns on screen. (#90)
segment.target: A lista de entradas no diálogo Diccionarios da fala, agora é máis lexible por usuarios videntes. A lista agora é bastante grande para amosar todas as súass columnas en pantalla. (#90)

segment.source: On ALVA BC640/BC680 braille displays, NVDA no longer disregards display keys that are still held down after another key is released.
segment.target: En liñas braille ALVA BC640/BC680 NVDA xa non fai caso omiso das teclas da liña que aínda están sendo pulsadas despois que outra tecla sexa liberada.

segment.source: Adobe Reader X no longer crashes after leaving the untagged document options before the processing dialog appears. (#1218)
segment.target: Adobe Reader X xa non rompe cando se pecha un documento sen opcións non etiquetadas antes de que apareza o diálogo de procesamento. (#1218)

segment.source: NVDA now switches to the appropriate braille display driver when you revert to saved configuration. (#1346)
segment.target: NVDA agora cambia ó controlador de liña braille apropriado cando tornes á configuración gardada. (#1346)

segment.source: The Visual Studio 2008 Project Wizard is read correctly again. (#974)
segment.target: O asistente de proxecto do Visual Studio 2008 lese correctamente novamente. (#974)

segment.source: NVDA no longer completely fails to work in applications which contain non-ASCII characters in their executable name. (#1352)
segment.target: NVDA xa non falla compretamente ó traballar en aplicacións que conteñan caracteres non ASCII no seu nome do executable. (#1352)

segment.source: When reading by line in AkelPad with word wrap enabled, NVDA no longer reads the first character of the following line at the end of the current line.
segment.target: Cando se le por liñas en AkelPad co salto de palabras activado, NVDA xa non le o primeiro carácter da liña seguinte no final da liña actual.

segment.source: In the Visual Studio 2005/2008 code editor, NVDA no longer reads the entire text after every typed character. (#975)
segment.target: No editor de código do Visual Studio 2005/2008, NVDA xa non le todo o texto despois de cada carácter tecleado. (#975)

segment.source: Fixed the issue where some braille displays weren't cleared properly when NVDA was exited or the display was changed.
segment.target: Correxido o problema onde algunhas liñas braille non se limpiaban correctamente cando NVDA se pechaba ou se cambiaba a liña braille.

segment.source: The initial focus is no longer sometimes spoken twice when NVDA starts. (#1359)
segment.target: O foco inicial xa non se fala nalgunhas ocasións dúas veces cando NVDA arrinca. (#1359)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Cambios para Desenroladores

segment.source: SCons is now used to prepare the source tree and create binary builds, portable archives, installers, etc. See readme.txt at the root of the source distribution for details.
segment.target: SCons is now used to prepare the source tree and create binary builds, portable archives, installers, etc. See readme.txt at the root of the source distribution for details.

segment.source: The key names used by NVDA (including key maps) have been made more friendly/logical; e.g. upArrow instead of extendedUp and numpadPageUp instead of prior. See the vkCodes module for a list.
segment.target: The key names used by NVDA (including key maps) have been made more friendly/logical; e.g. upArrow instead of extendedUp and numpadPageUp instead of prior. See the vkCodes module for a list.

segment.source: All input from the user is now represented by an inputCore.InputGesture instance. (#601)
segment.target: All input from the user is now represented by an inputCore.InputGesture instance. (#601)

segment.source: Each source of input subclasses the base InputGesture class.
segment.target: Each source of input subclasses the base InputGesture class.

segment.source: Key presses on the system keyboard are encompassed by the keyboardHandler.KeyboardInputGesture class.
segment.target: Key presses on the system keyboard are encompassed by the keyboardHandler.KeyboardInputGesture class.

segment.source: Presses of buttons, wheels and other controls on a braille display are encompassed by subclasses of the braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class. These subclasses are provided by each braille display driver.
segment.target: Presses of buttons, wheels and other controls on a braille display are encompassed by subclasses of the braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class. These subclasses are provided by each braille display driver.

segment.source: Input gestures are bound to ScriptableObjects using the ScriptableObject.bindGesture() method on an instance or an __gestures dict on the class which maps gesture identifiers to script names. See baseObject.ScriptableObject for details.
segment.target: Input gestures are bound to ScriptableObjects using the ScriptableObject.bindGesture() method on an instance or an __gestures dict on the class which maps gesture identifiers to script names. See baseObject.ScriptableObject for details.

segment.source: App modules no longer have key map files. All input gesture bindings must be done in the app module itself.
segment.target: App modules no longer have key map files. All input gesture bindings must be done in the app module itself.

segment.source: All scripts now take an InputGesture instance instead of a key press.
segment.target: All scripts now take an InputGesture instance instead of a key press.

segment.source: KeyboardInputGestures can be sent on to the OS using the send() method of the gesture.
segment.target: KeyboardInputGestures can be sent on to the OS using the send() method of the gesture.

segment.source: To send an arbitrary key press, you must now create a KeyboardInputGesture using KeyboardInputGesture.fromName() and then use its send() method.
segment.target: To send an arbitrary key press, you must now create a KeyboardInputGesture using KeyboardInputGesture.fromName() and then use its send() method.

segment.source: Locales may now provide an input gesture map file to add new bindings or override existing bindings for scripts anywhere in NVDA. (#810)
segment.target: Locales may now provide an input gesture map file to add new bindings or override existing bindings for scripts anywhere in NVDA. (#810)

segment.source: Locale gesture maps should be placed in locale\LANG\gestures.ini, where LANG is the language code.
segment.target: Locale gesture maps should be placed in locale\LANG\gestures.ini, where LANG is the language code.

segment.source: See inputCore.GlobalGestureMap for details of the file format.
segment.target: See inputCore.GlobalGestureMap for details of the file format.

segment.source: The new LiveText and Terminal NVDAObject behaviors facilitate automatic reporting of new text. See those classes in NVDAObjects.behaviors for details. (#936)
segment.target: The new LiveText and Terminal NVDAObject behaviors facilitate automatic reporting of new text. See those classes in NVDAObjects.behaviors for details. (#936)

segment.source: The NVDAObjects.window.DisplayModelLiveText overlay class can be used for objects which must retrieve text written to the display.
segment.target: The NVDAObjects.window.DisplayModelLiveText overlay class can be used for objects which must retrieve text written to the display.

segment.source: See the mirc and putty app modules for usage examples.
segment.target: See the mirc and putty app modules for usage examples.

segment.source: There is no longer an _default app module. App modules should instead subclass appModuleHandler.AppModule (the base AppModule class).
segment.target: There is no longer an _default app module. App modules should instead subclass appModuleHandler.AppModule (the base AppModule class).

segment.source: Support for global plugins which can globally bind scripts, handle NVDAObject events and choose NVDAObject overlay classes. (#281) See globalPluginHandler.GlobalPlugin for details.
segment.target: Support for global plugins which can globally bind scripts, handle NVDAObject events and choose NVDAObject overlay classes. (#281) See globalPluginHandler.GlobalPlugin for details.

segment.source: On SynthDriver objects, the available* attributes for string settings (e.g. availableVoices and availableVariants) are now OrderedDicts keyed by ID instead of lists.
segment.target: On SynthDriver objects, the available* attributes for string settings (e.g. availableVoices and availableVariants) are now OrderedDicts keyed by ID instead of lists.

segment.source: synthDriverHandler.VoiceInfo now takes an optional language argument which specifies the language of the voice.
segment.target: synthDriverHandler.VoiceInfo now takes an optional language argument which specifies the language of the voice.

segment.source: SynthDriver objects now provide a language attribute which specifies the language of the current voice.
segment.target: SynthDriver objects now provide a language attribute which specifies the language of the current voice.

segment.source: The base implementation uses the language specified on the VoiceInfo objects in availableVoices. This is suitable for most synthesisers which support one language per voice.
segment.target: The base implementation uses the language specified on the VoiceInfo objects in availableVoices. This is suitable for most synthesisers which support one language per voice.

segment.source: Braille display drivers have been enhanced to allow buttons, wheels and other controls to be bound to NVDA scripts:
segment.target: Braille display drivers have been enhanced to allow buttons, wheels and other controls to be bound to NVDA scripts:

segment.source: Drivers can provide a global input gesture map to add bindings for scripts anywhere in NVDA.
segment.target: Drivers can provide a global input gesture map to add bindings for scripts anywhere in NVDA.

segment.source: They can also provide their own scripts to perform display specific functions.
segment.target: They can also provide their own scripts to perform display specific functions.

segment.source: See braille.BrailleDisplayDriver for details and existing braille display drivers for examples.
segment.target: See braille.BrailleDisplayDriver for details and existing braille display drivers for examples.

segment.source: The 'selfVoicing' property on AppModule classes has now been renamed to 'sleepMode'.
segment.target: The 'selfVoicing' property on AppModule classes has now been renamed to 'sleepMode'.

segment.source: The app module events event_appLoseFocus and event_appGainFocus have now been renamed to event_appModule_loseFocus and event_appModule_gainFocus, respectivly, in order to make the naming convention consistent with app modules and tree interceptors.
segment.target: the appModule events: event_appLoseFocus and event_appGainFocus have now been renamed to event_appModule_loseFocus and event_appModule_gainFocus respectivly, in order to keep the naming sintax the same between appModules and treeInterceptors etc.

segment.source: All braille display drivers should now use braille.BrailleDisplayDriver instead of braille.BrailleDisplayDriverWithCursor.
segment.target: All braille display drivers should now use braille.BrailleDisplayDriver instead of braille.BrailleDisplayDriverWithCursor.

segment.source: The cursor is now managed outside of the driver.
segment.target: The cursor is now managed outside of the driver.

segment.source: Existing drivers need only change their class statement accordingly and rename their _display method to display.
segment.target: Existing drivers need only change their class statement accordingly and rename their _display method to display.

segment.source: Notable features of this release include greatly simplified object navigation; virtual buffers for Adobe Flash content; access to many previously inaccessible controls by retrieving text written to the screen; flat review of screen text; support for IBM Lotus Symphony documents; reporting of table row and column headers in Mozilla Firefox; and significantly improved user documentation.
segment.target: As características máis notables de esta versión inclúen unha grande simplificación da navegación de obxectos; modos virtuais para contido de Adobe Flash; acceso a moitos controi anteriormente inaccesibles capturando texto escribido á pantalla; revisión chan de texto na pantalla; soporte para documentos de IBM Lotus Symphony; anunciado de cabeceiras de fila e columna de táboa en Mozilla Firefox; unha mellora significativa da documentación do usuario.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Características

segment.source: Navigating through objects with the review cursor has been greatly simplified. The review cursor now excludes objects which aren't useful to the user; i.e. objects only used for layout purposes and unavailable objects.
segment.target: A navegación por obxectos co cursor de revisión foi moi simplificada. O cursor de revisión agora exclúe obxectos que non sexan útiles para o usuario; é dicir, obxectos só utilizados para propósitos de deseño e obxectos non dispoñibles.

segment.source: In applications using the Java Access Bridge (including OpenOffice.org), formatting can now be reported in text controls. (#358, #463)
segment.target: En aplicacións que utilizan o Java Access Bridge (incluindo OpenOffice.org), o formato agora pode informarse nos controis de texto. (#358, #463)

segment.source: When moving the mouse over cells in Microsoft Excel, NVDA will appropriately announce them.
segment.target: Cando se move o rato sobre celdas en Microsoft Excel, NVDA anunciaráas apropriadamente.

segment.source: In applications using the Java Access Bridge, the text of a dialog is now reported when the dialog appears. (#554)
segment.target: En aplicacións que utilizan o Java Access Bridge, o texto dun diálogo agora anúnciase cando o diálogo apareza. (#554)

segment.source: A virtualBuffer can now be used to navigate adobe Flash content. Object navigation and interacting with the controls directly (by turning on focus mode) is still supported. (#453)
segment.target: Agora pódese utilizar un modo virtual para navegar polo contido de adobe Flash. Navegar por obxectos e interactuar cos controis directamente (activando o modo foco) Xa se soporta. (#453)

segment.source: Editable text controls in the Eclipse IDE, including the code editor, are now accessible. You must be using Eclipse 3.6 or later. (#256, #641)
segment.target: Os controis de texto editable no IDE Eclipse, incluindo o editor de código, agora son accesibles. Debes utilizar Eclipse 3.6 ou superior. (#256, #641)

segment.source: NVDA can now retrieve most text written to the screen. (#40, #643)
segment.target: NVDA agora pode recuperar a maioría do texto escrito na pantalla. (#40, #643)

segment.source: This allows for reading of controls which do not expose information in more direct/reliable ways.
segment.target: Esto permite a lectura de controis que non expoñen información en formas máis directas/fiables.

segment.source: Controls made accessible by this feature include: some menu items which display icons (e.g. the Open With menu on files in Windows XP) (#151), editable text fields in Windows Live applications (#200), the errors list in Outlook Express (#582), the editable text control in TextPad (#605), lists in Eudora, many controls in Australian E-tax and the formula bar in Microsoft Excel.
segment.target: Os controis que se accesibilizan por esta característica inclúen: algúns elementos de menú que amosan iconos (ex.: O menú Abrir con en ficheiros en Windows XP) (#151), campos de texto editables en aplicacións Windows Live (#200), a lista de erros en Outlook Express (#582), o control de texto editable en TextPad (#605), listas en Eudora, moitos controis en Australian E-tax e a barra de fórmulas en Microsoft Excel.

segment.source: Support for the code editor in Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 and 2008. At least Visual Studio Standard is required; this does not work in the Express editions. (#457)
segment.target: Soporte para o editor de código en Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 e 2008. Ó menos requírese Visual Studio Standard; esto non funciona nas edicións Express. (#457)

segment.source: Support for IBM Lotus Symphony documents.
segment.target: Soporte para documentos en IBM Lotus Symphony.

segment.source: Early experimental support for Google Chrome. Please note that Chrome's screen reader support is far from complete and additional work may also be required in NVDA. You will need a recent development build of Chrome to try this.
segment.target: Soporte primario e experimental paraGoogle Chrome. Por favor ten en conta que o soporte para lectores de pantalla de Chrome está lonxe de compretarse e requerirá traballo adicional tamén en NVDA. Necesitarás unha compilación de desenrolo recente de Chrome para probar esto.

segment.source: The state of toggle keys (caps lock, num lock and scroll lock) is now displayed in braille when they are pressed. (#620)
segment.target: O estado das teclas conmutables (Bloq Maius, bloq núm e bloqueo de desprazamento) agora amósase en braille cando se pulsan. (#620)

segment.source: Help balloons are now displayed in braille when they appear. (#652)
segment.target: Os globos de axuda agora amósanse en braille cando aparezan. (#652)

segment.source: Added a driver for the MDV Lilli braille display. (#241)
segment.target: Engadido un controlador para a liña braille MDV Lilli. (#241)

segment.source: When selecting an entire row or column in Microsoft Excel with the shortcut keys shift+space and control+space, the new selection is now reported. (#759)
segment.target: Cando se selecciona unha fila ou unha columna completa en MS Excel cas teclas de atallo shift+espazo e control+espazo, a nova selección agora anúnciase (#759)

segment.source: Table row and column headers can now be reported. This is configurable from the Document Formatting preferences dialog.
segment.target: As cabeceiras de fila e columna agora poden anunciarse. Esto é configurable dende o diálogo de preferencias de formato de documento.

segment.source: Currently, this is supported in documents in Mozilla applications such as Firefox (version 3.6.11 and later) and Thunderbird (version 3.1.5 and later). (#361)
segment.target: Actualmente, esto sopórtase en documentos en aplicacións de Mozilla como Firefox e Thunderbird. (#361)

segment.source: Introduced commands for flat review: (#58)
segment.target: Introducidas ordes para a revisión chan: (#58)

segment.source: NVDA+numpad7 switches to flat review, placing the review cursor at the position of the current object, allowing you to review the screen (or a document if within one) with the text review commands.
segment.target: NVDA+7 teclado numérico cambia a revisión plana, poñendo o cursor de revisión na posición do obxecto actual, permitíndoche revisar a pantalla (ou un documento se se está dentro dun) cas ordes de revisión de texto.

segment.source: NVDA+numpad1 moves the review cursor into the object represented by the text at the position of the review cursor, allowing you to navigate by object from that point.
segment.target: NVDA+1 teclado numérico move o cursor de revisión ó obxecto representado polo texto na posición do cursor de revisión, permitíndoche navegar por obxectos dende ese punto.

segment.source: Current NVDA user settings can be copied to be used on secure Windows screens such as the logon and UAC screens by pressing a button in the General Settings dialog. (#730)
segment.target: As opcións de usuario actuais do NVDA poden copiarse para utilizarse nas pantallas de autentificación/UAC, premendo un botón no diálogo Opcións Xerais.

segment.source: Support for Mozilla Firefox 4.
segment.target: Soporte para Mozilla Firefox 4.

segment.source: Support for Microsoft Internet Explorer 9.
segment.target: Soporte para Microsoft Internet Explorer 9.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Ccambios

segment.source: The sayAll by Navigator object (NVDA+numpadAdd), navigator object next in flow (NVDA+shift+numpad6) and navigator object previous in flow (NVDA+shift+numpad4) commands have been removed for the time being, due to bugginess and to free up the keys for other possible features.
segment.target: Ler todo no navegador de obxectos (NVDA+máis do teclado numérico), seguinte obxecto en fluxo do navegador de obxectos (NVDA+shift+6 do teclado numérico) e anterior obxecto en fluxo no navegador de obxectos (NVDA+shift+4 do teclado numérico) foron eliminados de momento, debido a fallos e para liberar as teclas para outras posibles características.

segment.source: In the NVDA Synthesizer dialog, only the display name of the synthesizer is now listed. Previously, it was prefixed by the driver's name, which is only relevant internally.
segment.target: No diálogo de sintetizadores de NVDA, agora só se amosa o sintetizador listado. Anteriormente, prefixábase co nome do controlador, que só é relevante internamente.

segment.source: When in embedded applications or virtual buffers inside another virtualBuffer (e.g. Flash), you can now press nvda+control+space to move out of the embedded application or virtual buffer to the containing document. Previously nvda+space was used for this. Now nvda+space is specifically only for toggling brows/focus modes on virtualBuffers.
segment.target: Cando se está en aplicacións empotradas ou modos virtuais dentro doutro modo virtual (ex.: Flash), agora podes premer nvda+control+espazo para saír da aplicación empotrada ou modo virtual, ó documento principal. Anteriormente, nvda+espazo utilizábase para esto. Agora nvda+espazo é só específicamente para conmutar os modos revisión/foco nos modos virtuais.

segment.source: If the speech viewer (enabled under the tools menu) is given the focus (e.g. it was clicked in) new text will not appear in the control until focus is moved away. This allows for selecting the text with greater ease (e.g. for copying).
segment.target: Se ó visor de voz (activable no menú Ferramentas) se lle deu o foco (ex.: fíxose clic) o texto novo non aparecerá no control ata que o foco se mova. Esto permítese para seleccionar o texto con maior facilidade (ex.: para copiar).

segment.source: The Log Viewer and Python Console are maximised when activated.
segment.target: O visualizador do Rexistro e a consola de Python maximízanse cando se activen.

segment.source: When focusing on a worksheet in Microsoft Excel and there is more than one cell selected, the selection range is announced, rather than just the active cell. (#763)
segment.target: Cando se enfoca unha folla de cálculo en MS Excel, e hai máis dunha celda seleccionada, anúnciase o alcance da selección, en lugar de só a celda activa. (#763)

segment.source: Saving configuration and changing of particular sensitive options is now disabled when running on the logon, UAC and other secure Windows screens.
segment.target: O gardado da configuración, e o cambio de opcións sensibles en particular, agora desactívase cando se execute en modo seguro (nas pantallas de autentificación/UAC).

segment.source: Updated eSpeak speech synthesiser to 1.44.03.
segment.target: Actualizado o sintetizador de voz eSpeak a 1.44.01.

segment.source: If NVDA is already running, activating the NVDA shortcut on the desktop (which includes pressing control+alt+n) will restart NVDA.
segment.target: Se NVDA xa está executándose, activando o atallo de teclado do NVDA no escritorio (que é o premedo de control+alt+n) reiniciará ó NVDA.

segment.source: Removed the report text under the mouse checkbox from the Mouse settings dialog and replaced it with an Enable mouse tracking checkbox, which better matches the toggle mouse tracking script (NVDA+m).
segment.target: Elimínase a caixa de verificación anunciar texto baixo o rato do diálogo Opcións do Rato e reenprázase cunha caixa de verificación Activar seguemento do Rato, que mellora o emparellado do conmutado do script de seguemento do rato (NVDA+m).

segment.source: Updates to the laptop keyboard layout so that it includes all commands available in the desktop layout and works correctly on non-English keyboards. (#798, #800)
segment.target: Actualízase a distribución de teclado laptop tal que inclúa todas as ordes dispoñibles na distribución desktop e funciona correctamente en teclados non ingleses. (#798, #800)

segment.source: Significant improvements and updates to the user documentation, including documentation of the laptop keyboard commands and synchronisation of the Keyboard Commands Quick Reference with the User Guide. (#455)
segment.target: Melloras significativas e actualizacións á documentación do usuario, incluindo documentación das ordes de teclado laptop e sincronización da Referencia Rápida de Ordes de Teclado ca Guía do Usuario. (#455)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.1.1. Notably, this fixes some issues related to Chinese braille as well as characters which are undefined in the translation table. (#484, #499)
segment.target: Actualizado o transcriptor braille liblouis á versión 2.1.0. Notablemente, esto corrixe algúns problemas relacionados co Braille Chinés

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Corrección de Fallos

segment.source: In µTorrent, the focused item in the torrents list no longer reports repeatedly or steals focus when a menu is open.
segment.target: En µTorrent, o elemento enfocado na lista de torrents xa non informa repetidamente ou escamotea o foco cando se abre un menú.

segment.source: In µTorrent, the names of the files in the Torrent Contents list are now reported.
segment.target: En µTorrent, os nomes dos ficheiros na listaxe de contidos de Torrent agora anúncianse.

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, focus is now correctly detected when it lands on an empty table or tree.
segment.target: En aplicacións de Mozilla, agora o foco detéctase correctamente cando aterriza nunha táboa valdeira ou árbore.

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, "not checked" is now correctly reported for checkable controls such as checkable table cells. (#571)
segment.target: En aplicacións de Mozilla, "non marcado" agora infórmase correctamente para controis marcables como celdas de táboa marcables. (#571)

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, the text of correctly implemented ARIA dialogs is no longer ignored and will now be reported when the dialog appears. (#630)
segment.target: En aplicacións de Mozilla, o texto de diálogos aria correctamente implementados xa non se ignora e agora informarase cando o diálogo apareza.

segment.source: in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the ARIA level attribute is now honoured correctly.
segment.target: En Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, o atributo nivel de ARIA agora se cumpre correctamente.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the ARIA role is now chosen over other type information to give a much more correct and predictable ARIA experience.
segment.target: En Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML, o rol ARIA agora escóllese sobre outro tipo de información para dar unha experiencia de ARIA moito máis correcta e predecible.

segment.source: Stopped a rare crash in Internet Explorer when navigating through frames or iFrames.
segment.target: Detido un raro colgue en Internet Explorer cando se navega por marcos ou iFrames.

segment.source: In Microsoft Word documents, right-to-left lines (such as Arabic text) can be read again. (#627)
segment.target: En documentos de Microsoft Word, as liñas de dereita a esquerda (como no texto árabe) poden lerse de novo. (#627)

segment.source: Greatly reduced lag when large amounts of text are displayed in a Windows command console on 64-bit systems. (#622)
segment.target: Forte reducción de retraso cando grandes cantidades de texto amosábanse nunha consola de ordes de Windows en sistemas de 64 bits. (#622)

segment.source: If Skype is already started when NVDA starts, it is no longer necessary to restart Skype to enable accessibility. This may also be true for other applications which check the system screen reader flag.
segment.target: Se Skype xa está arrancado cando arranque o NVDA, xa non é necesario reiniciar Skype para habilitar a accesibilidade. Esto pode tamén ser certo para outras aplicacións que comproben a bandeira do sistema para o lector de pantallas .

segment.source: In Microsoft Office applications, NVDA no longer crashes when speak foreground (NVDA+b) is pressed or when navigating some objects on toolbars. (#616)
segment.target: En aplicacións de Microsoft Office, NVDA xa non se colga cando se premeu falar primeiro plano (NVDA+b) ou cando se navegan algúns obxectos en barras de ferramentas. (#616)

segment.source: Fixed incorrect speaking of numbers containing a 0 after a separator; e.g. 1,023. (#593)
segment.target: Correxida a fala incorrecta de números que conteñen un 0 despois dun separador; ex.: 1.023. (#593)

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat Pro and Reader 9 no longer crash when closing a file or performing certain other tasks. (#613)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat Pro e Reader 9 xa non se colgan cando se pecha un ficheiro ou se levan a cabo outras certas tarefas. (#613)

segment.source: The selection is now announced when control+a is pressed to select all text in some editable text controls such as in Microsoft Word. (#761)
segment.target: A selección anúnciase agora cando se preme control+a para seleccionar todo o texto nalgúns controis de texto editables como en Microsoft Word. (#761)

segment.source: In Scintilla controls (e.g. Notepad++), text is no longer incorrectly selected when NVDA moves the caret such as during say all. (#746)
segment.target: Nos controis de Scintilla (ex.: Notepad++), O texto xa non se selecciona incorrectamente cando NVDA move o cursor do sistema tal como durante ler todo. (#746)

segment.source: It is again possible to review the contents of cells in Microsoft Excel with the review cursor.
segment.target: É posible de novo revisar o contido de celdas en MS Excel co cursor de revisión.

segment.source: NVDA can again read by line in certain problematic textArea fields in Internet Explorer 8. (#467)
segment.target: NVDA pode ler de novo por liñas en certos campos de área de texto problemáticos en Internet Explorer 8. (#467)

segment.source: Windows Live Messenger 2009 no longer exits immediately after it is started while NVDA is running. (#677)
segment.target: Windows Live Messenger 2009 xa non se pecha inmediatamente despois de iniciarse mentres NVDA se executa. (#677)

segment.source: In web browsers, It is no longer necessary to press tab to interact with an embedded object (such as Flash content) after pressing enter on the embedded object or returning from another application. (#775)
segment.target: Nos navegadores web, xa non é necesario premer tab para interactuar cun obxecto empotrado (tal como contido Flash) despois de premer intro no obxecto empotrado ou voltando dende outra aplicación. (#775)

segment.source: In Scintilla controls (e.g. Notepad++), the beginning of long lines is no longer truncated when it scrolls off the screen. Also, these long lines will be correctly displayed in braille when they are selected.
segment.target: En controis de Scintilla (ex.: Notepad++), o comezo de liñas longas xa non se curta cando sobrepasan a pantalla. Tamén, estas liñas longas amosaránse correctamente en braille cando se seleccionen.

segment.source: In Loudtalks, it is now possible to access the contact list.
segment.target: En Loudtalks, agora é posible acceder á lista de contactos.

segment.source: The URL of the document and "MSAAHTML Registered Handler" are no longer sometimes spuriously reported in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#811)
segment.target: A URL do documento e "MSAAHTML Registered Handler" xa non se anuncia ás veces falso en Internet Explorer e outros controis MSHTML. (#811)

segment.source: In tree views in the Eclipse IDE, the previously focused item is no longer incorrectly announced when focus moves to a new item.
segment.target: En árbores no IDE de Eclipse, o elemento enfocado anteriormente xa non se anuncia incorrectamente cando o foco se move a un novo elemento.

segment.source: NVDA now functions correctly on a system where the current working directory has been removed from the DLL search path (by setting the CWDIllegalInDllSearch registry entry to 0xFFFFFFFF). Note that this is not relevant to most users. (#907)
segment.target: NVDA agora funciona correctamente nun sistema onde o actual directorio de traballo se eliminara da ruta de búsqueda das DLL (configurando a entrada de rexistro CWDIllegalInDllSearch a 0xFFFFFFFF). ten en conta que esto non é relevante para a maioría dos usuarios. (#907)

segment.source: When the table navigation commands are used outside of a table in Microsoft Word, "edge of table" is no longer spoken after "not in table". (#921)
segment.target: Cando as ordes de navegación de táboas se usen fora dunha en Microsoft Word, "borde de táboa" xa non falan despois de "non en táboa". (#921)

segment.source: When the table navigation commands cannot move due to being at the edge of a table in Microsoft Word, "edge of table" is now spoken in the configured NVDA language rather than always in English. (#921)
segment.target: Cando as ordes de navegación de táboa non podan mover debido a estar no borde dunha táboa en Microsoft Word, "borde de táboa" agora fala na lingua configurada do NVDA en lugar de sempre en inglés. (#921)

segment.source: In Outlook Express, Windows Mail and Windows Live Mail, the state of the checkboxes in message rules lists is now reported. (#576)
segment.target: En Outlook Express, Windows Mail e Windows Live Mail, o estado das caixas de verificación en listaxes de regras de mensaxes agora anúnciase. (#576)

segment.source: The description of message rules can now be read in Windows Live Mail 2010.
segment.target: A descripción das regras de mensaxes agora pode lerse en Windows Live Mail 2010.

segment.source: This release focuses primarily on bug fixes and improvements to the user experience, including some significant stability fixes.
segment.target: Esta revisión enfócase principalmente en corrección de fallos e melloras á experiencia do usuario, incluindo algunhas correccións significativas de estabilidade.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas características

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start on a system with no audio output devices. Obviously, a braille display or the Silence synthesiser in conjunction with the Speech Viewer will need to be used for output in this case. (#425)
segment.target: NVDA xa non falla ó arrancar nun sistema sen dispositivos de saída de audio. Obviamente, será necesario utilizar unha líña braille ou o Display synthesiser para a saída neste caso. (#425)

segment.source: A report landmarks checkbox has been added to the Document Formatting settings dialog which allows you to configure whether NVDA should announce landmarks in web documents. For compatibility with the previous release, the option is on by default.
segment.target: Foi engadida unha caixa de verificación Anunciar rexións ó diálogo de Opcións de formato de Documento que che permite configurar se NVDA debería anunciar rexións en documentos web. Para compatibilidade ca versión anterior, a opción está activada de maneira predeterminada.

segment.source: If speak command keys is enabled, NVDA will now announce the names of multimedia keys (e.g. play, stop, home page, etc.) on many keyboards when they are pressed. (#472)
segment.target: Se falar teclas de ordes está activada NVDA agora anunciará os nomes das teclas multimedia (ex.: reproducir, deter, páxina de comezo, etc.) cando sexan premedas. (#472)

segment.source: NVDA now announces the word being deleted when pressing control+backspace in controls that support it. (#491)
segment.target: NVDA agora anuncia a palabra que estea sendo eliminada cando se prema control+retroceso en controis que o soporten. (#491)

segment.source: Arrow keys can now be used in the Web formator window to navigate and read the text. (#452)
segment.target: As flechas de cursor agora poden ser utilizadas na xanela do formateador Web para navegar e ler o texto. (#452)

segment.source: The entry list in the Microsoft Office Outlook address book is now supported.
segment.target: A listaxe de entradas na libreta de enderezos de Microsoft Office Outlook agora está soportada.

segment.source: NVDA better supports embedded editable (design mode) documents in Internet Explorer. (#402)
segment.target: Mellor soporte de documentos empotrados editables do NVDA (modo de deseño) en Internet Explorer. (#402)

segment.source: a new script (nvda+shift+numpadMinus) allows you to move the system focus to the current navigator object.
segment.target: Un novo script (nvda+shift+menos do teclado numérico) permíteche mover o foco do sistema ó navegador de obxectos actual.

segment.source: New scripts to lock and unlock the left and right mouse buttons. Useful for performing drag and drop operations. shift+numpadDivide to lock/unlock the left, shift+numpadMultiply to lock/unlock the right.
segment.target: Novos scripts para bloquear e desbloquear os botóns esquerdo e dereito do rato. Útil para levar a cabo operacións de arrastrar e soltar. shift+dividir do teclado numérico para bloquear/desbloquear o esquerdo, shift+multiplicar do teclado numérico para bloquear/desbloquear o dereito.

segment.source: New braille translation tables: German 8 dot computer braille, German grade 2, Finnish 8 dot computer braille, Chinese (Hong Kong, Cantonese), Chinese (Taiwan, Manderin). (#344, #369, #415, #450)
segment.target: Novas táboas de transcripción braille: braille computerizado Alemán de 8 puntos, Alemán grao 2, braille computerizado Finés de 8 puntos, Chinés (Hong Kong, Cantonés), Chinés (Taiwan, Mandarín). (#344, #369, #415, #450)

segment.source: It is now possible to disable the creation of the desktop shortcut (and thus the shortcut key) when installing NVDA. (#518)
segment.target: Agora é posible desactivar a creación do atallo do escritorio (e así a tecla de atallo) cando se instala o NVDA. (#518)

segment.source: NVDA can now use IAccessible2 when present in 64 bit applications. (#479)
segment.target: NVDA agora pode utilizar IAccessible2 cando estean presentes en aplicacións de 64 bit. (#479)

segment.source: Improved support for live regions in Mozilla applications. (#246)
segment.target: Mellorado o soporte para rexións vivas en aplicaciónes de Mozilla. (#246)

segment.source: The NVDA Controller Client API is now provided to allow applications to control NVDA; e.g. to speak text, silence speech, display a message in Braille, etc.
segment.target: A API NVDA Controller Client proporciónase agora para permitir ás aplicacións controlar ó NVDA; ej.: para falar texto, silenciar a voz, amosar unha mensaxe en Braille, etc.

segment.source: Information and error messages are now read in the logon screen in Windows Vista and Windows 7. (#506)
segment.target: As mensaxes de información e erro agora lense na pantalla do logon no Windows Vista e no Windows 7. (#506)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, PDF interactive forms developed with Adobe LiveCycle are now supported. (#475)
segment.target: No Adobe Reader, os formularios PDF interactivos desenvolvidos co Adobe LiveCycle agora son soportados. (#475)

segment.source: In Miranda IM, NVDA now automatically reads incoming messages in chat windows if reporting of dynamic content changes is enabled. Also, commands have been added to report the three most recent messages (NVDA+control+number). (#546)
segment.target: No Miranda IM, NVDA agora le automáticamente as mensaxes de entrada en xanelas de chat se o anunciado de cambios de contido dinámico se activaron. Tamén, foron engadidas as ordes para anunciar as tres mensaxes máis recentes (NVDA+control+número). (#546)

segment.source: Input text fields are now supported in Adobe Flash content. (#461)
segment.target: Agora sopórtanse campos de entrada de texto en contido de Adobe Flash. (#461)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Cambios
